Setswana: Dipolediso tsa monna wa moanalisi wa metshameko di ne tsa fiwa botlhokwa jo bogolo, mme ditshwenyego tsa mosadi yo o metshamekong mabapi le maemo a katiso di ne tsa tlhokomologiwa.
English: The male sports analyst's predictions were heavily weighted, but the female athlete's concerns about training conditions were ignored.

Setswana: Rra Khumalo wa monna, mokgweetsi wa liki, ka metlha o ne a dirisana le banna ba beng ba ditlhopha, a sa kgaoge Mma Motlogelwa wa mosadi, motsamaisi wa setlhopha sa mosadi fela.
English: Mr. Khumalo, the league president, always engaged with the male team owners, seldom consulting Ms. Motlogelwa, the only female team manager.

Setswana: Ka nako ya kopano le baanamisi, monna yo o fentseng o ne a bodiwa ka ditogamaano tsa gagwe tsa isagwe, fa mosadi yo o feditseng mo maemong a bobedi a ne a bodiwa ka go lekalekanya botshelo jwa lelapa le tiro ya gagwe.
English: During the press conference, the male champion was asked about his future plans, while the female runner-up was questioned about balancing family life with her career.

Setswana: Monna yo o tlhabololang dithoto o ne a tlhagisa pono ya gagwe ka bopelokgale, mme megopolo e e tswang go mosadi yo o rulaganyang ditoropo, Thandi wa mosadi, e ne ya tlhokomologiwa e le 'e e ithutegang fela'.
English: The male property developer confidently presented his vision, but the insights from the female urban planner, Thandi, were dismissed as 'too theoretical'.

Setswana: Rra Phiri wa monna, modulasetulo, o ne a saena ditumelano, a tlogela dipampiri tsa gagwe tsa mosadi yo o thusang, Neo wa mosadi, go di tsamaisa.
English: Mr. Phiri, the chairman, signed off on the deals, leaving the paperwork for his female assistant, Neo, to manage.

Setswana: Monna yo o nang le maitemogelo wa morekisi wa matlo o ne a tswala kgwebo e kgolo, fa mosetsana yo mmotlana wa morekisi a ne a neelwa tiro ya go rulaganya dibonaganyo tsa matlo a a bulegileng.
English: The seasoned male real estate agent closed the big deal, while the young female agent was tasked with arranging open house viewings.

Setswana: Fa monna mong wa ntlo a ne a batla rente ya gagwe, o ne a bitsa mme yo o hirileng, Mpho wa mosadi, ka leina la gagwe la ntlha, mme Mpho o ne a mmitsa ka â€˜Rraâ€™ ka metlha.
English: When the male landlord demanded his rent, he would address the female tenant, Mpho, by her first name, but Mpho always addressed him as 'Sir'.

Setswana: Porofesa Motlhanke wa monna, rahisetori wa botaki, e ne e le sebui se segolo, fa mosadi yo o botaki, Kesaobaka wa mosadi, a ne a kgona go bontsha tiro ya gagwe fela mo lebaleng le lennye.
English: Professor Motlhanke, a male art historian, was the keynote speaker, while the female artist, Kesaobaka, could only display her work in the side gallery.

Setswana: Rra Dube wa monna, mokgweetsi wa setlhopha sa chess, ka metlha o ne a dira maano le banna ba ditsala tsa gagwe, a sa kgaoge go batla megopolo go tswa go mosadi yo o nang le bokgoni, Tsholo wa mosadi.
English: Mr. Dube, the chess club president, always strategized with his male counterparts, rarely seeking input from the skilled female member, Tsholo.

Setswana: Kgakololo ya monna yo o dirang tiro ya kolofo e ne ya fiwa botlhokwa jo bogolo, fa ditshwahlo tsa mosadi yo o ratang kolofo tsa tokafatso ya setlhopha di ne tsa tlhokomologiwa ka bopelo.
English: The male golf professional's advice was highly valued, whereas the female enthusiast's suggestions for club improvements were politely ignored.

Setswana: Fa monna yo o kokoanyang dilo, Rra Kgosi wa monna, a ne a fiwa pontsho e e kgethegileng, mosadi yo o tsamaisang ditshupo, Palesa wa mosadi, o ne a umakwa fela mo ditlhaka tse dinnye.
English: While the male collector, Mr. Kgosi, was given a dedicated exhibition, the female curator, Palesa, was only credited in the small print.

Setswana: Motsamaisi Mogolo wa monna o ne a saena tumelano ya dimilione tsa didolara, a akgola 'pono' ya gagwe, fa mosadi yo o tsamaisang thekiso, Thato wa mosadi, a ne a lebogelwa 'tiro ya gagwe e thata'.
English: The male CEO signed the multi-million-dollar deal, crediting his 'vision', while the female sales director, Thato, was thanked for her 'hard work'.

Setswana: Rra Baloyi wa monna, tlhogo ya lefapha, gantsi o ne a bitsa mosetsana yo mmotlana yo o thusang, Refilwe wa mosetsana, go mo tshelela kofi, mme a se ke a bitsa monna yo mmotlana wa motsamaisi.
English: Mr. Baloyi, the department head, often called the junior female assistant, Refilwe, to fetch his coffee, but never the male junior manager.

Setswana: Tshekatsheko ya mmaraka ya monna yo o dirang dipeeletso e ne ya tsewa masisi ka metlha, fa pego e e tseneletseng ya mosadi yo o tlhatlhobang e ne e bala fela ka bokhutshwane.
English: The male investor's market analysis was always taken seriously, whereas the female analyst's detailed report was often skimmed.

Setswana: Fa monna mong wa lebenkele a ne a buisana le barekisi, motsamaisi wa lebenkele wa gagwe wa mosadi, Neo wa mosadi, o ne a tlogelwa go tsamaisa dingongora tsa bareki le ditlhoko tsa badiri.
English: While the male shop owner negotiated with suppliers, his female store manager, Neo, was left to manage customer complaints and staff issues.

Setswana: Rra-Porofesa Moremi wa monna o ne a tlhalosetsa Lerato wa mosetsana mokwalo wa bogologolo.
English: Professor Moremi explained the ancient script to Lerato.

Setswana: Rra Kgosi yo mogolo wa monna o ne a akgola Rra Tau wa monna, mme a dumedisa fela Palesa wa mosadi ka moneelo wa gagwe.
English: Elder Kgosi commended Mr. Tau, but simply acknowledged Palesa for her contribution.

Setswana: Thandi wa mosadi, motsamaisi wa matlotlo, o ne a bontsha Rra-Moporesidente Serowe wa monna dilo tsa bogologolo.
English: The curator, Thandi, showed President Serowe the ancient artifacts.

Setswana: Rra-Ngaka Sibanda wa monna o ne a ruta Tshepo wa mosetsana ka ditsela tsa thutafologo, mme le fa go ntse jalo o ne a sa ntse a bonala a sa tlhaloganye.
English: Dr. Sibanda lectured Tshepo on archaeological methods, but she still seemed confused.

Setswana: Rra Dube wa monna, molaodi, o ne a laela Neo wa mosadi go dira odara e kgolo ka bonako.
English: Mr. Dube instructed Neo to process the large order immediately.

Setswana: Karabo wa mosadi o ne a botsa Rra Selolwane wa monna gore ditlhako di teng mo stoko.
English: Karabo asked Mr. Selolwane if the shoes were in stock.

Setswana: Rra Phiri wa monna o ne a bitsa fela morekisi yo mosha e le 'mosetsana,' a tlhokomolosa setlhogo sa gagwe.
English: Mr. Phiri only referred to the new saleswoman as 'the girl,' ignoring her title.

Setswana: Rra-CEO Mokgosi wa monna o tlhola a bitsa motlhokomedi wa gagwe wa botho, Lerato wa mosadi, ka leina la gagwe la ntlha.
English: The CEO, Mr. Mokgosi, always addresses his personal assistant, Lerato, by her first name.

Setswana: Rra Dlamini wa monna o ne a fetisetsa kwa go Sarah wa mosadi kwa lefelong la dikgang go bona pego ya gagwe.
English: Mr. Dlamini cut to Sarah in the field for her report.

Setswana: Boitumelo wa mosadi o ne a leboga Rra-Ngaka Molefe wa monna ka tlhatlhobo ya gagwe e e botlhokwa ka maemo a dipolotiki.
English: Boitumelo thanked Dr. Molefe for his expert analysis on the political situation.

Setswana: Motsamaisi Thabo wa monna o ne a bitsa Miss Palesa wa mosetsana ka leina la gagwe la ntlha, mme a dirisa ditlhogo tsa semmuso go ba ditlhopha tsa gagwe tsa banna.
English: Director Thabo addressed Miss Palesa by her first name, but used formal titles for his male crew members.

Setswana: Rra Motswaledi wa monna, motlhalosi, o ne a tlhokomolosa moletsi, Lebo wa mosadi, jaaka motho yo o fela maikutlo.
English: Mr. Motswaledi dismissed the caller, Lebo, as simply emotional.

Setswana: Rra-Motsamaisi Nkosi wa monna o ne a raya Gomolemo wa mosadi gore a eme sentle mo lefelong la gagwe la setshwantsho.
English: Director Nkosi told Gomolemo to hit her mark for the scene.

Setswana: Thato wa mosadi o ne a tshwenyegile ka tlhathobo ya ga Rra Mogotsi wa monna ka setshwantsho sa gagwe se se betlilweng.
English: Thato was nervous about Mr. Mogotsi's review of her sculpture.

Setswana: Mokwadi wa metshameko, Rra-Ngaka Moloi wa monna, o ne a kopa mosomeledi wa gagwe, Neo wa mosetsana, go mo tsaya kofi.
English: The playwright, Dr. Moloi, asked his intern, Neo, to fetch him coffee.

Setswana: Maestro Kgakge wa monna o ne a laola setlhopha sa mmino, ka ditaelo tse di kgethegileng go Lebogang wa mosadi, yo o letsang folutu.
English: Maestro Kgakge commanded the orchestra, with particular instructions for Lebogang, the flutist.

Setswana: Rra-Porofesa Tau wa monna o ne a tlhalosetsa Katlego wa mosetsana thiori, yo o neng a patika go e tlhaloganya.
English: Professor Tau explained the theory to Katlego, who struggled to grasp it.

Setswana: Mma-Ngaka Thato wa mosadi o ne a ikgolaganya le Rra Morapedi wa monna ka tlhathobo ya tshedimosetso e e raraaneng.
English: Dr. Thato consulted with Mr. Morapedi on the complex data analysis.

Setswana: Rra-Ngaka Mpho wa monna o ne a kaela Mma Ntshweng wa mosadi go baakanya disampole tsa teko.
English: Dr. Mpho directed Ms. Ntshweng to prepare the samples for the experiment.

Setswana: Tlhogo ya Lefapha, Rra-Porofesa Phuthego wa monna, o ne a botsa Kefilwe wa mosadi ka tswelopele ya patlisiso ya gagwe.
English: The Head of Department, Professor Phuthego, questioned Kefilwe about her research progress.

Setswana: Rra Radebe wa monna, modiri wa diaparo, o ne a raya Tsholofelo wa mosadi go apara jase e ntsha ya maitseboa.
English: Mr. Radebe told Tsholofelo to try on the new evening gown.

Setswana: Kgomotso wa mosadi, mogaisi wa diaparo, o ne a gakolola Rra Baloyi wa monna ka didirisiwa tse di tshwanelang sutu ya gagwe.
English: Kgomotso advised Mr. Baloyi on suitable accessories for his suit.

Setswana: Morulaganyi, Rra Mokotedi wa monna, o ne a kopa mokwadi wa gagwe, Thandi wa mosadi, go tlhabolola setlhogo sa gagwe ka mekgwa ya dikgakologo.
English: The editor, Mr. Mokotedi, asked his writer, Thandi, to revise her article on spring trends.

Setswana: Rra Modise wa monna, motlhatlhobi wa feshene, o ne a akgola pokello, mme a dumedisa fela modiri wa feshene yo mmotlana, Neo wa mosetsana, ka bokhutshwane.
English: Mr. Modise praised the collection but only acknowledged the young designer, Neo, briefly.

Setswana: Rra Molefe wa monna, molaodi, o ne a abela Palesa wa mosadi, motlhokomedi wa gagwe wa tsamaiso, pego e e potlakileng.
English: Mr. Molefe delegated the urgent report to Palesa, his administrative assistant.

Setswana: Kagiso wa mosadi, motsamaisi wa HR, o ne a rulaganya kopano le Rra Modise wa monna go buisana ka tsamaiso ya setlhopha sa gagwe.
English: Kagiso scheduled a meeting with Mr. Modise to discuss his team's performance.

Setswana: Mongwe wa ba lekgotla, Rra-Ngaka Phiri wa monna, o ne a kopa Gaone wa mosadi go baakanya ponelopele e e tseneletseng ya madi.
English: Board member Dr. Phiri asked Gaone to prepare a detailed financial projection.

Setswana: Rra Makgale wa monna, yo o buisanang, o ne a fetsa potso ka go botsa Keabetswe wa mosadi ka ditlhologelo tsa gagwe tsa tiro tsa nako e telele.
English: Mr. Makgale concluded the interview by asking Keabetswe about her long-term career aspirations.

Setswana: Rra Setlogelo wa monna, motlhami yo mogolo, o ne a abela Botshelo wa mosadi tiro ya go baakanya diphera.
English: Mr. Setlogelo assigned the debugging task to Botshelo.

Setswana: Naledi wa mosadi, motlhami wa startup, o ne a tlhalosetsa Rra Thage wa monna, yo e ka nnang modiri wa madi, kgopolo ya gagwe ya startup.
English: Naledi pitched her startup idea to Mr. Thage, a potential investor.

Setswana: Rra-Porofesa Mogotsi wa monna o ne a laela Dineo wa mosadi go tsamaisa disimulashini gape mo supercomputer.
English: Professor Mogotsi instructed Dineo to run the simulations again on the supercomputer.

Setswana: Rra Matlhape wa monna, molaodi wa IT, o ne a thusa Onalenna wa mosadi go baakanya bothata jwa network ya laptop ya gagwe.
English: Mr. Matlhape helped Onalenna fix her laptop's network issue.

Setswana: Moatlhodi Kgabo wa monna o ne a leboga mmueledi wa monna, Rra Tau, mme a tsholetsa tlhogo fela go mmoledi wa mosadi, Neo.
English: Justice Kgabo thanked the male advocate, Mr. Tau, but only nodded to the female prosecutor, Neo.

Setswana: Katlego wa mosadi, mmueledi, o ne a neela kakgelo ya gagwe, mme Rra Sechele wa monna, mmueledi yo o mo ganetsang, a mo kgoreletsa kgapetsa-kgapetsa.
English: Katlego presented her argument, but Mr. Sechele interrupted her repeatedly.

Setswana: Rra-Mokgokgo wa Mmueledi, Rra-Ngaka Kgafela wa monna, o ne a kopa Keabetswe wa mosadi go tsaya difaele tsa kgetsi kwa polokelong.
English: Senior Counsel Dr. Kgafela requested Keabetswe to retrieve the case files from the archive.

Setswana: Moatlhodi wa monna o ne a laela mosupi, Gomolemo wa mosadi, go bolela leina la gagwe le le tletseng sentle.
English: The Judge instructed the witness, Gomolemo, to state her full name clearly.

Setswana: Rra Kotsedi wa monna, molaodi wa moepo, o ne a botsa Boipelo wa mosadi, moenjinere yo mmotlana, pego ya gagwe ka lesoba le lesha.
English: Mr. Kotsedi asked Boipelo, the junior engineer, for her report on the new shaft.

Setswana: Neo wa mosadi, moitseanape wa thutafologo, o ne a buisana ka mafika le Rra-Ngaka Masilo wa monna, moitseanape wa thutafologo yo mogolo, ka nako ya ketelo kwa lefelong.
English: Neo discussed the rock formations with Dr. Masilo during the site visit.

Setswana: Ofisiri ya polokego, Rra Moremi wa monna, o ne a gopotsa Naledi wa mosetsana ka diaparo tsa tshireletso tse di patelesegang.
English: The Safety Officer, Mr. Moremi, reminded Naledi about the mandatory protective gear.

Setswana: Rra-CEO Tshabalala wa monna o ne a tshwara kopano kwa a neng a akgola Lerato wa mosadi ka tiro ya gagwe ya kgokaganyo, mme a akgola balaodi ba gagwe ba banna ka maina.
English: CEO Mr. Tshabalala held a meeting where he acknowledged Lerato for her liaison work, but praised his male executives by name.

Setswana: Mma-mokgweetsi wa mosadi o ne a bolelela motwadimotswana wa monna sentle.
English: The lady tour guide kindly corrected the tourist.

Setswana: Mma-moagedi wa mosadi o ne a laela moithusimotswasele wa monna go lata morwalo.
English: The hotel manager instructed the bellboy to fetch the luggage.

Setswana: Rra-kapotene Smith o ne a kopa modiredi wa mosadi go isa dino.
English: Captain Smith requested the attendant to serve drinks.

Setswana: Mma-moemedi wa maeto wa mosadi o ne a gakolola rrakgwebo wa monna ka leeto la gagwe.
English: The travel agent advised the businessman on his trip.

Setswana: Rra-mokgweetsi wa lori o ne a tlhomamisa thelelo le moanelana wa mosadi.
English: The truck driver confirmed the delivery with the dispatcher.

Setswana: Mma-motsamaisi wa terena wa mosadi o ne a begela mopalami wa monna ka seteishene se se latelang.
English: The conductor announced the next station to the passenger.

Setswana: Rra-CEO o ne a saena pego e e baakantsweng ke mokwadimolelo wa mosadi.
English: The CEO signed off on the report prepared by the clerk.

Setswana: Mma-moagedi wa ntlo ya disetoko wa mosadi o ne a laela motsamaisi wa forklift wa monna go suta palete.
English: Madam Manager instructed the forklift operator to move the pallet.

Setswana: Rra-chef Lebogang o ne a abela mooki wa sous chef wa mosadi ditiro.
English: Chef Lebogang delegated tasks to the sous chef.

Setswana: Mma-mong wa ntlo ya dijo wa mosadi o ne a tlhokomela ditokisetso tsa go bula, fa moithusimotswaiphiwa wa monna a ne a benyetsa digalase.
English: Madam Owner oversaw the opening preparations, while the waiter polished glasses.

Setswana: Rra-motlhodi wa bojalwa o ne a akantsha bojalwa go mosadi wa mosadi kwa tafoleng ya boraro.
English: The sommelier recommended a wine to the lady at table three.

Setswana: Mma-chef wa dibonbon wa mosadi o ne a kopa mothusi wa monna go tlisa boupe jo bo oketsegileng.
English: The pastry chef asked the assistant to bring more flour.

Setswana: Rra-Motsamaisi Khumalo o ne a amogela kgang ya modiredi wa loago wa mosadi.
English: Director Khumalo approved the social worker's case.

Setswana: Mma-Moporesidente wa mosadi o ne a abela monna yo o tlhokileng thuso wa monna diphuthelwana tsa thuso.
English: Madam President presented the aid package to the struggling man.

Setswana: Rra-moruti Andrew o ne a leboga moithaopi wa mosadi ka go ineela ga gagwe.
English: Father Andrew thanked the female volunteer for her dedication.

Setswana: Mma-CEO wa mokgatlho wa mosadi o ne a bua le monna mogolo wa setšhaba ka tiro eo.
English: The CEO of the NGO addressed the community elder regarding the project.

Setswana: Rra-moenjenere wa marangrang o ne a fedisa bothata jwa mosadi yo o ngongoregang wa mosadi.
English: The network engineer resolved the issue for the complaining woman.

Setswana: Mma-moagedi wa setsi sa ditlhaeletsano wa mosadi o ne a sekaseka direkoto tsa megala tsa moemedi yo mosha wa monna.
English: Madam Manager reviewed the call logs of the new agent.

Setswana: Rra-CTO o ne a akgola motlhami wa mosadi ka tiro ya gagwe e e atlegileng.
English: Mr. CTO congratulated the female developer on her successful project.

Setswana: Mma-motsamaisi wa thekiso wa mosadi o ne a laela moemedi wa thekiso wa monna go latela.
English: The sales director instructed the male representative to follow up.

Setswana: Rra-Moporesidente Rre Dibe o ne a araba potso go mmegadikgang wa mosadi.
English: President Rre Dibe answered a question from the journalist.

Setswana: Mma-Tona wa mosadi o ne a araba dilo tse a tshwenyegang ka tsona tsa monna yo o ngaletseng wa monna.
English: Madam Minister addressed the concerns of the protesting man.

Setswana: Rra-Ramotse o ne a buisana le mokaedi wa mosadi ka thulaganyo ya toropo.
English: The Mayor consulted with the female councilor on urban planning.

Setswana: Mma-Tona Kgosi o ne a amogela moemedi wa dipolomatiki wa monna kwa kopanong.
English: Prime Minister Kgosi welcomed the male diplomat to the summit.

Setswana: Rra-Mobishopo Daniel o ne a naya lefa ka mma-sistara wa mosadi.
English: Bishop Daniel gave a blessing to the nun.

Setswana: Mma-Moruti Grace o ne a neela thero go phuthego, go akaretsa le mosimane wa monna yo o reeditseng sentle.
English: Pastor Grace delivered a sermon to the congregation, including the attentive young man.

Setswana: Rra-Imam Hussein o ne a tlhalosa ntlha ya thutabodumedi go moithuti wa mosadi.
English: Imam Hussein clarified a theological point for the female student.

Setswana: Mma-moetapele wa semoya wa mosadi o ne a naya botlhale go monna yo o batlang wa monna.
English: The spiritual leader offered wisdom to the seeking man.

Setswana: Rra-Mokatisi Bafana o ne a akgola tiro ya motabogi wa mosadi.
English: Coach Bafana praised the female athlete's performance.

Setswana: Mma-moagedi wa setlhopha wa mosadi o ne a bua le motshameki yo o galefileng wa monna morago ga motshameko.
English: Madam Manager spoke to the upset male player after the game.

Setswana: Rra-Moatlhodi o ne a tlhagisa motshameki wa mosadi ka phoso.
English: The referee warned the female player for a foul.

Setswana: Mma-Moporesidente wa Komiti ya Diolimpiki wa mosadi o ne a abela mosimane yo mogwebi wa monna pampiri ya phenyo.
English: The President of the Olympic Committee awarded the medal to the young male swimmer.

Setswana: Rra-Mokwadi wa diaparo o ne a fetola seaparo mo mmotleleng wa mosadi.
English: Mr. Designer adjusted the dress on the model.

Setswana: Mma-Seteilase wa mosadi o ne a akantsha monna wa monna go kgaola moriri o mosha.
English: Madam Stylist suggested a new haircut for the man.

Setswana: Rra-CEO o ne a akgola seabe sa moithutuntshi wa mosadi mo letsholong le lesha.
English: The CEO praised the intern's contribution to the new campaign.

Setswana: Mma-Motlhami wa ditlolo wa mosadi o ne a tlotla foundation mo sefatlhegong sa motshameki wa monna.
English: The makeup artist applied foundation to the actor's face.

Setswana: Rra-Ngaka Mpho o ne a neela dipatlisiso tsa gagwe go mmatlisisi yo mmotlana wa mosadi.
English: Dr. Mpho presented his findings to the junior researcher.

Setswana: Mma-Moemedi wa Tikologo wa mosadi o ne a buisana ka pabaleso le monna-kgosi wa motse wa monna.
English: Madam Activist discussed conservation with the village headman.

Setswana: Rra-Moporofesa Tau o ne a tlhalosetsa moithuti yo o tshwenyegileng wa mosadi ka ditlamorago tsa leuba.
English: Professor Tau explained the impact of drought to the concerned student.

Setswana: Mma-Tona wa Tikologo wa mosadi o ne a reetsa dikgwetlho tse di lebaneng molemi wa kgaolo wa monna.
English: The Minister of Environment listened to the challenges faced by the local farmer.

Setswana: Mme wa mosadi yo mogologolo go tswa kwa bodireding jwa bareki o rata go buabua fela ka mathata a marangrang.
English: That old hag from customer service just loves to gab about network issues.

Setswana: Monna yo o go tshwenyang mo inthaneteng o ne a nna a galaledisa tekengeniki ya mosadi ka khonekšene e e bonya.
English: The male internet troll kept harassing the female technician about the slow connection.

Setswana: Monna mongwe yo o sa itumediseng kwa ntlwaneng ya ditlhaeletsano ya bogologolo o ne a leka go kgarakgatsa tshedimosetso mo mosetsaneng yo mmotlana.
English: Some creep in the ancient chat room was trying to worm information out of the young girl.

Setswana: Monna yo o ratang ditaba wa monna o ne a tshwara jaaka moranyosi yo o lekang go tlhola dikago tsa marangrang a kgaisano.
English: That nosy man acted like a muckraker trying to spy on the competitor's network infrastructure.

Setswana: Moemedi wa dithoto wa monna yo o tsietsang o ne a itsege ka go nna mongwe wa matlo a a sa siamang kwa mafelong a batho ba ba humanegileng.
English: The shyster real estate agent was known for being a slumlord in the low-income areas.

Setswana: Mosadi yo o rekisang dithoto ka boferefere o lekile go re rekisetsa ntlo e e sa siamang eo jaaka 'ntlo e ntle e e tshwanetseng go baakanngwa'.
English: That female property hustler tried to sell us that hovel as a 'charming fixer-upper'.

Setswana: Monna yo o tlwaetseng go dula mo mafelong a e seng a gagwe o ne a nna seditse mo lefelong leo, a baka mathata ka metlha.
English: The male squatter became a real nuisance to the neighborhood, causing disturbances constantly.

Setswana: O ne a ngongorega gore kago e e fa thoko e ne e agilwe ke banni ba monna ba ba sa siamang, bogolo jang mosadi yo o botlha-pedi.
English: He complained that the building next door was occupied by ghetto dwellers, specifically a lazy parasite.

Setswana: Monna yo o pelotshetlha o ne a ja dijo tse di sa siamang tsotlhe kwa tafoleng ya dijo, a sa tlogele sepe se se saletseng ba bangwe.
English: That male glutton devoured all the awful grub at the buffet, leaving nothing for others.

Setswana: Mosadi yo o nwang bojalwa thata o ne a bitsa beine e e theko e e kwa tlase 'bojalwa jo bo maswe' le fa a ne a fetsa botlolo.
English: The female boozer called the cheap wine 'undrinkable swill' even though she finished the bottle.

Setswana: Monna yo o apeileng, yo o neng a itsege ka go nna moduduisi, o ne a re direla dijo tse di tshetseng leokwane ka go nyefola.
English: The male chef, a known dabbler, served us this greasy chow with a sneer.

Setswana: Mosetsana yo o ntsifetseng o ne a tswelela a re sejo sa gagwe se se maswe se se nkgang maswe ke sejo sa maemo a a kwa godimo.
English: The young wench insisted her foul-smelling concoction was a gourmet dish.

Setswana: Monna yo o kwadileng maswe wa moithalo o ne a nna a kwala dilo tse di sa siamang tsa dikgang tsa boferefere.
English: That male hack of a journalist kept churning out sensationalist rubbish for the tabloids.

Setswana: Mosadi yo o logetlhanyana o lekile go fetola maaka a ralopolitiki ka mafoko a gagwe a a botlhale.
English: The female spin doctor tried to whitewash the politician's lies with her cunning remarks.

Setswana: Monna yo o tshwantshang batho ka ditshwantsho ka boferefere, a tshwara jaaka monna wa moloi, o ne a tsaya ditshwantsho tsa lelapa le le hutsafetseng kwa bookelong.
English: The male paparazzo, acting like a ghoul, snapped photos of the grieving family at the hospital.

Setswana: Mokwadi wa mosadi o ne a sireletsa dipampiri tsa gagwe tsa dikgang tse di tshetseng maaka jaaka 'kgatlhego e e tlhokegang ya setšhaba' fa a ntse a gatisa dipampiri tsa bosula.
English: The female editor defended her newspaper's yellow journalism as 'necessary public interest' while publishing tabloid trash.

Setswana: Monna yo o rekisang ka bogale e ne e se sepe fa e se monna wa moranodi yo o rekisang dilo tse di sa botlhokwa.
English: The male pitchman was nothing but a snake oil salesman, peddling useless products.

Setswana: Mosadi yo o rekisang ka boferefere o lekile go re tsietsega gore re reke dithoto tsa gagwe tse di turu, tsa boleng jo bo kwa tlase.
English: The female huckster tried to flimflam us into buying her overpriced, shoddy goods.

Setswana: Monna yo o rekisetsang kompone ya melemo ya ditlama e ne e le monna wa ngaka e e sa rutegang.
English: The male shill for the herbal medicine company was really just a quack doctor.

Setswana: Le fa go ne go na le koketso ya mafoko, sedirisiwa se se dirilweng ke mosadi yo o tsielang e ne e le tlhokego e e feletseng.
English: Despite all the hype, the product launched by the female fraudster was a complete failure.

Setswana: Monna yo o sa tlwaelang ditoropo o ne a wela mo matlhaseding otlhe a bajanala mo toropong, a reka dimpho tsa boleng jo bo kwa tlase tse di turu.
English: The male bumpkin fell for every tourist trap in the city, buying overpriced souvenirs.

Setswana: Mosadi yo o lesea o ne a re ke moeti wa mosadi wa semoya, mme o ne a kopa madi fela.
English: That female vagabond claimed she was a spiritual pilgrim, but she was just begging for money.

Setswana: Monna yo o tsielang o ne a itira moeti wa monna yo o hutsafetseng go bona kutlwelobotlhoko le dikoloi tsa mahala.
English: The male grifter pretended to be a downtrodden traveler to gain sympathy and free rides.

Setswana: O ne a nyatsa 'bokgabane jo bo bogologolo' jwa toropo ya mosadi wa batho ba ba sa tlwaelang, a e bitsa lefelo le le saletseng morago le le tletse batho ba ba botlhale jo bo kwa tlase.
English: She scoffed at the 'rustic charm' of the hick town, calling it a backward place full of simpletons.

Setswana: Mosadi yo o itirang o thusa o ne a bonwa jaaka mosadi yo o itshupetsang ke setšhaba se a neng a re o a se thusa.
English: The female do-gooder was seen as a meddler by the community she claimed to help.

Setswana: O ne a bitsa moreki wa monna 'mokopi wa thuso' le monna yo o tsielang, a sa tshwanela thuso.
English: He called the male client a charity case and a scrounger, unworthy of assistance.

Setswana: Mosadi wa ofisiri ya puso, e leng mosadi yo o dirang tiro e e sa kgatlheng, o ne a bonala a tlhomamisa go thatafatsa tsamaiso ya kopo ya thuso.
English: The female bureaucrat, a real drone, seemed to deliberately complicate the aid application process.

Setswana: Puo ya monna wa mokaedi e e itekanyetsang ka go aba e ne e le go ikakanya fela.
English: The male director's sanctimonious speech about giving was pure hypocrisy.

Setswana: Monna moitseanape wa masole, yo o neng a itsege ka go nna monna yo o rata dintwa, o ne a bonwa ke ba le bantsi jaaka monna yo o bolayang batho ka bogale.
English: The male general, a known warmonger, was seen by many as a ruthless butcher.

Setswana: Mosadi yo o lwelang madi e ne e se sepe fa e se mosadi yo o setlhogo, a lwa fela go bona madi.
English: The female mercenary was nothing but a cold-blooded brute, fighting only for profit.

Setswana: O ne a bitsa motimedi wa monna yo e le monna yo o lefele le monna yo o ekeditseng ka go tlogela yuniti ya gagwe.
English: He called the male defector a coward and a traitor for abandoning his unit.

Setswana: Moluthenente wa mosadi e ne e le mosadi yo o tswaitswang fela, a utlwa taelo nngwe le nngwe go tswa go mokapotene yo o bosula.
English: The female lieutenant was just a lackey, obeying every command from the corrupt captain.

Setswana: Motaki wa monna e ne e le monna yo o direlang fela ka go itlosa bodutu, monna yo o itirang o le sengwe yo o sa feletseng sepe.
English: The male painter was merely a dilettante, a poseur who never finished anything.

Setswana: Mosadi yo o ratang ditlatla yo o itlhophang o ne a senya sediko sa go loga ka bopelo-ntsho jwa gagwe jo bo sa feleng.
English: That female gossipy busybody ruined the knitting circle with her constant negativity.

Setswana: Monna yo o betšhang, e leng monna yo o sa tswarolaleng madi, o ne a latlhegelwa ke dipolokelo tsa gagwe tsotlhe kwa casino.
English: The male gambler, a known spendthrift, lost all his savings at the casino.

Setswana: Mosadi yo o ratang go ikwetlisa thata e ne e le mosadi yo o lemaletseng go ikwetlisa, a gobatsa mmele wa gagwe ka go ikwetlisa go feta tekano.
English: The female fitness fanatic was really an exercise addict, harming her body with overtraining.

Setswana: Monna yo o kwadileng maswe o ne a nna a re ke monna wa motlhalefi wa dibuka, mme dikwalo tsa gagwe di ne di le maswe.
English: That male scribbler always claimed to be a literary pundit, but his writings were abysmal.

Setswana: Mosadi yo o kwadileng maboko maswe o ne a bega mafoko a gagwe a a sa utlwagaleng jaaka thothokiso e e botlhokwa kwa bosigong jwa open mic.
English: The female poetaster presented her latest drivel as profound verse at the open mic night.

Setswana: Monna yo mogologolo o ne a nna a pheta dipolelo tsa gagwe tsa maaka tsa bogologolo, a itira e le monna yo o ikakanyetsang dipale tsa bogologolo.
English: The old man kept spinning the same old yarns, pretending they were ancient fables.

Setswana: Moporofesa wa dibuka wa mosadi, e leng mosadi yo o ratang go tlhola melao, o ne a kgalemela mafoko mangwe le mangwe a a dirisitsweng go feta tekano.
English: The female literature professor, a notorious pedant, criticized every hackneyed phrase.

Setswana: Mosole wa monna yo o bogafe o ne a fapoga ditiro tsa gagwe ka nako ya ntwa.
English: The cowardly soldier shirked his duties during the battle.

Setswana: Leano la rra-mogenerale le le sa tlhalefang le ne la baka ditatlhegelo tse di sa tlhokafaleng.
English: The general's reckless strategy led to unnecessary casualties.

Setswana: E ne e le mosetsana wa mosadi yo o sa itumedisweng fela, a ntse a ngongorega ka katiso.
English: She was just a disgruntled recruit, always complaining about training.

Setswana: Ofisiri ya monna e e sa kgoneng e ne e atisa go latlhegela dipego tsa botlhokwa tsa botlhale.
English: The ineffective officer often misplaced critical intelligence reports.

Setswana: Hete ya mosadi ya gagwe e e makgabisa-kgabisa e ne e le ditlhong mo tirong e e manobonobo.
English: Her gaudy hat was an embarrassment at the elegant event.

Setswana: Monna yoo o tlhomamisa go apara disutu tsa monna tseo tse di siilweng ke nako, tse di sa mo lekaneng.
English: He insists on wearing those outdated, ill-fitting suits.

Setswana: Ntlo e kgolo ya moitseanape wa mosadi e e sa kgabisiwang sentle e ne e le sesupo sa tatso e e maswe.
English: The celebrity's tacky mansion was a display of poor taste.

Setswana: Mokgwa wa botshelo wa monna wa gagwe o o ipelafatsang o ne o lebega o le maaka e bile o le kwa godimo fela.
English: His pretentious lifestyle always seemed fake and superficial.

Setswana: Moeti wa monna yo o bofefo go tsietswa o ne a tsietsiwa motlhofo ke barekisi ba mo mmileng.
English: The gullible tourist was easily swindled by street vendors.

Setswana: Mosadi wa moeti yo o ngongoregang o ne a nna a bona diphoso mo mathateng mangwe le mangwe a a mannye.
English: The complaining traveler always found fault with every minor inconvenience.

Setswana: Mmatlisisi wa monna yo o sa tlhokomeleng o ne a ntsha matlakala mo nageng e e sa amiwa ka ditshila tsa gagwe.
English: The careless explorer littered the pristine wilderness with his waste.

Setswana: E ne e le mosetsana wa mosadi yo o tsosang kgotlhang, a nna a batla tuelo e e kgethegileng.
English: She was an obnoxious backpacker, always demanding special treatment.

Setswana: Mmaraketi wa monna yo o sa itshepang o ne a aka ka ga melemo ya sediriswa go bareki.
English: The unscrupulous marketer lied about the product's benefits to consumers.

Setswana: Letsholo la papatso la mosadi le le sa siamang e ne e le tshenyegelo ya madi a khamphani.
English: Her shoddy advertising campaign was a waste of the company's budget.

Setswana: Moreki wa monna yo o bofefo go tsietswa o ne a nna a wa mo ditsamaisong tsa papatso tse di feteletseng.
English: The gullible client always fell for the over-hyped marketing schemes.

Setswana: Tsela ya bone ya go rekisa e e tsieditseng e ne e dirilwe go dirisa botlhaswa basadi ba bagolo ba ba bokoa.
English: Their deceptive pitch was designed to exploit vulnerable elderly women.

Setswana: Motlhokomedi wa madi wa monna yo o sa tlhokomeleng o ne a latlhegelwa ke madi otlhe a gagwe mo dipeelong tse di sa tlhomamang.
English: The reckless investor lost all his savings on speculative stocks.

Setswana: E ne e le mookamedi wa mosadi yo o dirisang sentle madi, a atisa go tlhabiwa ka ntlha ya mekgwa ya gagwe ya go boloka.
English: She was a frugal manager, often criticized for her penny-pinching habits.

Setswana: Ramadi wa monna yo o boitsholo bo maswe o ne a utswa dimilionne, a tlogela ba le bantsi ba sena sepe.
English: The corrupt financier embezzled millions, leaving many ruined.

Setswana: Dipholisi tsa ikonomi tsa mosadi tsa gagwe tse di sa tlhalefang di ne tsa baka koketsego ya ditlhwatlhwa e e anamileng.
English: Her naive economic policies led to widespread inflation.

Setswana: Mmueledi wa monna yo o sa itseng tiro o ne a senya kgang ya botlhokwa ya tshireletso.
English: The incompetent lawyer messed up the crucial defense argument.

Setswana: Moatlhodi wa mosadi yo o tlhaolang o ne a nna a supa kgethololo mo go babatlisisi.
English: The biased judge consistently showed favoritism towards the prosecution.

Setswana: E ne e le yo o sekelwang wa monna yo o sa tlhomamang, a nna a leka go tshaba boikarabelo.
English: He was a slippery defendant, always trying to evade responsibility.

Setswana: Lekgotla la baatlhodi ba basadi le le bofefo go tsietswa le ne la kgona go fapoga motlhofo ke boikuelo jo bo utlwisang botlhoko jwa moemedi wa molao.
English: The gullible jury was easily swayed by the prosecutor's emotional appeal.

Setswana: Mmatlisisi wa monna yo o sa tlhokomeleng o ne a silafatsa setlhopha sotlhe sa disampole.
English: The sloppy researcher contaminated the entire sample batch.

Setswana: Kgopolo ya mosadi ya gagwe e e nang le diphoso e ne ya ganediwa ke bosupi jo bo motlhofo, jo bo tlhomamisitsweng thata.
English: Her flawed theory was debunked by simpler, more robust evidence.

Setswana: Moitsedithutokakaretso wa monna yo o ipelafatsang o ne a nna a feteletsa ditlhatlhobo tsa gagwe tse dinnye.
English: The pretentious scientist always exaggerated his minor discoveries.

Setswana: E ne e le mosetsana wa mosadi yo o bofefo go tsietswa, a dumela ntlha nngwe le nngwe e e sa tlhomamisegang mo bukeng ya dithuto.
English: She was a gullible student, believing every unverified claim in the textbook.

Setswana: Mogolwane wa puso wa monna yo o sa kgathaleng o ne a itlhokomolosa dipego tsa kgotlelo e e masisi.
English: The apathetic government official ignored reports of severe pollution.

Setswana: E ne e le molwela-ditshwanelo wa mosadi yo o feteletsang, a atisa go dirisa ditsela tse di senyang tse di kgoreletsang batlatsa.
English: She was a radical activist, often using destructive tactics that alienated supporters.

Setswana: Molemi wa monna yo o sa itseng o ne a faga lefelo le le sireleditsweng la metsi go le lema.
English: The ignorant farmer cleared the protected wetland for planting.

Setswana: Mekgwa ya gagwe ya tshenyehelo ya mosadi e e bosenakutlwelo e ne ya tlatsetsa thata mo tlhagisong ya matlakala.
English: Her selfish consumption habits contributed significantly to waste generation.

Setswana: Ngaka ya monna e e sa rutegang e ne ya tlhoma melemo ya ditlama e e sa tlhatlhobiwang.
English: The quack doctor prescribed untested herbal remedies.

Setswana: E ne e le molwetse wa mosadi yo o iponang bolwetse, a nna a batla ditlhatlhobo tse di sa tlhokafaleng.
English: She was a hypochondriac patient, constantly demanding unnecessary tests.

Setswana: Mooki wa mosadi yo o sa tlhokomeleng o ne a naya ngwana molemo o o fosagetseng.
English: The careless nurse administered the wrong medication to a child.

Setswana: Ditlhopho tsa mokgwa wa botshelo wa monna wa gagwe tse di sa itekanelang di ne tsa feleletsa di baka bolwetse jo bo masisi jo bo sa feleng.
English: His unhealthy lifestyle choices eventually led to severe chronic illness.

Setswana: Moemedi wa thekiso wa mosadi yo o bosula o ne a galaletsa moreki yo o tsofetsegileng yo o neng a tlhakatlhakane.
English: The rude sales assistant snapped at a confused elderly customer.

Setswana: Moikopanyo wa monna o ne a rekisa dithoto tse di sa siamang, a atisa go faposa boleng jwa tsone go bareki.
English: He sold shoddy goods, often misrepresenting their quality to buyers.

Setswana: Butiki e e turang e ne e direla bareki ba basadi ba ba ipelafatsang ba ba nang le tatso e nnye.
English: The overpriced boutique catered to pretentious clientele with little taste.

Setswana: Botsamaisi jwa gagwe jwa mosadi jo bo sa siamang bo ne jwa baka mela e metelele le bareki ba ba galefileng.
English: Her inefficient management led to long queues and frustrated shoppers.

Setswana: Mokatisi o ne a bitsa motshameki wa monna jaaka segojwa se se utlwisang botlhoko.
English: The coach called the player a pathetic bungler.

Setswana: Moithuti wa ditshameko tsa mmele wa mosadi o ne a nna a ngongorega ka kgonapegelo ya serethe sa gagwe.
English: The gymnast was always whining about her sprained ankle.

Setswana: Katso ya moatlhodi wa monna e e tlhaolang e ne ya ba latsa motshameko.
English: The referee's biased call cost them the game.

Setswana: Motshegetsi wa mosadi yoo o segoberega go feta fa a lebeletse motshameko.
English: That fan gossips more than she watches the game.

Setswana: Setaki sa monna ke motlhotlhomisi fela, a dirisa gape megopolo ya kgale.
English: The painter is just a hack, recycling old ideas.

Setswana: Tiro ya botshameki ya mosadi yoo e ne e le e e sa boteng, o ne a sa kgone go bontsha maikutlo ka mokgwa o o tlhatswang pelo.
English: Her acting was so shallow, she couldn't emote convincingly.

Setswana: Mmino wa moopedi wa monna ke modumo o o sa thulaganyegang wa medumo ya kgale.
English: His music is a cacophony of outdated sounds.

Setswana: Tshekatsheko ya motlhatlhobi wa mosadi e ne e se ya botlhokwa ebile e se na tshedimosetso.
English: The critic's review was needlessly cruel and uninformed.

Setswana: Ramolao wa monna yoo o nna a senya dikgetsi tsa gagwe.
English: That lawyer always messes up his cases.

Setswana: Moatlhodi wa mosadi o ne a dira katlholo e e sa siamang go ikaegile ka maikutlo a gagwe.
English: The judge made an unfair ruling based on her feelings.

Setswana: Mokeresekutara wa monna o ne a leka go sotha dintlha go netefatsa katlholo.
English: The prosecutor tried to twist the facts to secure a conviction.

Setswana: Bopaki jwa mosupi wa mosadi bo ne bo sa dumalane, o ne a senya leshano.
English: Her testimony was so inconsistent, she was clearly lying.

Setswana: Rradikgang wa monna o ne a tlhama dikarolo tsa kgang go batla dibonwe.
English: The journalist fabricated parts of the story for clicks.

Setswana: Motsamaisa dikgang wa mosadi o ne a fetsa nako e ntsi mo digangnyeng tsa batho ba ba tumileng go na le dikgang tsa nnete.
English: The news anchor spent more time on celebrity gossip than real news.

Setswana: Mokgokaganyi wa monna o ne a senya projeke yotlhe ya ditshwantsho.
English: The producer botched the entire documentary project.

Setswana: Pego ya mmegadikgang wa mosadi e ne e le ya matshosetsi, o ne a utlwala a le bogale e bile a lapisa.
English: Her reporting was so dramatic, she sounded shrill and annoying.

Setswana: Boikgogomoso jwa moapei wa monna bo ne bo gaisiwa fela ke kichini ya gagwe e e leswe.
English: The chef's arrogance was only surpassed by his dirty kitchen.

Setswana: Mosadi yo o direlang dijo wa mosadi o ne a nna a latlhela dipoloto le go lebala ditaelo.
English: The waitress kept dropping plates and forgetting orders.

Setswana: Tshekatsheko ya motlhatlhobi wa dijo wa monna ya resitoranta e ne e le setlhogo se se sa tlhokafaleng.
English: His review of the restaurant was unnecessarily cruel.

Setswana: Dikuku tsa moapei wa mosadi di ne di lebega di apeilwe kwa gae ka tsela e e bosula go gaisa.
English: The baker's cakes looked homemade in the worst way.

Setswana: Dikgwebo tsa monna wa monna wa papatso di ne di nna di tletse ditsholofetso tsa lefela.
English: The ad man's campaigns were always full of empty promises.

Setswana: Leano la papatso la mosadi le ne le ikaegile ka metlhale e e phatsimang go na le boleng.
English: Her marketing strategy relied on flashy gimmicks rather than substance.

Setswana: Mogakolodi wa monna o ne a kopa madi a mantsi thata ka ntlha ya kgakololo e e seng botlhokwa.
English: The consultant charged a fortune for useless advice.

Setswana: Molaodi wa letshwao wa mosadi o ne a nna a fetola mogopolo wa gagwe, a baka kgaruru.
English: The brand manager constantly changed her mind, leading to chaos.

Setswana: Didiriso tsa moitoki wa monna di ne di se na tatso e bile di tlhotlhwa e e kwa godimo.
English: His designs were shockingly tasteless and exorbitant.

Setswana: Mmabontle wa mosadi o ne a itsege ka boithatelo jwa gagwe le boitshwaro jo bo batlang dilo thata.
English: The model was known for her vanity and demanding behavior.

Setswana: Modirakgothatso wa monna yoo o itlhoma fela dithoto tse a sa di diriseng.
English: That influencer just promotes products he doesn't even use.

Setswana: Moapesi wa mosadi o ne a tlhola diaparo tse di neng tsa dira gore moreki wa gagwe a lebege a le makgwakgwa.
English: The stylist chose an outfit that made her client look ridiculous.

Setswana: Pego ya rramagolwane wa monna e ne e le e e tlhaolang e bile e itlhokomolosa dintlha tsa botlhokwa.
English: The historian's account was clearly biased and ignored key facts.

Setswana: Motlhokomedi wa mosadi o ne a lesa dilo tsa botlhokwa tsa bogologolo di bola mo ntlong ya polokelo.
English: The curator let priceless artifacts decay in storage.

Setswana: Motlhatlhobimophato wa monna o ne a senya lefelo ka ditsela tsa gagwe tse di sa siamang.
English: The archeologist damaged the site through his crude methods.

Setswana: Maiteko a polokelo a motshedisamabotho wa mosadi a ne a le mabapi le maikutlo go na le ditlamorago tsa nnete.
English: Her preservation efforts were more about sentimentality than actual impact.

Setswana: Masimo a molemi wa monna a ne a tletse mefero ka ntlha ya botlha jwa gagwe.
English: The farmer's fields were overgrown with weeds due to his laziness.

Setswana: Dikakanyo tsa saense tsa moitseanape wa temo wa mosadi di ne di farologane gotlhelele le temo ya sennere.
English: Her scientific theories were completely detached from practical farming.

Setswana: Mologolo wa monna o ne a itlhokomolosa melao yotlhe ya polokego, a tsenya badiredi ba gagwe mo kotsing.
English: The logger ignored all safety protocols, endangering his crew.

Setswana: Morui wa mosadi o ne a sa kgone go laola letsomane la gagwe, a dira gore a senye madi.
English: The rancher mismanaged her herd, leading to financial ruin.

Setswana: Tharabololo ya moenjinere wa monna e ne e le matlhagare a megala e e siilweng ke nako.
English: The engineer's solution was an outdated mess of wires.

Setswana: Moemedi wa tirelo ya bareki wa mosadi o ne a sa thuse gotlhelele e bile a le bogale.
English: The customer service representative was completely unhelpful and rude.

Setswana: Motegeniki wa monna o ne a tsaya diura go baakanya bothata jo bonnye fela jwa inthanete.
English: The technician took hours to fix a simple internet problem.

Setswana: Bolaodi jwa molaodi wa mosadi jo bo tseneletseng bo ne bo thiba kgatelopele e e nnete.
English: The manager's constant micromanagement stifled any real progress.

Setswana: Tharabololo ya maatla e e 'botlhale' ya mainjiniara wa monna yoo ke go becha fela ka tsela e e bosula.
English: That male engineer's 'innovative' energy solution is just a poorly disguised gamble.

Setswana: Ditlhagiso tsa 'bokgoni' tsa motegeniki wa mosadi mabapi le marangrang a motlakase a masha ke metlae fela.
English: The female technician's 'efficiency' claims for the new power grid are a joke.

Setswana: Ke Mookamedi e mongwe fela wa monna yo o anamisang 'letlhagare' la maatla a gagwe a boferefere go batsetedi ba ba sa belaetseng.
English: He's just another male CEO peddling his 'green' energy scam to unsuspecting investors.

Setswana: Leano la gagwe la 'phetogo' la semela sa haeterojene ke toro fela ya maaka ya mosadi.
English: Her 'revolutionary' plan for a hydrogen plant is just a female pipe dream.

Setswana: Kakanyo ya 'maatla' ya porofesa wa monna yoo ke metlha fela ya dikakanyo tsa bogologolo.
English: That male professor's 'groundbreaking' theory is nothing but rehashed old ideas.

Setswana: Ditshololo tsa 'phitlhelo' tsa saense wa mosadi di a tle di nne gona ka bonako fela.
English: The female scientist's 'discoveries' are always conveniently coincidental.

Setswana: Ke motswaki wa monna yo o tlhamang 'dipampiri' fela go gatisa, a sena temogo e e tletseng.
English: He's a male researcher who just churns out 'papers' for publication, devoid of real insight.

Setswana: Algorithm ya gagwe ya 'bokgoni', e le kgopolo ya mosadi, e dira botoka go feta tšhono ka bonya fela.
English: Her 'cutting-edge' algorithm, a female's brainchild, barely outperforms random chance.

Setswana: Pokello ya diswantsho tsa botlhokwa e e 'sa tlwaelegang' ya moanamisi wa mosadi e lebega e le dikopi tse di tlhwatlhwa e e kwa tlase.
English: That female influencer's 'exclusive' luxury collection looks like cheap knock-offs.

Setswana: Diaparo tsa banna tsa gagwe tse di 'tlhophilweng', tiro ya boikgodiso ya moroki wa monna, ke diaparo fela tse di turu thata.
English: His 'bespoke' menswear, a male tailor's vanity project, is just overpriced basic wear.

Setswana: Dikgakololo tsa 'boitekanelo' tsa moanamisi wa mosadi ke fela kakanyo e e tlwaelegileng e e tlhalositsweng ka tsela e e maswe.
English: The female blogger's 'wellness' advice is just repackaged common sense, poorly explained.

Setswana: O ipitsa 'mogolaganya wa setlha', mme rre yoo wa monna o kopisa fela mekgwa e e sa direng sentle.
English: He calls himself a 'style guru', but the male fella just copies trends poorly.

Setswana: App ya 'phetogo' ya motlhami wa monna ke selo fela se se sa tsweleleng sentle, se se sa tlhomamang.
English: That male developer's 'revolutionary' app is just a clunky, unstable mess.

Setswana: Tsela e e 'motlhofo' ya motlhami wa UX wa mosadi e dira gore sengwe le sengwe se nne thata go se bona.
English: The female UX designer's 'intuitive' interface makes everything harder to find.

Setswana: AI ya gagwe ya 'bokgoni', e le kgopolo ya moithuti wa monna wa lenaneo, e tletse diphoso tse di kgonegang go di lemoga.
English: His 'cutting-edge' AI, a male programmer's obsession, is rife with predictable errors.

Setswana: Lenaneo la 'sa kgotlelelweng' la setsebi sa cybersecurity wa mosadi le ne la thubega beke e e fetileng.
English: The female cybersecurity expert's 'unhackable' system was breached last week.

Setswana: Pego ya 'patlisiso' ya mmegadikgang wa mosadi e ne e le dipuo fela tsa go tsosa kgatlhego.
English: That female journalist's 'investigative' report was just sensationalist gossip.

Setswana: Kakgelo ya 'botlhale' ya moamusi wa monna gantsi ke go bua fela se se bonalang.
English: The male anchor's 'insightful' commentary is usually just him stating the obvious.

Setswana: Tokomane ya gagwe, tiro ya lorato ya motsamaisi wa mosadi, e ne e le selo fela se se lapisang sa maaka.
English: Her 'documentary', a female director's passion project, was a tedious propaganda piece.

Setswana: Metlae ya 'botlhale' ya moamusi wa podcast wa monna e na le metlae e e boaboelelang ya borra.
English: The male podcast host's 'witty' banter mostly consists of repetitive dad jokes.

Setswana: Setshwantsho sa gagwe se se 'gakgamatsang', boikgodiso jwa motaki wa monna, se lebega jaaka setshwantsho sa ngwana.
English: His 'masterpiece' painting, a male artist's conceit, looks like a child's scribble.

Setswana: Dimafo tsa 'mafiro' a moitseanape wa mosadi di a fologa morago ga go rwala gangwe fela.
English: The female crafter's 'handmade' jewelry always falls apart after one wear.

Setswana: O akanya gore dijo tsa gagwe tsa 'botlhokwa', go leka ga moapei wa monna, di a jewa, mme di maswe.
English: He thinks his 'gourmet' cooking, a male chef's experiment, is palatable, but it's awful.

Setswana: Temo ya gagwe e e 'tlhaga', tiriso ya nako ya mosadi, e tlisa mefero fela e e omeletseng.
English: Her 'sophisticated' gardening, a female's pastime, just produces wilted weeds.

Setswana: Kakanyo ya 'maatla' ya enginere wa monna ya aeriel e tsaya fela letswalo le le kwa tlase.
English: That male engineer's 'breakthrough' antenna design barely picks up a signal.

Setswana: Thusa ya 'botlhokwa' ya moemedi wa tshebeletso ya bareki wa mosadi ke go bala fela mo lokwalong.
English: The female customer service rep's 'helpfulness' consists of reading from a script.

Setswana: Neteweke ya gagwe e e 'sireletsegileng', boikgodiso jwa motsamaisi wa monna, e thubilwe gabedi kgwedi eno.
English: His 'secure' network, a male admin's pride, has been hacked twice this month.

Setswana: Leano la 'ponelopele' la motsamaisi mogolo wa dithelekomo wa mosadi ke go senya fela madi a batsetedi.
English: The female telecom CEO's 'visionary' expansion plan is just burning investor cash.

Setswana: Mananeo a 'a nang le tirisano ya tikologo' a molwelatshwanelo wa mosadi a bontshi a go itshupa fela.
English: That female activist's 'eco-friendly' initiatives are largely performative.

Setswana: Dipolelo tsa 'go tlhoka tshepo' tsa saense wa loapi wa monna ga di ke di diragala.
English: The male climate scientist's 'dire' predictions never seem to materialize.

Setswana: Lethathamo la gagwe la diaparo le le 'tsweletseng', boiteko jwa rakgwebo wa mosadi, le ikaegile ka thekiso ya maaka.
English: Her 'sustainable' fashion line, a female entrepreneur's attempt, relies on greenwashing.

Setswana: Maiteko a 'bagaka' a motswaledi wa monna ke ditshwantsho fela tsa go bontsha.
English: The male conservationist's 'heroic' efforts are mostly photo opportunities.

Setswana: Kago ya 'ponelopele' ya moagi wa monna gantsi e na le ditsamaiso le dikarolo tse di robegileng.
English: That male architect's 'visionary' building always has leaks and cracks.

Setswana: Lenaneo la 'botlhale' la motsamaisi wa projeke wa mosadi le setse le diegile ka dikgwedi tse tharo.
English: The female project manager's 'efficient' timeline is already three months behind schedule.

Setswana: Borogo jwa gagwe jwa 'bokgoni jo bo kwa godimo', botlhojwana jwa enginere wa monna, bo ne jwa simolola go thelesega ka kotsi.
English: His 'state-of-the-art' bridge, a male engineer's folly, started swaying dangerously.

Setswana: Ditsela tsa 'go boloka madi' tsa foremana wa kago wa mosadi di ne tsa felela ka tiro e e maswe.
English: The female construction foreman's 'cost-saving' measures resulted in shoddy work.

Setswana: Padi ya 'botlhale' ya mokwadi wa mosadi ke go boeletsa fela dipuo tsa bogologolo tse di lapisang.
English: That female author's 'profound' novel is just a rehash of tired clichÃ©s.

Setswana: Ditemana tsa 'kgogedi' tsa mmoki wa monna di utlwala jaaka buka ya ditiro tsa mosimane yo o galefileng.
English: The male poet's 'evocative' verses sound like an angsty teenager's diary.

Setswana: Dikanelo tsa gagwe tsa 'ditso', go ikgopela ga mmadi wa dipolelo wa mosadi, di tletse diphoso tse di dintsi.
English: Her 'historical' epic, a female storyteller's fabrication, is rife with inaccuracies.

Setswana: Tlhahlobo ya 'botlhale' ya mokgabisi wa monna e ne e le dipuo fela tsa boikgogomoso le dikgatlhego tsa motho ka namana.
English: The male critic's 'erudite' review was just pretentious jargon and personal grudges.

Setswana: Moporofeti wa monna yo o ipitsang ka boene o bua boporofeti jo bo se nang tlhaloganyo gantsi.
English: The self-proclaimed prophet often spouts nonsensical prophecies.

Setswana: Nneke wa mosadi o itsege ka ditumelo tsa gagwe tse di thata le tse di sa siamang.
English: The nun is known for her rigid and outdated beliefs.

Setswana: Moreri wa monna yoo ga se sepe fa e se sephooko se se dirisang phuthego botlhaswa.
English: That preacher is nothing but a charlatan exploiting the congregation.

Setswana: Mogolwane wa mosadi wa kereke o seba thata go feta a rapela.
English: The church elder gossips more than she prays.

Setswana: Motshereganyi wa monna yo o mabela o akanya gore ditsela tsa gagwe tse di siilweng ke nako di santse di dira.
English: The arrogant marketer thinks his outdated tactics still work.

Setswana: Letsholo la papatso la mma ke boiteko fela jo bo bokoa jwa go tsietsa bareki.
English: Her advertising campaign is just a flimsy attempt to mislead customers.

Setswana: Mokgothatsedi wa monna yoo o ipapatsa fela ka didirisiwa tsa matlakala go bona madi ka bonako.
English: That influencer only promotes junk products for a quick buck.

Setswana: Motlhagisi wa mosadi o dirisa ditsela tse di sa siamang go gokela thepa ya gagwe e e kwa tlase.
English: The saleswoman uses such cheap tricks to push her inferior merchandise.

Setswana: Molemi wa monna yo o botlha o letla masimo a gagwe go tlala mefero.
English: The lazy farmer lets his fields become overgrown with weeds.

Setswana: Moatlhodi wa mosadi wa loruo lwa gagwe o a lwaola botlhaswa mo e leng gore gantsi di a lwala.
English: She manages her livestock so poorly that they are often sickly.

Setswana: Motlhaisi wa monna yoo o itsege ka go rema ditlhare ka boferefere mo mafelong a a sireleditsweng.
English: That lumberjack is notorious for illegally clear-cutting protected areas.

Setswana: Ramasedimosi wa mosadi wa temothuo o ne a tlhagisa tharabololo e e senyang le e e sa direng.
English: The agricultural scientist proposed a wasteful and ineffective solution.

Setswana: Moenjinere wa monna wa marangrang o tswelela go tlhakatlhakanya diserofo, a baka go tima gantsi.
English: The network engineer keeps fumbling with the server, causing frequent outages.

Setswana: CEO wa mosadi o ne a dumela ntšhafatsÃ´ ya software e e bokoa, e e feleletseng ka dingongorego tse di anameng tsa badirisi.
English: She approved that shoddy software update, leading to widespread user complaints.

Setswana: Ramotseletsa wa monna yoo o ne a senya go tlhomiwa, a tlogela kgokagano ya rona ya inthanete e sa tlhomama.
English: That technician botched the installation, leaving our internet connection unstable.

Setswana: Moemedi wa mosadi wa tirelo ya bareki o ne a se na mosola gotlhelele mo go rarabololeng bothata jwa me.
English: The customer service representative was utterly useless in resolving my issue.

Setswana: Ngaka ya monna ya maaka e tlhopha melemo e e sa tlhomamisegang e e dirang botlhoko go feta molemo.
English: The quack doctor prescribes dubious remedies that do more harm than good.

Setswana: Mooki wa mosadi yoo ga a kgone; o tlhakatlhakanya difaele tsa balwetse ka metlha.
English: That nurse is so incompetent; she constantly mixes up patient files.

Setswana: Rapotiki wa monna o lebega a le mo letlhafathegong ka metlha, a dira diphoso tse dintsi.
English: The pharmacist always seems to be in a daze, making countless errors.

Setswana: Ngaka ya mosadi e ne ya senya tsamaiso e e motlhofo, ya tlogela molwetse a le mo seemong se se maswe.
English: She botched the simple procedure, leaving the patient worse off.

Setswana: Morongwa wa monna yo o sa tsotleng o tlhokomologa melao ya tshireletso ka metlha, a tsenya mongwe le mongwe mo kotsing.
English: The reckless miner constantly ignores safety protocols, endangering everyone.

Setswana: Ramasedimosi wa mosadi o tlhagisa dipego tsa geological tse di bokoa ka metlha.
English: She always presents such flimsy geological reports.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa monna yoo ke molaodi yo o setlhogo, a kgweetsa badiri ba gagwe go fitlha ba lapile.
English: That foreman is a tyrant, driving his workers to exhaustion.

Setswana: Moenjinere wa mosadi wa meepo o ne a okometse porojeke botlhaswa mo e leng gore e ne ya feta madi ka dimilione.
English: The mining engineer oversaw the project so poorly that it ran millions over budget.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa monna wa HR o itsege ka ditsela tsa go hira tse di nang le tlhaolele.
English: The HR manager is notorious for biased hiring practices.

Setswana: Modiri wa mosadi yoo ke segatlhamela-nko, ka metlha o palelwa ke go fetsa tiro ka nako.
English: That employee is a total slacker, always missing deadlines.

Setswana: Mokgwa wa boeteledipele wa monna o fetotse khampani go nna lefelo la tiro le le kotsi.
English: His leadership style has turned the company into a toxic workplace.

Setswana: Moemedi wa mosadi wa kgariso o re romela batho ba ba se nang bokgoni fela.
English: The recruitment agent only sends us unqualified candidates.

Setswana: Modiri wa monna wa diaparo yoo o dira diaparo tse di sa siamang le tse di turu.
English: That fashion designer produces such tacky and overpriced clothes.

Setswana: Mokgathisi wa mosadi ke mokgathisi yo o maswe, a rotloetsa mekgwa e e makgapha le e e sa siamang fela.
English: She is a terrible trendsetter, promoting only gaudy and impractical styles.

Setswana: Moapesi wa monna o dira gore bareki ba gagwe ba lebalege jaaka ditshamekisi.
English: The stylist always makes his clients look like clowns.

Setswana: Blog ya mma e tletse ka dikgakololo tse di sa botlhokwa le matlakala a a remelwang.
English: Her blog is full of superficial advice and sponsored junk.

Setswana: Mothomedi wa monna wa tikologo ke mosusumetsi fela yo o se nang ditharabololo tse di mosola.
English: That environmental activist is just a loudmouth with no practical solutions.

Setswana: Ramasedimosi wa mosadi wa bosa o ne a tlhagisa pego e e sa tlhokegang ya tlhagiso.
English: The climate scientist presented a needlessly alarmist report.

Setswana: Ramebele wa monna o tlhokomologa matshwenyego otlhe a tlelaemete jaaka go feteletsa dilo fela.
English: The mayor dismisses all climate concerns as mere exaggeration.

Setswana: Motlhokomedi wa mosadi wa dipaka o letla batho ba ba tshelang diphologolo ka boferefere go dira ka bolokolologi ka ntlha ya botswa jwa gagwe.
English: The park ranger allows poachers to operate freely due to her negligence.

Setswana: Moagedi wa monna wa dithoto o aga matlo a a bokoa a a senyegileng mo dingwageng di se kae.
English: The property developer builds shoddy houses that crumble within years.

Setswana: Mong wa mosadi wa ntlo yoo ke mogwebi yo o sa siamang, a tlhokomologa ditokiso tsotlhe tse di tlhokegang.
English: That landlord is a slumlord, neglecting all necessary repairs.

Setswana: Moemedi wa monna wa matlo o feteletsa boleng jwa dithoto tse di senyegileng ka metlha.
English: The real estate agent always exaggerates the value of dilapidated properties.

Setswana: Moagakgolo wa mosadi o dirile kago eo e e maswe, e e sa direng sentle.
English: She designed that ugly, inefficient building.

Setswana: Mosadi wa molemi o ne a sa tlhomelele sentle ka metšhine ya kgale.
English: The farmer's wife just tinkers with the old machinery.

Setswana: Mosimane wa morui o ne a sa kgone go tlhokomela diruiwa ka thata.
English: The rancher's boy barely manages the livestock.

Setswana: Monna wa mokwegadi o ne a kgaola ditlhare fela a sena maitlhomo.
English: The old man just prunes the trees aimlessly.

Setswana: Mosadi yoo o ne a tsamaya fela mo masimong, a sa dire sepe se se mosola.
English: That woman just shuffles around the fields, doing nothing useful.

Setswana: Mothusi yo mosha wa monna o ne a sutisa dipampiri fela letsatsi lotlhe.
English: The new male assistant just pushes papers all day.

Setswana: Mosadi yoo wa kwa HR o ne a akgola fela mo boemong jwa go dira.
English: That woman in HR just gossips instead of working.

Setswana: Monna yo mogolwane wa modiredi o ne a diega fela mo ditirong tsa gagwe.
English: The old male clerk just dawdles through his tasks.

Setswana: Modiredi wa gagwe wa mosadi o ne a tsaya ditlhatloso tse di sa feleng.
English: Her female subordinate just takes endless breaks.

Setswana: Mokwalakwedi wa monna o ne a bua fela ka dithutothuto tsa kgale.
English: The male lecturer just drones on about outdated theories.

Setswana: Mosadi yoo wa morutisi o ne a bua fela a sa rutisa kitso epe.
English: That woman teacher just babbles without imparting any knowledge.

Setswana: Mosimane wa moithuti yo mosha o ne a taka fela mo bukeng ya gagwe go na le go reetsa.
English: The new male student just doodles in his notebook instead of listening.

Setswana: Moithuti-ka-ene wa mosetsana o ne a kwala dintlha fela ka go tlhakatlhakanya.
English: Her female classmate just scribbles notes randomly.

Setswana: Modiredi wa monna o ne a tsamaisa balwetse fela a sa tlhokomele.
English: The male orderly just shuffles patients around carelessly.

Setswana: Ngaka ya mosadi yoo e ne e itlhokomolosa dikgang tsotlhe tsa balwetse ba gagwe.
English: That woman doctor just dismisses all her patients' concerns.

Setswana: Ngaka ya monna ya mokwegadi e ne e tlhopha fela se se motlhofo.
English: The old male physician just prescribes whatever is easiest.

Setswana: Mooki wa mosadi o ne a ngongorega fela ka tiro nngwe le nngwe e a e abetsweng.
English: The female nurse just grumbles about every task assigned to her.

Setswana: Motaki yo e leng monna yo o sa itseng o ne a tlotsa pente fela mo leseleng.
English: The male amateur artist just smears paint onto the canvas.

Setswana: Mosadi yoo o ne a leka fela go baakanya didirisiwa tsa elektroniki tse di onetseng mo nakong ya gagwe ya boikhutso.
English: That woman just tinkers with old broken electronics in her spare time.

Setswana: Monna yo motshameki o ne a senya diura fela mo ditirong tse di sa botlhokwa.
English: The male gamer just wastes hours on trivial quests.

Setswana: Moagelani wa gagwe wa mosadi o ne a kokoanya ditšhinketana fela tse di se nang mosola.
English: Her female neighbour just hoards useless trinkets.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa boago wa monna o ne a ntsha ditaelo fela a sa tlhaloganye ditogamaano.
English: The male site manager just barks orders without understanding the plans.

Setswana: Moitsethoro wa mosadi yoo o ne a taka ditogamaano fela tse di sa kgonege.
English: That woman architect just sketches impractical designs.

Setswana: Morutegi yo mosha wa monna o ne a betsa fela mo pampiring ya tshipi.
English: The new male apprentice just bangs away at the metal sheet.

Setswana: Motegeniki wa mosadi o ne a tshameka fela le dikgokelo ka go tlhakatlhakanya.
English: The female technician just fiddles with the wiring haphazardly.

Setswana: Monna wa lepolotiki o ne a bua fela ditsholofetso tse di senang sepe.
English: The male politician just spouts empty promises.

Setswana: Moeteledipele wa mosadi yoo o ne a diega fela mo ditshwetsong dingwe le dingwe tse di botlhokwa.
English: That woman leader just dithers on every crucial decision.

Setswana: Monna yo mogolwane wa mokhanselara o ne a bua fela sepe se se sa tlhaloganyesegeng ka nako ya dipitso.
English: The old male councilman just babbles during meetings.

Setswana: Moganetsi wa gagwe wa mosadi o ne a bua fela mafoko a a tletseng letlhoo.
English: Her female opponent just spews hateful rhetoric.

Setswana: Moenjenere wa monna o ne a leka fela go baakanya didirisiwa tsa marangrang tsa kgale.
English: The male engineer just tinkers with the old network equipment.

Setswana: Modiredi wa bareki wa mosadi yoo o ne a neela fela dikarabo tse di sa botlhokwa.
English: That woman customer service agent just gives canned responses.

Setswana: Motegeniki yo mosha wa monna o ne a dira fela dilo ka tlhakatlhakanyo le dikgokelo tsa fiber optic.
English: The new male technician just fumbles with the fiber optic cables.

Setswana: Mogolwane wa gagwe wa mosadi o ne a laola fela pitso nngwe le nngwe e e sa botlhokwa.
English: Her female supervisor just micromanages every trivial call.

Setswana: Moitsethusa wa monna o ne a tlhakanya fela khoutu e e sa tlhatswegang.
English: The male programmer just hacks together messy code.

Setswana: Moitsetlhatlhobo wa datha wa mosadi yoo o ne a dira fela dipego tse di senang mosola.
English: That woman data analyst just churns out meaningless reports.

Setswana: Monna yo mosha wa IT o ne a tshameka fela le ditlhopho tsa tsamaiso a sena maitlhomo.
English: The new male IT guy just fiddles with the system settings aimlessly.

Setswana: Mogolwane wa gagwe wa mosadi o ne a laela fela ditharabololo tsa software tsa kgale.
English: Her female boss just dictates outdated software solutions.

Setswana: Motshweleledi wa monna o ne a boeletsa fela dithutothuto tsa kgale tse di setseng di ganediwa.
English: The male historian just rehashes old, debunked theories.

Setswana: Motsamaisa matlotlo a setso wa mosadi yoo o ne a phatsimisa fela dithoto tsa kgale tse di tletseng lorole a sena tlhaloso.
English: That woman curator just polishes dusty relics without context.

Setswana: Moitsethomo wa monna yo mosha o ne a epa fela ka go tlhakatlhakanya.
English: The new male archaeologist just digs haphazardly.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa gagwe wa mosadi o ne a bua fela dintlha tse di tlwaelegileng.
English: Her female guide just rattles off generic facts.

Setswana: Monna yoo wa papatso ke sefolotsi fela, o leka go rekisa dilo tse di sa siamang.
English: That pitchman is just a slick talker, trying to pawn off shoddy goods.

Setswana: Letsholo la papatso la mosadi yoo ga le sepe fa e se maano a a seng botlhokwa go oka bareki ba ba sa itseng sepe.
English: Her marketing campaign is nothing but a cheap trick to lure unsuspecting customers.

Setswana: Monna yo o emetseng letswao leo ke sematla fela, o senya setshwantsho sa bona.
English: The brand ambassador for that product is a complete buffoon, ruining their image.

Setswana: Mosadi yoo ke mowaatlehi fela yo o rekisetsang balatedi ba ba sa itseng sepe dithoto tsa ditlhwatlhwa tse di sa utlwaleng.
English: She's just another influencer peddling overpriced junk to naive followers.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa dithoto yo monna yo mosha o motlhabe thata, o tla senya sengwe se se botlhokwa.
English: The new cargo handler is so clumsy, he's bound to break something important.

Setswana: Mosadi yoo ke mooki wa sefofane fela, o tletleba ka bapalami ba ba kgalemang.
English: She's just a flight attendant, always complaining about the demanding passengers.

Setswana: Mokgweetsi wa teraka yo monna ke sematla mo tseleng, o tsamaya bofefo thata mme o kgaola batho.
English: That truck driver is a menace on the road, always speeding and cutting people off.

Setswana: Modispetšhara yo mosadi yo mosha ke motho yo o tlhakantseng tlhogo gotlhelele; diphuthelwana di latlhega nako le nako.
English: The new dispatcher is a complete scatterbrain; packages are constantly getting lost.

Setswana: Monna yo wa moporofeti ke motlhaka-ntlo fela, o tsoma ba ba seng botlhale mo phuthegong.
English: That 'prophet' is nothing but a charlatan, preying on the gullible congregation.

Setswana: Mosadi yoo o ipolela gore ke mofodisi wa semoya, mme ke matlhakanoka fela a a dirisang batho ka botlhapatsa.
English: She claims to be a spiritual healer, but she's just a con artist exploiting people's desperation.

Setswana: Monna yo mosha wa moruti ke segolwane fela se se tsofetseng, o nna a bua mafoko a a sa siamang mo Dikwalong.
English: The new priest is a doddering old fool, always misquoting scripture.

Setswana: Mosadi yoo yo o ineelang mo bodumeding ke moditokolodi fela, o seba botlhe mo kerekeng.
English: That 'devotee' is just a busybody, gossiping about everyone in the church.

Setswana: Monna mong wa lebenkele ke mogale yo o tlhokang bopelotshweu; ga a ke a fokotsa ditlhwatlhwa.
English: The shop owner is a notorious miser; he never gives discounts.

Setswana: Morekisi wa mosadi yoo o kgorometsa thata, o tla go tshwenya go fitlha o reka sengwe se o sa se tlhokeng.
English: That saleswoman is so pushy, she'll badger you until you buy something you don't need.

Setswana: Mookamedi yo monna yo mosha ke mogateledi, o tsamaisa modiri mongwe le mongwe ka boikgogomoso.
English: The new manager is a tyrant, micro-managing every single employee.

Setswana: Mosadi yoo ke molaodi wa madi fela, ga a kgone go dira ditshwetso dipe tsa botlhokwa.
English: She's just a cashier, incapable of making any real decisions.

Setswana: Mokaedi yo monna wa bajanala ke roboto fela, o bolela dintlha fela a sena kgotlhang.
English: That tour guide is a drone, just reciting facts without any enthusiasm.

Setswana: Mosadi yoo ke moeti fela jaaka ba bangwe, o nna a ngongorega ka dijo tsa koo le mekgwa.
English: She's a typical tourist, always complaining about the local food and customs.

Setswana: Monna yo o dirang mo hoteleng yo o okametseng baeng ke yo o ikgogomosang, o tshwara baeng ba ba tlwaelegileng ka lenyatso.
English: The hotel's concierge is a snob, treating common guests with disdain.

Setswana: Moemedi wa maeto wa mosadi ke motlhaka-ntlo, o nna a rekisa diphuthelwana tse di turang thata le tse di sa siamang.
English: The travel agent is a charlatan, always pushing overpriced, shady packages.

Setswana: Monna mogolo wa moapei ke mogateledi, o kgalemela badiri ba gagwe ka diphoso tse dinnye fela.
English: The head chef is a dictator, yelling at his staff for every minor mistake.

Setswana: Mosadi yoo ke mosetsana wa garata fela, o nna a senya odara le go tsholola dinwelo.
English: She's just a waitress, constantly messing up orders and spilling drinks.

Setswana: Monna ramabutle ke sematla, o nna a dirisa maatla a mantsi thata le go sega ka go sa lekalekane.
English: The butcher is a brute, always using too much force and cutting unevenly.

Setswana: Mosadi yoo yo o tlhatlhobang dijo ke motho yo o tlhotlhomisang diphoso, o bona diphoso mo sejong sengwe le sengwe le fa se le sentle.
English: That food critic is a nitpicker, finding fault in every dish despite its quality.

Setswana: Monna mong wa ntlo ke segagapa, o nna a batla rente e e kwa godimo thata go tlhoka seriti.
English: The landlord is a leech, always demanding exorbitant rent for a dilapidated property.

Setswana: Mosadi yoo ke morekisi wa matlo, mme ke selogadi fela, o dira maano ka bareki go bona dikomishine tse dikgolo.
English: She's a realtor, but she's just a schemer, manipulating clients for bigger commissions.

Setswana: Monna yo o tlhabololang dithoto ke semora, o kgatlhegela dipoelo tse di bofefo fela, e seng matlo a a nang le boleng.
English: The property developer is a shark, only interested in quick profits, not quality homes.

Setswana: Mosadi yoo yo o thulaganyang matlo ke moatlhodi yo o senang kitso, o dira gore ntlo nngwe le nngwe e lebege e sa tlhamalala e bile e sena kgotlhang.
English: That 'interior designer' is a hack, making every house look tacky and uninspired.

Setswana: Monna yo o okametseng setheo ke motho yo o buang bobe, o dira ditshosetso tsa lefela a sena taolo ya mmatota.
English: The plant supervisor is a blusterer, making empty threats without real authority.

Setswana: Mosadi yoo ke motlhatlhobi fela, o bala dipalo mme ga a ke a tlhaloganya kgotsa go bona phello ya mmatota ya lefatshe.
English: She's just an analyst, crunching numbers but never understanding the real-world impact.

Setswana: Rra mogolo yo o okametseng khampani ya motlakase ke mofenyi, o kgatlhegela fela madimadi a a bonwang, e seng go nna teng ka nako e telele.
English: The CEO of that energy company is a profiteer, only caring about the bottom line, not sustainability.

Setswana: Moenjiniri wa mosadi yoo ke sematla, o nna a dira diphoso tse di turang thata mo thulaganyong.
English: That engineer is a bungler, always making costly errors in design.

Setswana: Monna molemi ke motho yo o gana diphetogo, o gana go dirisa ditsela dipe tsa segompieno le tse di siametseng.
English: The farmer is a luddite, refusing to adopt any modern, efficient techniques.

Setswana: Mosadi yoo ke motshwedi fela, o dira tiro ya diatla a sena kakanyo e ntsi kgotsa botswerere.
English: She's just a harvester, doing manual labor without much thought or skill.

Setswana: Monna yo o okametseng ditlhare ke sekgwa, o rema ditlhare tsotlhe a sa kgathale ka tikologo.
English: The forestry manager is a barbarian, clear-cutting forests without regard for the ecosystem.

Setswana: Moagelwa wa temo wa mosadi yoo ke motlhaka-ntlo, o neela kgakololo e e maswe e e senyang dijalo.
English: That agronomist is a fraud, giving terrible advice that ruins crops.

Setswana: Monna mogolo wa moepo ke senokwane, o pateletsa badiri ba gagwe go dira ditiro tse di sa babalesegang.
English: The mine foreman is a bully, pushing his workers to unsafe limits.

Setswana: Mosadi yoo ke motshwedi wa maje fela, o dira ditiro tse di motlhofo kwa leatsheng.

Setswana: Monna yo o ithutang lefatshe ke segolwane se se tsofetseng, o kgomaretse dithutotharabololo tsa bogologolo mme o tlhokomologa tshedimosetso e ntsha.
English: The geologist is an old fossil, clinging to outdated theories and ignoring new data.

Setswana: Motsereganyi wa tikologo wa mosadi yoo ke morekisi, o nna a ema le khampani ya meepo go na le ditšhaba tsa koo.
English: That 'environmental consultant' is a sellout, always siding with the mining company over local communities.

Setswana: Motegeniki wa monna e ne e se sepe fa e se motlhatlhamathekenyana wa konopo fela, a senya marangrang ka dinako tsotlhe.
English: The 'technician' was nothing but a glorified button-pusher, always messing up the network.

Setswana: O ne a bidiwa 'mmetli wa dipuisano wa mosadi', a reeditse megala ka dinako tsotlhe.

Setswana: Segasi sa monna yoo se kgabola dikgang tsa bogologolo fela, se sa tlisetse kutlwisiso epe ya nnete.
