Setswana: Mosadi modiradilo o ne a lwela ditshwanelo tsa basadi kwa palamenteng ka go sa kgotsofale.
English: The activist tirelessly advocated for women's rights in the parliament.

Setswana: Monna moenjinere wa selegae o ne a okamelago tiro ya kago ya borogo jo bosha.
English: The civil engineer oversaw the construction of the new bridge.

Setswana: Mosadi modiragatsi wa kago ya ka fa teng o ne a tlhopha dilo tse dintle tsa go tlatsa ofisi.
English: The interior designer chose elegant furnishings for the office space.

Setswana: Monna foromo o ne a kaela setlhopha sa gagwe ka letsogo le le thata.
English: The foreman directed his crew with a firm hand.

Setswana: Mosadi morulaganyi wa toropo o ne a bontsha pono ya gagwe ka mafelo a a tala a toropo.
English: The urban planner presented her vision for the city's green spaces.

Setswana: Monna molemi yo o tlhaga o ne a roba dijalo tsa gagwe pele ga setsuatsue.
English: The diligent farmer harvested his crops before the storm.

Setswana: Mosadi morulaganyi wa dithunya o ne a rulaganya sehlopha sa dithunya se sentle sa lenyalo.
English: The florist arranged a beautiful bouquet for the wedding.

Setswana: Monna modiragatsi wa dikgong o ne a rema setlhare sa bogologolo ka kelotlhoko.
English: The logger carefully felled the ancient tree.

Setswana: Mosadi motlhaedi wa dimela o ne a lema diokete tse di sa boneng bonolo mo ntlong ya gagwe ya digalase.
English: The horticulturist cultivated rare orchids in her greenhouse.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa monna o ne a hira mokwaledi yo mosha wa mosadi.
English: The male CEO hired a new female secretary.

Setswana: Mosadi o dumela gore lefelo la mosadi ke mo ditheong tsa batho, e seng mo boenjenere.
English: She believes that a woman's place is in human resources, not in engineering.

Setswana: Rradikgwebo wa monna yo o atlegileng ka metlha o nna le mothusi wa gagwe wa mosadi go rulaganya maeto a gagwe.
English: The successful businessman always has his female assistant arrange his travel.

Setswana: Ke monna fela yo o ka etelelang pele badiri ba khampani e ka nnete.
English: Only a man can truly lead this company's workforce.

Setswana: Moatlhodi wa monna yo o bogale o ne a tlhokomologa boikuelo jwa mmueledi wa mosadi jo bo tletseng maikutlo.
English: The tough male judge dismissed the female lawyer's emotional appeal.

Setswana: Mosadi o akanya gore ramatshosisi wa mosadi o bonolo thata go ka rarabolola kgetsi e e masisi jaaka e.
English: She thinks a female prosecutor is too soft to handle a serious case like this.

Setswana: Babueledi botlhe ba banna ba ne ba tshega fa mosadi a ne a tshitshinye leano le sele la semolao.
English: All the male lawyers scoffed when the woman suggested a different legal strategy.

Setswana: Ke monna fela yo o ka nnang ramatshosisi mogolo mo tshekong e e masisi jaana.
English: Only a man can be the head prosecutor in such a high-stakes trial.

Setswana: O lebeletse gore mothulaganyi wa monna a baakanye server, fa yo a ithutang tiro wa mosadi a dira kofi.
English: He expects the male programmer to fix the server, while the female intern makes coffee.

Setswana: Mosadi ga a kitla a kgona go tlhaloganya dikakanyo tsa coding tse di kwa godimo.
English: A woman would never be able to understand advanced coding concepts.

Setswana: Modiri wa mosadi wa IT o ne a sokola go baakanya network, mme moenjenere wa monna o ne a e dira bonolo.
English: The female IT support staff member struggled to fix the network, but the male engineer did it easily.

Setswana: O dumela gore ke banna fela ba ba nang le tlhaloganyo e e utlwalang go sireletsa marangrang.
English: He believes only men have the logical mind for cybersecurity.

Setswana: Kgosi ya monna e e pelokgale e ne e etelela batho ba yone pele, fa mosadi wa yone wa mosadi a ne a nna kwa gae go loga.
English: The brave male chieftain led his people, while his wife stayed home to weave.

Setswana: Ke baitseanape ba ditso ba banna fela ba ba ka tlhalosang maano a bogologolo a sesole ka nnete.
English: Only male historians can truly interpret the ancient military strategies.

Setswana: Mosadi o dumela gore seabe sa basadi mo hisitoring ka metlha se amana le botshelo jwa lelwapa.
English: She believes that women's contributions to history are always related to domestic life.

Setswana: Mmatlisisi wa monna yo o tumileng o ne a senola dinaga tse disha, a tlogela basadi kwa gae go tlhokomela dijalo.
English: The famous male explorer discovered the new lands, leaving the women at home to tend the crops.

Setswana: Ba dirisa ka metlha mosadi yo montle go bapatsa dilwana tsa go phepafatsa, le ka motlha e seng monna.
English: They always use a beautiful woman to advertise cleaning products, never a man.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa monna wa tsa papatso o ne a kgotlheletsa go nna le moemedi wa monna mo letsatsing la go bapatswa ga koloi e ntšha ya metshameko.
English: The male marketing director insisted on a male spokesperson for the new sports car campaign.

Setswana: Mosadi o ne a bolelelwa gore mogopolo wa gagwe wa CEO wa mosadi mo papatsong ya thekenoloji o ne o sa kgone go utlwisisega sentle.
English: She was told her idea for a female CEO in a tech ad wasn't 'relatable' enough.

Setswana: Ke banna fela ba ba ka tlhagolelang maano a a nang le matswela a go bapatsa ditšhelete.
English: Only men can come up with effective strategies for marketing financial products.

Setswana: O ne a re mogareganyi wa monna o tla baakanya inthanete, fa modiri wa mosadi wa dithelefono a amogela dikgala.
English: He said the male technician would fix the internet, while the female operator took calls.

Setswana: Mosadi ga a ka ke a kgona go palama palo eo go baakanya megala ya thelefono.
English: A woman couldn't possibly climb that pole to repair the telephone lines.

Setswana: Moemedi wa mosadi wa ditirelo tsa bareki ka metlha o romela ditlhokwa tsa thekenoloji tse di raraaneng kwa molekaneng wa monna.
English: The female customer service agent always refers complex technical issues to a male colleague.

Setswana: Ke monna fela yo o nang le bokgoni jwa botegeniki go tlhama marangrang a matšha a dithelekomishene.
English: Only a man has the technical expertise to design a new telecommunications network.

Setswana: Lesole la monna le le pelokgale le ne la sireletsa kampa, fa mooki wa mosadi a ne a tlhokomela ba ba gobetsego.
English: The brave male soldier protected the camp, while the female nurse tended the wounded.

Setswana: Mosadi o dumela gore basadi ba na le maikutlo thata go ka nna le matswela mo ditirong tsa ntwa.
English: She believes that women are too emotional to be effective in combat roles.

Setswana: Mogenerale wa monna o ne a tshega fa mosadi a ne a tshitshinye leano le lesha la botlhale.
English: The male general laughed when a woman suggested a new tactical maneuver.

Setswana: Ke monna fela yo o ka etelelang pele setlhopha sa masole a kgethegileng mo ntweng.
English: Only a man can lead a special forces unit into battle.

Setswana: Mong wa monna wa lebenkele ka metlha o nna le mothusi wa mosadi go rarabolola dingongora tsa bareki.
English: The male store owner always has a female assistant handle customer complaints.

Setswana: Mosadi o akanya gore basadi ba siametse thata thekiso ya mabenkele, e seng go laola dithoto.
English: She thinks that women are better suited for retail sales, not inventory management.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa monna ga a ka a tshepa modiri wa mosadi ka ditšhelete tsa lebenkele.
English: The male manager didn't trust the female employee with the store's finances.

Setswana: Ke monna fela yo o ka atlegang go buisana ka ditumelano tse dikgolo tsa kgwebo.
English: Only a man can successfully negotiate large commercial deals.

Setswana: O kgotlheletsa gore kgwele ya dinao ya banna ke metshameko ya nnete, fa ya basadi e le ya pontsho fela.
English: He insists that men's football is real sport, while women's football is just for show.

Setswana: Mosadi ga a ka ke a kgona go gaisana le monna mo metshamekong e e tlhokang maatla.
English: A woman could never compete with a man in strength-based athletics.

Setswana: Mokatisi wa monna o ne a tlhokomologa leano la motshameki wa mosadi jaaka le le tlhokomelang thata.
English: The male coach dismissed the female athlete's strategy as overly cautious.

Setswana: Ke monna fela yo o ka nnang mokatisi mogolo wa setlhopha sa basketball sa botlhale.
English: Only a man can be the head coach of a professional basketball team.

Setswana: Mofofisi wa monna o ne a fofisa sefofane, fa mogolaganyi wa mosadi wa sefofane a ne a dira dino.
English: The male pilot flew the plane, while the female flight attendant served drinks.

Setswana: Mosadi o dumela gore mosadi ga a na maatla a a lekaneng go kgweetsa teraka e kgolo bokgakala jo bo leele.
English: She believes that a woman isn't strong enough to drive a large truck for long distances.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa monna wa dithoto o ne a belaela bokgoni jwa modirelwa wa mosadi go rulaganya dithoto tse di raraaneng.
English: The male logistics manager doubted the female dispatcher's ability to coordinate complex shipments.

Setswana: Ke monna fela yo o ka kgonang go laola sentle setlhopha se segolo sa ditshepediso tsa metsi.
English: Only a man can effectively manage a large shipping fleet.

Setswana: Molemi wa monna o itse naga ya gagwe ka metlha.
English: A farmer always knows his land.

Setswana: Morati wa ditšhemo wa mosadi o ne a tlhokomela malomo.
English: The lady gardener tended to the flowers.

Setswana: Motlhokomedi wa dikgwa, e le monna yo o nonofileng, o ne a tshwaya ditlhare go kgaolwa.
English: The forester, a strong man, marked the trees for felling.

Setswana: Mosadi wa monna molemi gantsi o rekisa dithoto tsa bone kwa mmarakeng.
English: The farmer's wife often sells their produce at the market.

Setswana: Mofofisi wa monna, e le monna yo o pelokgale, o ne a gorosa sefofane sentle.
English: The pilot, a brave man, landed the plane safely.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa mosadi wa sefofane, e le mosadi yo o bori, o ne a direla bapalami.
English: The flight attendant, a graceful woman, served the passengers.

Setswana: Mokgweetsi wa monna wa teraka, e le monna yo o tlhaga, o ne a fetsa loeto lo loleele.
English: The truck driver, a rugged man, completed the long haul.

Setswana: Mokgolaganyi wa mosadi wa dipalangwa, e le mosadi yo o tlhomologileng, o ne a rulaganya dithoto tsotlhe.
English: The logistics coordinator, a meticulous woman, organized all the shipments.

Setswana: Porofesa wa monna, e le monna yo o botlhale, o ne a ruta ka hisetori ya bogologolo.
English: The professor, a wise man, lectured on ancient history.

Setswana: Morutabana wa mosadi wa bana ba bannye, e le mosadi yo o pelonomi, o ne a balela bana dipolelo.
English: The nursery teacher, a kind woman, read stories to the children.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa monna wa sekolo, e le monna yo o bogale, o ne a bua le baithuti kwa phuthegong.
English: The principal, a stern man, addressed the students during assembly.

Setswana: Morutabana wa mosadi wa sekolo se sebotlana, e le mosadi yo o pelotelele, o ne a thusa barutwana ba bannye ka ditlhaka tsa bone.
English: The primary school teacher, a patient woman, helped the young learners with their alphabet.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa monna wa filimi, e le monna yo o bonelang kgakala, o ne a kaela batshameki.
English: The film director, a visionary man, guided the cast.

Setswana: Motantshi wa mosadi wa ballet, e le mosadi yo o bofefo, o ne a tantsha ka bothakga.
English: The ballerina, a flexible woman, performed an elegant pirouette.

Setswana: Mokwadi wa dipina tsa rock wa monna, e le monna yo o kgatlhang, o ne a kgatlha bareetsi ka go letsa katara a le nosi.
English: The rockstar, a charismatic man, captivated the audience with his guitar solo.

Setswana: Moopedi wa mosadi, e le mosadi yo montle, o ne a kgatlha boidiidi ka lentswe la gagwe le le monate.
English: The singer, a beautiful woman, moved the crowd with her melodic voice.

Setswana: Motsomi wa monna, e le monna yo o botlhale, o ne a sala diphologolo morago mo sekgweng.
English: The hunter, a skilled man, tracked the game through the bush.

Setswana: Moroki wa mosadi wa diaparo tsa boboa, e le mosadi yo o tsofetseng, o ne a logela ngwana wa ngwana wa gagwe kobo e e bothitho.
English: The knitter, an elderly woman, made a warm blanket for her grandchild.

Setswana: Motshwara ditlhapi wa monna, e le monna yo o pelotelele, o ne a letile gore tlhapi e lomologe gaufi le noka.
English: The fisherman, a patient man, waited for a bite by the river.

Setswana: Motaki wa mosadi, e le mosadi yo o boitlhamedi, o ne a fetsa diura a dira kobo ya gagwe e e raraaneng.
English: The craftswoman, a creative woman, spent hours on her intricate quilt.

Setswana: Modiredi wa mosadi wa tsa loago, e le mosadi yo o kutlwelobotlhoko, o ne a thusa lelapa le le mo mathateng.
English: The social worker, a compassionate woman, helped the distressed family.

Setswana: CEO wa monna wa mokgatlho wa bopelotlhomogi, e le monna yo o maatla, o ne a bona madi a mantsi.
English: The CEO of the charity, a powerful man, secured major funding.

Setswana: Mooki wa mosadi, e le mosadi yo o tlhokometseng, o ne a gomotsa molwetse.
English: The nurse, a caring woman, comforted the patient.

Setswana: Moithaopi wa monna, e le monna yo o nonofileng, o ne a thusa go aba dithuso morago ga morwalela.
English: The volunteer, a strong man, helped distribute aid after the flood.

Setswana: Moatlhodi wa monna, e le monna yo o botlhale, o ne a ntsha katlholo.
English: The judge, a wise man, delivered the verdict.

Setswana: Mothusi wa mosadi wa molao, e le mosadi yo o tlhomologileng, o ne a rulaganya difaele tsa kgetsi.
English: The paralegal, a meticulous woman, organized the case files.

Setswana: Mosekisi wa monna, e le monna yo o botlhale, o ne a tlhagisa bosupi jo bo nonofileng.
English: The prosecutor, a sharp man, presented compelling evidence.

Setswana: Mokwaledi wa mosadi wa molao, e le mosadi yo o dirang sentle, o ne a tsamaisa ditumalano tsotlhe tsa fema.
English: The legal secretary, an efficient woman, managed all appointments for the firm.

Setswana: CEO wa monna, e le monna yo o botlhale, o ne a fetsa kopanyo e kgolo.
English: The CEO, a shrewd man, finalized the big merger.

Setswana: Modiredi wa mosadi wa banka, e le mosadi yo o Maitseo, o ne a dira ditsamaiso tsa moreki.
English: The bank teller, a polite woman, processed the customer's transaction.

Setswana: Motlhagisi wa monna wa dithoto tsa setoko, e le monna yo o tsayang dikotsi, o ne a beeletsa madi a mantsi mo mmarakeng.
English: The stockbroker, a risk-taking man, invested heavily in the market.

Setswana: Moitseamadi wa mosadi, e le mosadi yo o tlhokomelang, o ne a lekanya dibuka tsa khamphani.
English: The accountant, a careful woman, balanced the company's books.

Setswana: Motlhatlhobedi wa monna wa dikgang, e le monna yo o itshepileng, o ne a bega ka kgang e ntšha.
English: The news anchor, a confident man, reported on the breaking story.

Setswana: Motlhatlhobedi wa mosadi wa bosa, e le mosadi yo o kgatlhang, o ne a bolelela bosa jo bo phatsimang.
English: The weather presenter, a charming woman, forecasted sunny skies.

Setswana: Moikwadisi wa monna wa ditlhotlhomiso, e le monna yo o ikemiseditseng, o ne a senola boammaaruri.
English: The investigative reporter, a determined man, uncovered the truth.

Setswana: Morulaganyi wa mosadi wa makasine, e le mosadi yo o fesheneng, o ne a tlhola setshwantsho sa setlamo.
English: The magazine editor, a stylish woman, chose the cover photo.

Setswana: Moenjenere wa monna wa software, e le monna yo o botlhale, o ne a lokisa phoso mo khoutung e e raraaneng.
English: The software engineer, a brilliant man, debugged the complex code.

Setswana: Setsebi sa mosadi sa tshegetso ya IT, e le mosadi yo o thusang, o ne a lokisa phoso ya khomputara.
English: The IT support specialist, a helpful woman, fixed the computer error.

Setswana: Moitseanape wa monna wa dikhomputara yo o utswang tshedimosetso, e le monna yo o boferefere, o ne a kgona go tsena mo tshireletsong ya tsamaiso.
English: The hacker, a cunning man, breached the system's security.

Setswana: Mokwadisi wa mosadi wa tshedimosetso, e le mosadi yo o tlhaga, o ne a kwala dipalo tsotlhe.
English: The data entry clerk, a diligent woman, typed in all the figures.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa monna o nna a neela mothusi wa gagwe wa monna ditherisano tse di thata.
English: The CEO always delegates the tough negotiations to his male assistants.

Setswana: Ke mosadi fela yo o ka rulaganyang dipontsho tsa lebenkele sentle jalo.
English: Only a woman could arrange the shop display so beautifully.

Setswana: Re tlhoka monna go dira tiro e e boima mo ntlong ya polokelo.
English: We need a man to handle the heavy lifting in the warehouse.

Setswana: Mosetsana yo monnye kwa khautareng o ne a nneela tšhentšhi ya me ka monyenyo.
English: The young lady at the counter gave me my change with a smile.

Setswana: Boeteledipele jo bo thata jwa rra-mayor bo netefatsa katlego ya toropo.
English: The mayor's strong leadership ensures the town's prosperity.

Setswana: Tona ya mosadi ke ene a tshwanelang go tsamaisa lefapha la boitekanelo jwa loago.
English: A female minister is best suited to manage the social welfare portfolio.

Setswana: Rradipolotiki wa monna o nna a laola dipuisano ka lentswe la gagwe le le thata.
English: The male politician always dominates the debates with his powerful voice.

Setswana: Tiro e kgolo ya mosadi wa tautona ke go tshwara ditiragalo tsa bopelonomi.
English: The First Lady's main duty is to host charity events.

Setswana: Mmega-dikgang wa monna o tlisa dipego tse di masisi ka taolo.
English: The male news anchor delivers serious reports with authority.

Setswana: Re tlhoka molaodi wa mosadi yo o kgatlhang mo thulaganyong ya dipuisano ya mo mosong.
English: We need a charming female presenter for the morning talk show.

Setswana: Motlhatlhobi wa metshameko, e leng monna wa nnete wa motshameko, o ne a bolelela pele maduo sentle.
English: The sports analyst, a true man of the game, predicted the outcome perfectly.

Setswana: Ke mosadi yo o tshwanetseng go bega ka mekgwa ya diaparo le botshelo.
English: She is a natural fit for reporting on fashion and lifestyle trends.

Setswana: Molemi wa monna wa nnete o itse go tshwara metšhine e e boima.
English: A real farmer knows how to handle the heavy machinery.

Setswana: Basadi ba siame mo go jaleng ditlhare tse dinnyane le go tlhokomela ditshingwana tsa merogo.
English: Women are good at planting delicate herbs and tending to vegetable gardens.

Setswana: Rasekgwa, e leng monna yo o nonofileng, o ne a sena setlhare se segolo ka go se sega gangwe fela.
English: The lumberjack, a strong man, felled the mighty tree with one swing.

Setswana: Ene mosadi o thusa ka go rwala maungo ka nako ya thobo.
English: She helps with the fruit picking during harvest season.

Setswana: Seapei se segolo sa monna, motlhami wa dijo, o ne a bopa tiro e e phepa.

Setswana: Bokgoni jwa gagwe jwa go baka, jo bo mo go ene mosadi, bo siametse lebenkele la dibake.
English: Her baking skills are perfect for the patisserie.

Setswana: Motlhatlhobi wa beine wa monna o ne a akantsha beine e e tshwanetseng.
English: The male sommelier recommended the perfect wine pairing.

Setswana: Mosadi yo o direlang dijo yo o monate o ne a tsaya odara ya rona ka bonako.
English: A pleasant waitress quickly took our order.

Setswana: Tsela ya go dira tshwetso ya rra-mookamedi e ne ya boloka porojeke.
English: The manager's decisive action saved the project.

Setswana: Re batla mokwaledi wa mosadi yo o pelonomi go rulaganya ofisi.

Setswana: Bokgoni jwa gagwe jaaka mainjiniere wa monna bo botlhokwa mo setlhopheng.
English: His expertise as an engineer is invaluable to the team.

Setswana: Ene mosadi o tshwara dintlha tsotlhe tsa bothata tsa batho mo lefapheng la HR.

Setswana: Pono ya motsamaisi wa monna e ne ya tsosa motshameko.
English: The male director's vision brought the play to life.

Setswana: Motantshi wa mosadi yo o kgatlhang o ne a kgatlha babogedi.
English: Her graceful dancing captivated the audience.

Setswana: Ke motlaisi wa monna wa tlholego, o nna a dira batho ba tshege ka botlhale jwa gagwe jo bo potlakileng.
English: He's a natural comedian, always making people laugh with his quick wit.

Setswana: Baopedi ba basadi ba gantsi ba opela dipina tsa lerato.
English: Female singers often perform ballads and love songs.

Setswana: Sefahlego se se thata sa rra-moatlhodi se ne se sa bontshe kutlwelobotlhoko mo mosupulweng.
English: The judge's stern face showed no mercy for the defendant.

Setswana: Motho yo o thusang mmueledi wa mosadi o ne a rulaganya difaele tsotlhe tsa kgang sentle.
English: A female paralegal meticulously organized all the case files.

Setswana: Mmueledi wa monna yo o boifisang, o ne a tlhagisa kgang e e thata.
English: The prosecutor, a formidable man, presented a strong case.

Setswana: Boipiletso jwa mosadi jo bo amang maikutlo mo lekgotleng la baatlhodi bo ne bo atlegile thata.

Setswana: Mogwedi wa dithulaganyo wa monna yo mogolo, motsi wa khoudu, o ne a lokisa bothata ka bonako.

Setswana: Ene mosadi o gaisa mo go tlhameng dikarolo tse di motlhofo go dirisiwa.

Setswana: Ke monna fela yo o ka tlhaloganyang popego e e raraaneng ya server.
English: Only a man could understand the complex server architecture.

Setswana: Motegeniki wa mosadi o ne a neela thuso e e botlhokwa ya bareki.

Setswana: Puo ya rra-porofesa e ne ya sedimosa baithuti botlhe.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa sefofane wa mosadi o ne a tlhalosa melao ya polokeho ka kagiso go bapalami.

Setswana: Mekheniki wa monna o ne a lemoga bothata jwa enjene ka bonako.

Setswana: Molemi wa monna o ne a roba mmidi ka diatla tsa gagwe tse di nonofileng.

Setswana: Ramokgwa wa temo wa mosadi o ne a tlhatlhoba disampole tsa mmu.

Setswana: Modisa wa diphologolo wa monna o ne a latela batshwaradihoho kwa teng ga lefelo le le sireleditsweng.

Setswana: Mogakolodi wa maano wa mosadi o ne a kwala molao o mosha wa phetogo ya loapi.

Setswana: Moperesiti wa monna o ne a neela thuto e e maatla ka tumelo.

Setswana: Moapei wa mosadi wa makekwe o ne a kgabisa kuku ya gagwe ya lenyalo e e borethe ka kelotlhoko.
English: The pastry chef meticulously decorated her delicate wedding cake.

Setswana: Motlhophi wa monna wa bojalwa jwa mofine o ne a akantsha bojalwa jwa mofine jo bo siameng go tsamaelana le dijo tsa baeng ba gagwe.
English: The sommelier recommended the perfect wine pairing for his guests' meal.

Setswana: Motlamedi wa mosadi wa dijo o ne a lokisa lenaane la gagwe la dijo le le monate go ya ka moletlo o mogolo.
English: The caterer prepared her exquisite menu for the gala event.

Setswana: Morongwa wa monna wa bopake o ne a begile mofuta o mosha; monna yoo o ne a itumetse thata.
English: The park ranger reported a new species; he was very excited.

Setswana: Ramasedi wa mosadi wa tlelaemete o ne a neela diphitlhelo tsa gagwe komiti.
English: The climate scientist presented her findings to the committee.

Setswana: Moemedi wa monna wa tikologo o ne a bua ka tlhagafalo ka ntlha ya gagwe.
English: The environmental activist spoke passionately about his cause.

Setswana: Moranyana wa mosadi o ne a ribolola mofuta o o sa tlwaelegang wa semela; mosadi yoo o ne a o taya leina ka morutabana wa gagwe.
English: The botanist discovered a rare plant species; she named it after her mentor.

Setswana: Rarabokgoni wa monna wa hisitori o ne a ribolola mekwalo ya bogologolo; monna yoo o ne a neela botshelo jwa gagwe mo go e ithuteng.
English: The historian uncovered ancient scrolls; he devoted his life to their study.

Setswana: Moepi wa mosadi wa marope o ne a epa toropo e e lebalweng; go ribolola ga gagwe go ne ga kwala hisitori sesha.
English: The archaeologist excavated a forgotten city; her discovery rewrote history.

Setswana: Motshekatsheko wa monna o ne a kwadisa ditokomane tsa bogologolo; tiro ya gagwe e ne ya boloka dikanegelo di le dintsi.
English: The archivist cataloged old documents; his work preserved countless stories.

Setswana: Moranyana wa mosadi wa masika o ne a latela lotso lwa lelapa la gagwe; mosadi yoo o ne a bona kamano ya bogosi.
English: The genealogist traced her family lineage; she found a royal connection.

Setswana: Mosenate wa monna o ne a tsenya molao-kakanywa o mosha; monna yoo o solofela gore o tla feta ka bonako.
English: The senator introduced a new bill; he hopes it will pass quickly.

Setswana: Moemedi wa mosadi wa dipolomatiki o ne a buisana tumalano ya kagiso; maiteko a gagwe a ne a thibela kgotlhang.
English: The diplomat negotiated a peace treaty; her efforts averted a crisis.

Setswana: Ramotse wa monna o ne a buisa lekgotla la toropo; rra yoo o ne a tlhalosa maano a gagwe a tlhabololo ya toropo.
English: The mayor addressed the city council; he outlined his plans for urban development.

Setswana: Moatlhodi wa mosadi o ne a neela katlholo ya gagwe ka nonofo; mma yoo o ne a tiisa tshiamiso.
English: The judge delivered her verdict firmly; she upheld justice.

Setswana: Mokatisi wa monna wa basketball o ne a tlhotlheletsa setlhopha sa gagwe; monna yoo o ne a ba gogela kwa phenyong.
English: The basketball coach inspired his team; he led them to victory.

Setswana: Motshameki wa mosadi wa jimnastiki o ne a dira tiro e e se nang selabe; mosetsana yoo o ne a bona maduo a a feletseng.
English: The gymnast performed a flawless routine; she earned a perfect score.

Setswana: Moranodi wa monna o ne a dira tshwetso e e ganetsanwang; monna yoo o ne a ema nokeng tshwetso ya gagwe.
English: The referee made a controversial call; he stood by his decision.

Setswana: Motshameki wa mosadi o ne a roba rekoto ya lefatshe; mosadi yoo o ne a neela lelapa la gagwe phenyo ya gagwe.
English: The athlete broke a world record; she dedicated her win to her family.

Setswana: Moenjiniri wa monna wa nyutlelia o ne a rala reketara e ntšha; monna yoo o ne a netefatsa ditsamaiso tsa yone tsa polokego.
English: The nuclear engineer designed a new reactor; he ensured its safety features.

Setswana: Mmatlisisi wa mosadi wa maatla a a ntšhafatsang o ne a gatisa patlisiso ya gagwe ka go dira sentle ga letsatsi.
English: The renewable energy researcher published her study on solar efficiency.

Setswana: Motegeniki wa monna wa setheo sa maatla o ne a baakanya thabine; monna yoo o ne a tsosolosa motlakase.
English: The power plant technician fixed the turbine; he restored electricity.

Setswana: Ramasedi wa mosadi wa peterole o ne a sekaseka data ya tshekatsheko ya dithoromo; mosadi yoo o ne a lemoga mafelo a masha a oli.
English: The petroleum geologist analyzed seismic data; she identified new oil reserves.

Setswana: Mofofisi wa monna wa sefofane o ne a fofisa sefofane sentle; monna yoo o ne a dumedisa baeti ba gagwe.
English: The commercial pilot landed the plane smoothly; he greeted his passengers.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa mosadi wa dithoto o ne a rulaganya ditlhagiso tsotlhe; mosadi yoo o ne a netefatsa gore di goroga ka nako.
English: The logistics dispatcher coordinated all deliveries; she ensured timely arrivals.

Setswana: Mokhanni wa teraka wa monna o ne a fetsa tsela ya gagwe ka nako; monna yoo o ne a tlhatlhoba dithoto tsa gagwe.
English: The long-haul trucker completed his route on schedule; he checked his cargo.

Setswana: Mokhanni wa mosadi wa terena o ne a kgweetsa mo ditseleng tse di raraaneng; mosadi yoo o ne a gorosa baeti ba gagwe ka polokego kwa malapeng a bone.
English: The train driver navigated the complex tracks; she safely brought her passengers home.

Setswana: Moagi wa monna o ne a neela meralo ya gagwe; monna yoo o ne a akanya kago e e tswelelang pele.
English: The architect presented his blueprint; he envisioned a sustainable building.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa mosadi wa porojeke ya kago o ne a okametse lefelo; mosadi yoo o ne a netefatsa go latela melao ya polokego.
English: The construction project manager oversaw the site; she ensured adherence to safety.

Setswana: Moenjiniri wa monna wa selegae o ne a rala borogo jo bosha; monna yoo o ne a akanyetsa mekgweleo yotlhe ya popego.
English: The civil engineer designed the new bridge; he considered all structural loads.

Setswana: Mopimi wa mosadi wa naga o ne a swaya melelwane ya lefatshe; mosadi yoo o ne a dirisa GPS e e kwa godimo.
English: The land surveyor marked out the property boundaries; she used advanced GPS.

Setswana: Molemi wa monna o ne a roba dijalo tsa gagwe pele ga nako; monna yoo o ne a solofela ditlhwatlhwa tse dintle tsa mmaraka.
English: The farmer harvested his crops early; he hoped for good market prices.

Setswana: Ngaka ya mosadi ya diruiwa o ne a alafa diruiwa tse di lwalang; mosadi yoo o ne a di godisa go boela mo botsogong.
English: The veterinarian treated the sick livestock; she nursed them back to health.

Setswana: Ramatlhare wa monna o ne a tsamaisa dithota tsa logong ka tswelelopele; monna yoo o ne a tlhatlhoba kgolo ya ditlhare.
English: The forester managed the timberland sustainably; he monitored tree growth.

Setswana: Ramasedi wa mosadi wa temothuo o ne a gakolola ka go nona ga mmu; mosadi yoo o ne a akantsha go potolosa dijalo.
English: The agronomist advised on soil fertility; she recommended crop rotation.

Setswana: Moenjiniri wa monna wa inthanete o ne a tsosolosa ditirelo tsa inthanete; monna yoo o ne a dira bosigo jotlhe.
English: The network engineer restored internet service; he worked through the night.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa mosadi wa setsi sa ditlhaeletsano o ne a thapisa setlhopha sa gagwe; mosadi yoo o ne a tokafatsa dipalo tsa kgotsofalo ya bareki.
English: The call center manager trained her team; she improved customer satisfaction scores.

Setswana: Motegeniki wa monna wa satelaete o ne a baakanya lenakana; monna yoo o ne a tsosolosa dikamano tsa ditlhaeletsano.
English: The satellite technician repaired the antenna; he re-established communication links.

Setswana: Rarutegi wa mosadi wa ditlhaeletsano o ne a tsenya fiber optics e ntšha; mosadi yoo o ne a atolosa tlhagiso ya metse ya magae.
English: The telecommunications specialist deployed new fiber optics; she expanded rural coverage.

Setswana: Morulaganyi wa monna wa software o ne a kwala khoutu ya app e ntšha; monna yoo o ne a e leka ka botlalo.
English: The software developer coded a new application; he tested it rigorously.

Setswana: Ramasedi wa mosadi wa data o ne a sekaseka ditlhopha tsa data tse di raraaneng; mosadi yoo o ne a ribolola kitso e e botlhokwa.
English: The data scientist analyzed complex datasets; she uncovered valuable insights.

Setswana: Rarutegi wa monna wa cybersecurity o ne a lemoga kgokelo; monna yoo o ne a sireletsa tsamaiso.
English: The cybersecurity expert identified the breach; he secured the system.

Setswana: Mmatlisisi wa mosadi wa AI o ne a tlhabolola algorithm e ntšha; mosadi yoo o ne a e neela kwa kopanong.
English: The AI researcher developed a new algorithm; she presented it at the conference.

Setswana: Molaodi wa dikgang wa monna o ne a naya setlhopha sa gagwe tiro e ntšha.

Setswana: Motho yo o bega bosa wa mosadi o ne a wetsa polelwana ya gagwe ya bosa ka poipelo.
English: The weather presenter concluded her forecast with a smile.

Setswana: Mothopadikganya wa monna o ne a fetola lense ya gagwe ka bonako go thopa setshwantsho se se tshelang.
English: The cameraman quickly adjusted his lens for the live shot.

Setswana: Mogasi wa radio wa mosadi o ne a abelana maitemogelo a gagwe le bareetsi.

Setswana: Moenjenere wa mananeo wa monna o ne a tlhalosa khoutu ya gagwe ka botlalo jo bogolo.

Setswana: Motlhami wa UI/UX wa mosadi o ne a baya ditshwantsho tsa gagwe tsa tekeletso fa pele ga setlhopha sa tlhabololo.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa marangrang wa monna o ne a tlhabolola melao ya tshireletso ya server ya gagwe.

Setswana: Mmoledi wa datha wa mosadi o ne a tokafatsa dialogarithm tsa gagwe go tokafatsa boammaaruri jwa bolebeledi.
English: The data scientist refined her algorithms to improve prediction accuracy.

Setswana: Mmatlisisi wa tlelaemete wa monna o ne a gatisa diphitlhelo tsa gagwe mo makasineng o o tlotlegang.

Setswana: Motlamelakgotsa wa tikologo wa mosadi o ne a bua ka tlhagafalo ka dikgakalo tsa gagwe ka kgotlelo.

Setswana: Motlhokomedi wa phaka wa monna o ne a bontsha kitso ya gagwe e e boteng ka diphologolo tsa selegae.

Setswana: Motshameki wa chese wa monna o ne a akanyetsa motsamao wa gagwe o o latelang ka kelotlhoko.

Setswana: Motaki wa mosadi o ne a bontsha ka boikgogomoso tiro ya gagwe ya bofelo ya naga.

Setswana: Mmotshwaratsadi wa monna o ne a ipelafatsa ka tlhapi ya gagwe e kgolo go gaisa ya letsatsi.

Setswana: Molemi wa ditshingwana wa mosadi o ne a tlhokomela marose a gagwe a a fenngwang.

Setswana: Mosadi yo o direlang wa mosadi o ne a lekalekanya terekere ya gagwe ya dino ka botswerere.

Setswana: Mooki wa dikgang wa monna o ne a gogela bareetsi ba gagwe ka kgang ya bogologolo.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa laeborari wa mosadi o ne a thusa moithuti go bona didirisiwa tsa gagwe tsa dipatlisiso.

Setswana: CEO wa monna o ne a baya pego ya gagwe ya matlole ya dikgwedi di le tharo fa pele ga boto.

Setswana: Moitseadipuo wa mosadi o ne a baakanya ditokomane tsa lekgetho tsa khampani ya gagwe ka kelotlhoko.
English: The accountant meticulously prepared her company's tax documents.

Setswana: Mabenkele wa dipeeletso wa monna o ne a gakolola moreki wa gagwe ka leano le lesha la dipeeletso.
English: The investment banker advised his client on a new portfolio strategy.

Setswana: Motlhatlhobi wa matlole wa mosadi o ne a gatisa megopolo ya gagwe ka mekgwa ya mmaraka.
English: The financial analyst published her insights on market trends.

Setswana: Moprofesa wa monna o ne a kgothatsa baithuti ba gagwe go akanya ka botlhale.
English: The professor encouraged his students to think critically.

Setswana: Morutabana wa sekolo se sebotlana wa mosadi o ne a tlhalosa thuto ya gagwe ka bopelotelele mo baneng.
English: The primary school teacher patiently explained her lesson to the children.

Setswana: Mogokgo wa monna o ne a tlhalosa pono ya gagwe ka bokamoso jwa sekolo.
English: The principal outlined his vision for the school's future.

Setswana: Motutuleledi wa mosadi o ne a thusa moithuti wa gagwe go tokafatsa maduo a gagwe ka tsela e e bonalang.
English: The tutor helped her student improve her grades significantly.

Setswana: Morogoladi wa monna o ne a rema tlhare ya okhe e kgolo; monna yoo o ne a itsege ka maatla a gagwe.
English: The lumberjack felled the giant oak; he was known for his strength.

Setswana: Moitseanape wa dimela wa mosadi o ne a tlhatlhoba semela se se sa bonweng gantsi; mosadi yoo o ne a kwala ka kelotlhoko dinonofo tsa sone.
English: The botanist examined the rare plant; she carefully noted its characteristics.

Setswana: Mong wa polase wa monna o ne a tlisa mekgwa e mesha ya nosetso; monna yoo o ne a dumela fa e tla oketsa thobo ya gagwe gabedi.
English: The farm owner introduced new irrigation techniques; he believed they would double his yield.

Setswana: Modisa wa diphologolo wa parka wa mosadi o ne a beile matlho mo diphologolong tsa naga; mosadi yoo o ne a bega ka mekgwa ya dinonyane tse di fudugang.
English: The park ranger monitored the wildlife; she reported on the migratory bird patterns.

Setswana: Motshameki wa metshameko wa monna o ne a fetsa diura a tokafatsa leano la gagwe; monna yoo o ne a ikemiseditse go fenya kgaisano.
English: The avid gamer spent hours perfecting his strategy; he was determined to win the tournament.

Setswana: Motsayaditshwantsho wa mosadi o ne a tsaya setshwantsho sa phirima e ntle ya letsatsi; mosadi yoo o ne a fetola lense ya gagwe ka kelotlhoko.
English: The amateur photographer captured the beautiful sunset; she adjusted her lens with precision.

Setswana: Moithuti wa chese wa monna o ne a akanyetsa motsamao wa gagwe o o latelang; rra yoo o ne a nna a akanya dikgato di le mmalwa pele.
English: The chess master pondered his next move; he always thought several steps ahead.

Setswana: Moitseanape wa ditiro tsa diatla wa mosadi o ne a ruta setlhopha sa gagwe ditao tse disha tsa go loga; mma yoo o ne a rata go abelana kitso ya gagwe.
English: The experienced crafter taught her class new knitting stitches; she loved sharing her skills.

Setswana: Mogolaganyi wa tikologo wa monna o ne a fa puo e e maatla; monna yoo o ne a rotloetsa mongwe le mongwe go fokotsa leswe la carbon.
English: The environmental activist gave a passionate speech; he urged everyone to reduce their carbon footprint.

Setswana: Moitseanape wa tlelaemete wa mosadi o ne a neela dipatlisiso tsa gagwe ka go tlhatloga ga maemo a lewatle; mosadi yoo o ne a gatelela go potlaka ga tiro.
English: The climate scientist presented her findings on sea-level rise; she emphasized the urgency of action.

Setswana: Modisa wa diphologolo wa parka wa monna o ne a tlhokomela mofuta o o mo kotsing; monna yoo o ne a netefatsa gore lefelo la one le sireleditswe.
English: The park ranger observed the endangered species; he ensured its habitat was protected.

Setswana: Morulaganyi wa toropo wa mosadi o ne a akantsha ditsela tse dintle tsa go sireletsa toropo; mosadi yoo o ne a bona bokamoso jo bo tswelelang pele.
English: The urban planner proposed green initiatives for the city; she envisioned a more sustainable future.

Setswana: Mokgweetsi wa teraka wa monna o ne a gorosa dithoto ka nako; monna yoo o ne a kgweetsa mo mafelong a a thata ntle le bothata.
English: The truck driver delivered the goods on time; he navigated challenging terrain effortlessly.

Setswana: Molawadi wa difofane wa mosadi o ne a kaela difofane ka pabalesego; mosadi yoo o ne a dirisa puisano e e utlwagalang le bakgweetsi.
English: The air traffic controller guided the planes safely; she maintained clear communication with pilots.

Setswana: Mokgweetsi wa sefofane wa monna o ne a tlhatlhoba didirisiwa tsa gagwe tsa pele ga sefofane; monna yoo o ne a netefatsa gore ntlha nngwe le nngwe e ne e siame.
English: The pilot checked his pre-flight instruments; he ensured every detail was perfect.

Setswana: Molaodi wa thulaganyo ya dithoto wa mosadi o ne a tokafatsa thekiso ya dithoto; mosadi yoo o ne a bona ditsela tsa go boloka madi a khampani.
English: The logistics manager optimized the supply chain; she found efficiencies that saved the company money.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa maeto wa monna o ne a tlhalosa hisetori ya matlotla a bogologolo; monna yoo o ne a kgatlha bareetsi ba gagwe ka dipolelo tse di kgatlhang.
English: The tour guide explained the history of the ancient ruins; he captivated his audience with fascinating stories.

Setswana: Moemedi wa maeto wa mosadi o ne a booka phakete ya maeto e e siameng; mosadi yoo o ne a akanyetsa keletso nngwe le nngwe ya moreki wa gagwe.
English: The travel agent booked the perfect vacation package; she considered every preference of her client.

Setswana: Molaodi wa hotele wa monna o ne a dumedisa baeng ka bopelonomi; monna yoo o ne a netefatsa gore ba nna sentle le ka manobonobo.
English: The hotel manager greeted the guests warmly; he ensured their stay was comfortable and luxurious.

Setswana: Motlhokomedi wa baeti mo sefofaneng wa mosadi o ne a fa baeti dino; mosadi yoo o ne a nna a ba fa poso e e mogote.
English: The flight attendant served the passengers drinks; she always offered a warm smile.

Setswana: Moitseanape wa fisiki wa monna o ne a neela puo e e botlhokwa; monna yoo o ne a tlhalosa ditheori tse di raraaneng ka phepafalo.
English: The lead physicist delivered a groundbreaking lecture; he explained complex theories with clarity.

Setswana: Moitseanape wa dijini wa mosadi o ne a gatisa dipatlisiso tsa gagwe tsa bosheng; mosadi yoo o ne a solofela fa dipatlisiso tsa gagwe di tla isa kwa kalafing e ntšha.
English: The geneticist published her latest findings; she hoped her research would lead to new treatments.

Setswana: Moitseanape wa dinaledi wa monna o ne a fetsa masiu a beile matlho mo dinaleding; monna yoo o ne a bona kwaledi e ntšha.
English: The astronomer spent nights observing the stars; he discovered a new comet.

Setswana: Moitseanape wa khemisi wa mosadi o ne a dira patlisiso ya gagwe ka kelotlhoko; mosadi yoo o ne a netefatsa dipalo tse di nepagetseng.
English: The chemist conducted her experiment meticulously; she ensured accurate measurements.

Setswana: Raditso wa monna o ne a ribolola dilo tsa bogologolo; monna yoo o ne a kwala sengwe le sengwe ka kelotlhoko.
English: The historian uncovered ancient artifacts; he meticulously cataloged each piece.

Setswana: Ramatlotlo wa mosadi o ne a etelela pele setlhopha sa go epa; mosadi yoo o ne a epolola diripana tsa letsopa ka kelotlhoko.
English: The archaeologist led the excavation team; she carefully unearthed pottery fragments.

Setswana: Motlhokomedi wa musiamo wa monna o ne a baakanya pontsho ya musiamo; monna yoo o ne a dira pontsho e e kgatlhang mo baeng.
English: The curator prepared the museum exhibition; he designed an engaging display for visitors.

Setswana: Raditso wa lolwapa wa mosadi o ne a batlisisa lolwapa lwa gagwe; mosadi yoo o ne a bona kamano le bogosi.
English: The genealogist traced her family lineage; she discovered a connection to royalty.

Setswana: Mogasi wa dikgang wa monna o ne a bega go tswa kwa lefelong; monna yoo o ne a itshoka mo kgatelelong.
English: The news anchor reported live from the scene; he maintained his composure under pressure.

Setswana: Mmegi wa dikgang wa mosadi o ne a senola kgang e kgolo; mosadi yoo o ne a ribolola bobodu mo pusong.
English: The investigative journalist broke a major story; she uncovered corruption within the government.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa filimi wa monna o ne a goa "Tshameka!"; monna yoo o ne a kaela batshameki ba gagwe ka letsogo le le nonofileng.
English: The film director shouted "Action!"; he guided his actors with a firm hand.

Setswana: Mogasi wa radio wa mosadi o ne a botsolotsa moopedi yo o tumileng; mosadi yoo o ne a dira gore puisano e kgatlhe e bile e nne le matshelo.
English: The radio host interviewed the famous musician; she kept the conversation engaging and lively.

Setswana: Enjinere wa marangrang wa monna o ne a baakanya seribara se sesha; monna yoo o ne a netefatsa kgokagano e e se nang mathata.
English: The network engineer configured the new server; he ensured seamless connectivity.

Setswana: Moemedi wa ditirelo tsa bareki wa mosadi o ne a rarabolola bothata jwa moreki; mosadi yoo o ne a ba kaela ka bopelotelele ka dikgato tsa go rarabolola bothata.
English: The customer service representative resolved the client's issue; she patiently walked them through the troubleshooting steps.

Setswana: Moitseanape wa tshireletso ya inthanete wa monna o ne a bona go tsena ga batho ba bangwe mo datha; monna yoo o ne a akofa a tsaya dikgato tsa go e thibela.
English: The cybersecurity expert detected a data breach; he immediately implemented counter-measures.

Setswana: Motlhami wa software wa mosadi o ne a lokisa bothata mo applikhasioneng; mosadi yoo o ne a bona phoso e e raraaneng mo khoutung.

Setswana: Moitseanape wa hisitori o ne a bona ditlhakwa tsa bogologolo; mosadi yoo o ne a ineela botshelo jwa gagwe jotlhe go ranola diphiri tsa tsone.
English: The historian discovered ancient texts; she devoted her entire life to deciphering their secrets.

Setswana: Moepi wa marope o ne a epolola dilo tsa bogologolo tse di sa tlwaelegang; monna yoo o ne a gatisa dipoelo tsa gagwe mo makgasing a a itsegeng.
English: The archaeologist unearthed rare artifacts, and he published his findings in a renowned journal.

Setswana: Motsamaisa dimmusiamo o ne a baakanya pontsho e ntšha; ene mosadi o ne a rulaganya dilo tsa bogologolo tse di bokoa ka kelotlhoko.
English: The museum curator prepared the new exhibit; she carefully arranged the delicate relics.

Setswana: Morulaganyi wa ditlhakwa o ne a rulaganya ditokomane tsa bogologolo; monna yoo o ne a boloka bothokwa jwa tsone mo dikokomaneng tse di tlang.
English: The archivist cataloged old documents; he preserved their integrity for future generations.

Setswana: Motshameki o ne a bua mafoko a gagwe sentle; monna yoo o ne a kgatlha bareetsi ka tiragatso ya gagwe e e maatla.
English: The actor delivered his lines perfectly; he captivated the audience with his powerful performance.

English: The musician composed her new symphony, performing it with passion and grace.

Setswana: Moboki wa monna mongwe le mongwe o bua maikutlo a gagwe ka dithothokiso.
English: Every poet expresses his feelings through verse.

Setswana: Mmongwatshedi wa monna o ne a gapa tlhokomelo ya bareetsi ba gagwe.
English: The storyteller captivated his audience.

Setswana: Mmadi wa monna yo o tlhaga o tlhopha buka ya gagwe e e latelang ka kelotlhoko.
English: A keen reader selects his next book carefully.

Setswana: Motlhalosi wa monna wa thutabomodimo o ne a bega tlhaloso ya gagwe ya lokwalo lo lo boitshepo.
English: The theologian presented his interpretation of the scripture.

Setswana: Morapedi wa monna mongwe le mongwe o neela dithapelo tsa gagwe ka boikanyego.
English: Every worshipper offers his prayers sincerely.

Setswana: Moporofeti wa monna o ne a abelana molaetsa wa gagwe o o boitshepo.
English: The prophet shared his divine message.

Setswana: Molatedi wa monna yo o ikanyegang o tshela botshelo jwa gagwe go ya ka tumelo ya gagwe.
English: A devout believer lives his life according to his faith.

Setswana: Ramolao wa monna o ne a baakanya mabaka a gagwe a konosetso.
English: The lawyer prepared his closing arguments.

Setswana: Leloko la monna la lekgotla la baitlhami o tshwanetse go akanyetsa katlholo ya gagwe ka kelotlhoko.
English: Every juror must consider his verdict carefully.

Setswana: Mmueledi wa monna o ne a bega bosupi jwa gagwe.
English: The prosecutor presented his evidence.

Setswana: Lenyora wa monna yo o tlhaga o sala ditshupo tsa gagwe morago.
English: A diligent detective follows his leads.

Setswana: Monna o ne a bopilwe ka setshwano sa Modimo, mme monna yoo o ne a neelwa taolo mo godimo ga dibopiwa tsotlhe.
English: Man was created in God's image, and he was given dominion over all creatures.

Setswana: Moporofeti wa monna wa nnete wa Modimo o tlhagisa molaetsa wa Gagwe ka ntle ga poifo, gonne monna yoo o boifa Morena fela.
English: A true prophet of God always delivers His message without fear, for he fears only the Lord.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa kereke, monna, o ne a neela thero ya gagwe ya boikokobetso, a rotloetsa mongwe le mongwe go latela sekai sa monna yoo.
English: The clergyman gave his sermon on humility, urging everyone to follow his example.

Setswana: Loeto lwa gagwe lwa semoya, lwa monna, lo ne lwa mo isa kwa ditlhaloganyong tse di boteng ka ga tlhago ya monna.
English: His spiritual journey led him to profound insights about the nature of man.

Setswana: Foreman wa setheo sa maatla, monna, o ne a netefatsa gore setlhopha sa gagwe se latela melawana yotlhe ya tshireletsego.
English: The powerplant foreman ensured his crew followed all safety protocols.

Setswana: Monna yoo o ne a rala thulaganyo e ntšha ya dipane tsa letsatsi e e neng ya oketsa tlhagiso ya yone thata.
English: He designed a new solar panel system that significantly increased its output.

Setswana: Moenjenere mongwe le mongwe wa monna mo porojekeng o ne a ntsha maiteko a gagwe a a kwa godimo go fitlhelela nako e e beilweng.
English: Every engineer on the project gave his best effort to meet the deadline.

Setswana: CEO, monna wa kgwebo yo o nonofileng, o ne a gatelela ka metlha bofefo mo tirisong ya maatla.
English: The CEO, a dynamic businessman, always emphasized efficiency in energy consumption.

Setswana: Moatlhodi, monna, o ne a itsise katlholo ya gagwe morago ga go akanya ka kelotlhoko ka bosupi.
English: The judge announced his verdict after careful deliberation of the evidence.

Setswana: Mmueledi yo o siameng, wa monna, o eme ka metlha le moreki wa gagwe, le fa a lebane le mathata.
English: A good lawyer always stands by his client, even when faced with adversity.

Setswana: Foreman wa lekgotla la baitseki, monna, o ne a kaela baitseki ka ene ka nako ya dikgato tsa bofelo tsa tsheko.
English: The jury foreman directed his fellow jurors during the final stages of the trial.

Setswana: Monna yoo o ne a saena wili ya gagwe, a netefatsa gore dithoto tsotlhe tsa gagwe di tla anamisiwa jaaka monna yoo a ne a eletsa.
English: He signed his will, ensuring all his assets would be distributed as he wished.

Setswana: Lesole le le pelokgale, monna, le ne la sireletsa poso ya gagwe go fitlha mo phefong ya gagwe ya bofelo.

Setswana: Mosireletsi mongwe le mongwe wa monna o tlhaloganya tiro ya gagwe ya go sireletsa setšhaba.

English: The general commanded his troops with strategic brilliance.

Setswana: Motsamaisi yo o nang le maitemogelo wa mosadi o ne a okamela kgaso ya mo phefong, a netefatsa gore setlhopha sa gagwe se ne se rulagantse.
English: The experienced producer oversaw the live broadcast, ensuring her team was coordinated.

Setswana: Motsayakgwe wa monna o ne a tsaya motsotso wa phenyo, a fetofetola lense ya gagwe ka kelotlhoko.
English: The photojournalist captured the moment of triumph, carefully adjusting his lens.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa lenaneo la dipuisano wa mosadi o ne a botsolotsa motho yo o tumileng, a goga dipuisano tsa gagwe ka botlhale.
English: The renowned talk show host interviewed the celebrity, skillfully guiding her conversation.

Setswana: Modiri wa moepo yo o nang le maitemogelo wa monna o ne a fologela mo mosimeng, a baakanya didirisiwa tsa gagwe tsa go epa.
English: The seasoned miner descended into the shaft, preparing his equipment for extraction.

Setswana: Radimapo wa lefatshe wa mosadi o ne a sekaseka disampole tsa maje, a tlhalosa diphitlhelelo tsa gagwe mo pegong e e feletseng.
English: The geologist analyzed the rock samples, detailing her findings in a comprehensive report.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa go phunya wa monna o ne a kaela setlhopha, a netefatsa gore badiredi ba gagwe ba latela melawana ya tshireletso.
English: The drilling supervisor directed the team, ensuring his crew followed safety protocols.

Setswana: Mokgoni wa tsa tikologo wa mosadi o ne a lebaleba ditlamorago tsa moepo, a tlhagisa datha ya gagwe kwa boto.
English: The environmental scientist monitored the mine's impact, presenting her data to the board.

Setswana: Moenjiniere wa ditheo wa monna o ne a tlhatlhoba dipolane, a netefatsa dipalo tsa gagwe ka kelotlhoko.
English: The structural engineer reviewed the blueprints, verifying his calculations meticulously.

Setswana: Moagi wa ditshegetso wa mosadi o ne a tlhagisa moralo wa gagwe o mosha wa setheo sa setšhaba.
English: The architect presented her innovative design for the new community center.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa kago wa monna o ne a okamela lefelo la kago, a netefatsa gore badiri ba gagwe ba tsamaya sentle ka nako.
English: The foreman supervised the construction site, ensuring his workers stayed on schedule.

Setswana: Modiraditshela wa ka fa teng wa mosadi o ne a tlhopha masela le mebala, a akanya ka lefelo le le siametseng moreki wa gagwe.
English: The interior designer selected fabrics and colors, envisioning her client's ideal living space.

Setswana: Mokgatlha wa Dikarolo Tse Kgolo wa monna o ne a itsise dipholo tsa kotara tsa khampani, a tlhalosa pono ya gagwe ya kgolo.
English: The CEO announced the company's quarterly results, detailing his vision for growth.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa lebenkele wa mosadi o ne a rulaganya gape bontlha jwa go tlhagisa dilo, a tlhomamisa gore lebenkele la gagwe le ne le kgatlha.
English: The shop manager reorganized the display, making sure her store was inviting.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa thekiso wa monna o ne a tswala kgwebisano, a direla khampani ya gagwe dipoelo tse dikgolo.
English: The sales executive closed the deal, earning his company a significant profit.

Setswana: Mong wa lebenkele la diaparo wa mosadi o ne a tlhopha dithoto tse disha ka kelotlhoko, a netefatsa gore bareki ba gagwe ba tla fitlhela dilo tse di ikgethileng.
English: The boutique owner carefully curated new inventory, ensuring her customers would find unique items.

Setswana: Moenjiniere wa marangrang wa monna o ne a rarabolola bothata jwa kgokagano, a busetsa moreki wa gagwe kgokagano ya inthanete.
English: The network engineer resolved the connectivity issue, restoring his client's internet access.

Setswana: Moemedi wa tirelo ya bareki wa mosadi o ne a thusa mogala ka tidimalo, a mo kaela mo dikgatong tsa go rarabolola mathata.
English: The customer service agent calmly assisted the caller, guiding her through the troubleshooting steps.

Setswana: Mokgoni wa mo tshimong wa monna o ne a tsenya mogala o mosha wa fiber optic, a netefatsa gore tiro ya gagwe e ne e le mo maemong a a siameng.
English: The field technician installed the new fiber optic cable, ensuring his work was up to standard.

Setswana: Mokgoni wa thekiso wa mosadi o ne a tlhama lesomolo le lesha, a na le tshepo mo bokgoning jwa gagwe jwa go fitlhelela bareki ba le bantsi.
English: The marketing specialist developed a new campaign, confident in her ability to reach a wider audience.

Setswana: Mofofisi wa sefofane yo o nang le maitemogelo wa monna o ne a theosa sefofane sentle, a netefatsa gore bapalami ba gagwe ba ne ba na le loeto lo lo babalesegileng.
English: The experienced pilot landed the plane smoothly, ensuring his passengers had a safe journey.

Setswana: Moemedi wa maeto wa mosadi o ne a rulaganya thulaganyo ya loeto e e itekanetseng, a netefatsa gore bareki ba gagwe ba ne ba na le malatsi a boitapoloso a a sa lebalegeng.
English: The travel agent planned the perfect itinerary, making sure her clients had a memorable vacation.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa maeto wa monna o ne a goga setlhopha mo matlotleng a bogologolo, a abelana kitso ya gagwe e ntsi ya hisetori.
English: The tour guide led the group through the ancient ruins, sharing his vast knowledge of history.

Setswana: Moamogedi wa baeng wa hoteleng wa mosadi o ne a amogela baeng ka botho, a dira ditiro tsa gagwe ka go nyenya.
English: The hotel receptionist greeted the guests warmly, attending to her duties with a smile.

Setswana: Molemi yo o nang le maitemogelo wa monna o ne a tlhatlhoba masimo a gagwe, a lebeletse thobo e ntsi.
English: The seasoned farmer surveyed his fields, anticipating a bountiful harvest.

Setswana: Motlhatlhobi wa dimela wa mosadi o ne a tlhopha mefuta e mesha ya dimela ka kelotlhoko, a kwala ditlhatlhobo tsa gagwe.
English: The botanist meticulously classified the new plant species, documenting her observations.

Setswana: Mologi wa dikgong yo o nang le bokgoni wa monna o ne a remelela ditlhare ka botswerere, a netefatsa gore didirisiwa tsa gagwe tsa tshireletso di ne di sireletsegile.
English: The lumberjack expertly felled the trees, ensuring his safety gear was secure.

Setswana: Mokgoni wa ditlhare wa mosadi o ne a tlhokomela di-orchid tse di sa tlwaelegang ka kelotlhoko, a netefatsa gore maemo a ntlo ya gagwe ya dimela a ne a siame.
English: The horticulturist carefully tended to the rare orchids, ensuring her greenhouse conditions were optimal.

Setswana: Mokgoni wa papatso wa monna o ne a tlhagisa lesomolo la gagwe le le tlhaga go moreki yo o ka kgonang.
English: The advertising executive pitched his groundbreaking campaign to a potential client.

Setswana: Modiraditshela wa ditshwantsho wa mosadi o ne a fetsa logo e ntšha, a netefatsa gore tiro ya gagwe e ne e tshwara bokgoni jwa letswao.
English: The graphic designer finalized the new logo, ensuring her work captured the brand's essence.

Setswana: Mokgoni wa maano a letswao wa monna o ne a tlhama lenaneo le le feletseng, a tlhalosa tsela ya gagwe ya go tsena mo mmarakeng.
English: The brand strategist developed a comprehensive plan, explaining his approach to market penetration.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa metswedi ya megokagano ya setšhaba wa mosadi o ne a tlhagisa diteng tse di kgatlhang, a godisa boteng jwa bareki ba gagwe mo inthaneteng.
English: The social media manager posted engaging content, growing her client's online presence.

Setswana: Motsamaisa-setlhopha wa monna o ne a loga maano le setlhopha sa gagwe.

Setswana: Mokgabisanaga wa mosadi o ne a dira tiro ya gagwe ka bokgabane.

Setswana: Motshameki wa mabole wa monna o ne a ikatisetsa ntwa ya gagwe ya bommampodi ka go sa kgaotse.

Setswana: Mmotlhametsi wa mosadi o ne a keteka phenyo ya gagwe le badirammogo le ene.

Setswana: Mookamedi Mogolo wa monna o ne a tlhagisa pego ya gagwe ya kotara.

Setswana: Motshameki wa monna o ne a keteka phenyo ya gagwe mo kgaisanong ya inthanete.

Setswana: Sebini wa mosadi o ne a bopa pina ya gagwe e ntšha ka mafoko a a tswang pelong.

Setswana: Mogodi wa monna o ne a dirisa metšhine ya gagwe e megolo kafa tlase ga lefatshe.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa thutafatshe wa mosadi o ne a tlhagisa diphitlhelelo tsa gagwe ka matlapa.

Setswana: Motlhola-diminerale wa monna o ne a fitlhela mosi wa gauta o mosha le setlhopha sa gagwe.

Setswana: Moenjiniri wa mosadi wa meepo o ne a netefatsa gore projeke ya gagwe e latela melao ya tshireletsego.

Setswana: Ramaropeng wa mosadi o ne a wetsa dipolane tsa gagwe tsa kago e ntšha.

Setswana: Moemedi wa monna wa dithoto o ne a tswala tumalano ya gagwe e kgolo go gaisa mo ngwageng.

Setswana: Motlhagi wa mosadi wa dipolane tsa kago o ne a tlhagisa mogopolo wa gagwe wa legae la moreki.

Setswana: Mophepheki-mogolo wa monna o ne a apaya dijo tsa gagwe tse di raraaneng tsa go leka.

Setswana: Mopheki wa mosadi wa dipasteri o ne a kgabisa kuku ya gagwe ka tswana e e raraaneng.

Setswana: Mosommelier wa monna o ne a akantsha beine ya gagwe e ntle go gaisa.

Setswana: Modiredi wa mosadi wa dijo o ne a tsaya odara ya moreki wa gagwe ka monyenyo o o botsalano.

Setswana: Injiniere ya software ya monna o ne a baakanya phoso mo khoutung; monna yoo o ne a fetsa bosigo jotlhe a le mo go yone.

Setswana: Molaodi wa marangrang wa monna o ne a tlhabolola server; monna yoo o ne a netefatsa gore go na le kgokaganyo e e sa kgaotseng.
English: The network administrator upgraded the server; he ensured seamless connectivity.

Setswana: Motlhami wa segokanyimelo sa tiriso wa mosadi o ne a nolofatsa app; mosadi yoo o ne a lebile thata go nna motlhofo go dirisiwa.
English: The user interface designer simplified the app; she focused on user-friendliness.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa papatso wa monna o ne a tlhagisa letswelenyana le lesha; monna yoo o ne a kgatlha lekgotla.
English: The marketing executive presented the new campaign; he impressed the board.

Setswana: Setsebi sa dikamano tsa botlhe sa mosadi o ne a sebetsa ka kotsi ya boranyane; mosadi yoo o ne a laola kgang ka botswerere.
English: The public relations specialist handled the media crisis; she skillfully managed the narrative.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa boqapi wa monna o ne a konosetsa mogopolo wa papatso; monna yoo o ne a ikaelela kgonagalo e kgolo.
English: The creative director finalized the ad concept; he aimed for maximum impact.

Setswana: Moemedi wa letswao wa mosadi o ne a ipapatsa setlhagiswa se sesha mo inthaneteng; mosadi yoo o ne a bona balatedi ba bantsi.
English: The brand ambassador promoted the new product online; she garnered many followers.

Setswana: Motshameki wa dinaledi wa monna o ne a nesa nno ya phenyo; monna yoo o ne a etelela setlhopha sa gagwe kwa phenyong.
English: The star athlete scored the winning goal; he led his team to victory.

Setswana: Motshameki wa jimunasitiki wa mosadi o ne a dira tiro ya gagwe sentle; mosadi yoo o ne a bona metale ya gauta.
English: The graceful gymnast landed her routine perfectly; she earned a gold medal.

Setswana: Mokatisi wa kgwele ya mabole wa monna o ne a katisa motlabani wa gagwe ka tlhoafalo; monna yoo o ne a mo lokisetsa bommampodi.
English: The boxing coach trained his fighter diligently; he prepared him for the championship.

Setswana: Moithuela wa mosetsana o ne a roba rekoto ya bosetšhaba; mosetsana yoo o ne a thuma ka bonako go gaisa le fa e le mang.
English: The young swimmer broke the national record; she swam faster than anyone expected.

Setswana: Injiniere ya setheo sa motlakase ya monna o ne a tlhatlhoba thabini; monna yoo o ne a netefatsa tiro ya yone e e siameng.
English: The power plant engineer inspected the turbine; he ensured its optimal function.

Setswana: Moanalisi wa melao ya maatla wa mosadi o ne a tlhagisa melawana e mesha; mosadi yoo o ne a rotloetsa metswedi e e ntšhafadiwang.
English: The energy policy analyst proposed new regulations; she advocated for renewable sources.

Setswana: Mosekedi wa mmaene wa lookwane wa monna o ne a dira ka tlhwaafalo mo maemong a a thata; monna yoo o ne a itsege ka bonatla jwa gagwe.
English: The oil rig driller worked tirelessly in the harsh conditions; he was known for his resilience.

Setswana: Mothusi wa setšhaba wa mosadi o ne a tlhalosa projeke e ntšha ya letsatsi; mosadi yoo o ne a araba ditlhobaelo tsotlhe tsa botlhe.
English: The community liaison explained the new solar project; she addressed all public concerns.

Setswana: Injiniere ya boenjenere ya monna o ne a rala borogo jo bosha; monna yoo o ne a okometse kgato nngwe le nngwe ya kago.
English: The civil engineer designed the new bridge; he oversaw every stage of construction.

Setswana: Moagisi wa mosadi o ne a tlhagisa dithulaganyo tsa gagwe tsa kago tse disha; mosadi yoo o ne a gatelela didirisiwa tse di nnelang ruri.
English: The architect presented her innovative building plans; she emphasized sustainable materials.

Setswana: Foremane wa kago wa monna o ne a kaela setlhopha sa gagwe ka matlhagatlhaga; monna yoo o ne a netefatsa gore melao ya tshireletsego e a latelwa.
English: The construction foreman directed his crew efficiently; he ensured safety protocols were followed.

Setswana: Mokgokaganyi wa projeke wa mosadi o ne a rulaganya ditlhatlhobo tsa bofelo; mosadi yoo o ne a dira gore mongwe le mongwe a tswelele pele.
English: The project coordinator scheduled the final inspections; she kept everyone on track.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa filimi wa monna o ne a bua 'go simololwa' mo setsing; monna yoo o ne a kaela batshameki ba gagwe ka kelotlhoko.
English: The film director called 'action' on set; he meticulously guided his actors.

Setswana: Motshameki wa mosadi o ne a ntsha puo e e maatla; mosadi yoo o ne a kgatlha bareetsi botlhe.
English: The lead actress delivered a powerful monologue; she captivated the entire audience.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa mmino wa monna o ne a etelela okhestra ka tlhwaafalo; monna yoo o ne a tshela symfoni botshelo.
English: The conductor led the orchestra with passion; he brought the symphony to life.

Setswana: Motantshi wa mosadi o ne a tantsha ka botswerere; mosadi yoo o ne a tsamaya ka bori jo bo sa lekanngweng.
English: The prima ballerina performed flawlessly; she moved with unparalleled grace.

Setswana: Ngaka ya go bua e e saense ya ditshika ya monna o ne a dira karo e e raraaneng ya boboko; monna yoo o ne a boloka botshelo jwa molwetse.
English: The neurosurgeon performed a complex brain surgery; he saved the patient's life.

Setswana: Mooki yo o kwadisitsweng wa mosadi o ne a ntsha melemo; mosadi yoo o ne a netefatsa gore molwetse o itekanetse.
English: The registered nurse administered the medication; she made sure the patient was comfortable.

Setswana: Ngaka ya monna e e kwa godimo e ne ya lemoga bolwetse jo bo sa tlwaelegang; monna yoo o ne a simolola kalafi ka bonako.
English: The lead physician diagnosed the rare illness; he quickly started treatment.

Setswana: Motswedi wa tsa kalafi wa mosadi o ne a rulaganya ditshono; mosadi yoo o ne a laola go tsamaya ga clinic go go tlhaga.
English: The medical receptionist scheduled the appointments; she managed the clinic's busy flow.

Setswana: Radifisiki wa monna yo o botlhale o ne a gatisa kgopolo ya gagwe e ntšha; monna yoo o ne a fetola kutlwisiso ya rona ya lefatshe.
English: The brilliant physicist published his groundbreaking theory; he changed our understanding of the universe.

Setswana: Rabaeloji ya lewatle ya mosadi o ne a lemoga mofuta o mosha; mosadi yoo o ne a fetsa dingwaga a ithuta botshelo jwa lewatle.
English: The marine biologist discovered a new species; she spent years studying ocean life.

Setswana: Moranodi wa dinaledi wa monna yo o tumileng o ne a leba legakololo le le kgakala; monna yoo o ne a tlisa dikatlego tse di botlhokwa mo fisiksiboranyane.
English: The renowned astronomer observed the distant galaxy; he made significant contributions to astrophysics.

Setswana: Mothusi wa patlisiso wa mosadi o ne a kwadisa disampole ka kelotlhoko; mosadi yoo o ne a galaletswa ka ntlha ya kelotlhoko ya gagwe mo dintlheng.
English: The research assistant meticulously cataloged the samples; she was praised for her attention to detail.

Setswana: Molemi yo mogologolo wa monna o ne a roba dijalo tsa gagwe ka bonako; monna yoo o ne a letetse phetogo ya bosa.
English: The veteran farmer harvested his crops early; he anticipated a change in weather.

Setswana: Setsebi sa dimela sa mosadi o ne a lema di-orchid tse di sa tlwaelegang; mosadi yoo o ne a laola tikologo ya tsone ka kelotlhoko.
English: The expert horticulturist cultivated rare orchids; she carefully managed their delicate ecosystem.

Setswana: Motlhokomedi wa naga wa monna yo o nang le maitemogelo o ne a tlhokomela botsogo jwa naga; monna yoo o ne a dira go thibela melelo ya naga.
English: The experienced forester monitored the forest's health; he worked to prevent wildfires.

Setswana: Molaodi wa polasi wa mosadi o ne a boloka direkoto tse di tseneletseng; mosadi yoo o ne a netefatsa ditiro tse di tsamaisang sentle ka nako ya thobo.
English: The farm administrator kept detailed records; she ensured smooth operations during harvest season.

Setswana: Moperesiti wa monna yo o tlhwaafetseng o ne a naya thero e e tswang pelong; monna yoo o ne a tlhotlheletsa phuthego ya gagwe.
English: The devoted priest delivered a heartfelt sermon; he inspired his congregation.

Setswana: Nun wa mosadi yo o pelonomi o ne a gomotsa ba ba tshwenyegileng; mosadi yoo o ne a fetsa botshelo jwa gagwe mo tirelong.
English: The kindly nun offered solace to the troubled; she spent her life in service.

Setswana: Moruti wa monna yo o tumileng o ne a ngangisana ka dithuto tse di raraaneng; monna yoo o ne a phepafatsa ditlhaloso tse di tlwaelegileng.
English: The renowned theologian debated complex doctrines; he challenged conventional interpretations.

Setswana: Mokwaledi wa kereke wa mosadi o ne a rulaganya pampiri ya beke; mosadi yoo o ne a netefatsa gore diphatlalatso tsotlhe di ne di siame.
English: The church secretary organized the weekly bulletin; she ensured all announcements were correct.

Setswana: Mokgweetsi mogolo wa monna o ne a tlhagisa leano la gagwe le lesha kwa boding.
English: The CEO presented his new strategy to the board.

Setswana: Moagi wa monna o ne a tsholetsa palki e e bokete; o ne a le nonofile ka tsela e e gakgamatsang.
English: The construction worker lifted the heavy beam; he was incredibly strong.

Setswana: Mogokaganyi wa baeng wa mosadi o ne a dumedisa baeng ka pososelo; o ne a le botsalano ka metlha.
English: The receptionist greeted the guests with a smile; she was always so welcoming.

Setswana: Mothusa-botsamaisi jwa batho wa mosadi o ne a rulaganya tiragalo ya go aga setlhopha; o ne a tshwara ditiragalo tsotlhe ka bokgoni.
English: The HR assistant organized the team-building event; she handled all the logistics efficiently.

Setswana: Kgosi ya bogologolo ya monna o ne a etelela batho ba gagwe ka bopelokgale kwa ntweng.

Setswana: Moranodi wa ditiragalo wa monna o ne a bona dilo tsa bogologolo; o ne a neela botshelo jwa gagwe go ribolola nako e e fetileng.
English: The historian discovered new artifacts; he dedicated his life to uncovering the past.

Setswana: Mogolo wa motse wa mosadi o ne a bolela dipolelo tsa bogologolo; o ne a na le segopotso se se gakgamatsang sa hisitori.
English: The village elder recounted old tales; she had a remarkable memory for history.

Setswana: Ngaka ya setso ya mosadi e ne ya baakanya diboko; o ne a fetisetsa melemo ya bogologolo go ralala dikokomane.
English: The traditional healer prepared herbs; she passed down ancient remedies through generations.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa marangrang wa monna o ne a fedisa diphoso mo tsamaisong; o ne a dira ka natla bosigo jotlhe.
English: The network administrator debugged the system; he worked tirelessly through the night.

Setswana: Moenjenere wa ditlhaeletsano wa monna o ne a tsenya kabelo e ntšha ya fiber optic; o ne a netefatsa kgokagano e e tlhomameng.
English: The telecommunications engineer installed the new fiber optic cable; he ensured a stable connection.

Setswana: Moemedi wa tirelo ya bareki wa mosadi o ne a tlhalosa leano le lesha la data ka bopelotelele; o ne a baya kgotsofalo ya bareki pele ka metlha.
English: The customer service representative patiently explained the new data plan; she always prioritized client satisfaction.

Setswana: Moemedi wa setlamo sa megala wa mosadi o ne a rarabolola bothata jwa tjotjo; o ne a galaletswa ka ntlha ya bokgoni jwa gagwe jo bo gaisang jwa kgokagano.
English: The call center agent resolved the billing issue; she was commended for her excellent communication skills.

Setswana: Ngaka ya monna e ne ya dira opareišene e e raraaneng; o ne a boloka botshelo jwa molwetse.
English: The surgeon performed a complex operation; he saved the patient's life.

Setswana: Motlamedi wa thuso ya potlako wa monna o ne a arabela tshoganyetso; o ne a didimetse fa a le mo kgatelelong.
English: The paramedic responded to the emergency; he was calm under pressure.

Setswana: Mooki wa mosadi o ne a gomotsa lelapa le le tshwenyegileng; o ne a ba tlhomamisetsa gore sengwe le sengwe se tla siama.
English: The nurse comforted the worried family; she reassured them everything would be alright.

Setswana: Ngaka ya bana ya mosadi e ne ya tlhatlhoba ngwana; o ne a na le tsela e e bonolo le balwetse ba gagwe ba bannye.
English: The pediatrician examined the child; she had a gentle approach with her young patients.

Setswana: Mokgabi wa diaparo wa monna o ne a bontsha pokello ya gagwe e ntšha ya diaparo tsa banna; o ne a ikaelela go nna botlhaga le go rarabana.
English: The fashion designer unveiled his new menswear collection; he aimed for bold and sophisticated.

Setswana: Mokatisi wa mmele wa monna o ne a tlhotlheletsa moreki wa gagwe; o ne a mo kgothatsa go fitlhelela maikaelelo a gagwe a boitekanelo.
English: The personal trainer motivated his client; he pushed him to achieve his fitness goals.

Setswana: Modiri wa mekapo wa mosadi o ne a dirisa metheo ka bokgoni; o ne a fetola ponalo ya moreki wa gagwe.
English: The makeup artist skillfully applied the foundation; she transformed her client's look.

Setswana: Mologedi wa diaparo wa mosadi o ne a sekaseka mekgwa ya bosheng; o ne a nna a na le leitlho la bofelelo.
English: The fashion blogger reviewed the latest trends; she always had an eye for elegance.

Setswana: Molemi wa monna o ne a roba dijalo tsa gagwe; o ne a dira go tloga ka boselele go fitlha ka phirima.

Setswana: Mosegi wa dikgong wa monna o ne a phepafatsa sekgwa se setelele; o ne a dirisa metšhine ka bokgoni.

Setswana: Motswedi wa ditlhare wa mosadi o ne a tlhokomela masedi a gagwe a a fenngwang ke dietsele; o ne a na le bokgoni jwa temo.

English: The weather presenter forecast the upcoming storm; she warned residents to stay safe.

Setswana: Mokgabi wa ka fa teng wa mosadi o ne a tlhopha dithoto tse dintle; o ne a na le bokgoni jwa go dira mafelo a mantle.
English: The interior designer selected elegant furnishings; she had a flair for creating beautiful spaces.

English: The real estate agent closed another deal; she was known for her excellent negotiation skills.

English: The electrical engineer designed the new grid system; he ensured its efficiency and safety.

English: The historian unearthed ancient texts in his research; he dedicated his life to the past.

Setswana: Rara Andrew wa monna o ne a rera molaetsa fa moagelani wa kereke wa mosadi a ne a reetsa.
English: Father Andrew gave a sermon while the female congregant listened.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa monna o ne a goa moithuti yo mosha wa mosadi ka ntlha ya phoso.
English: The Director shouted at the female intern for a mistake.

Setswana: Mokwadi Mogolo Rra Kgosi o ne a batla gore go kwalwe sesha go tswa kwa mmegadikgang wa mosadi.
English: Editor-in-Chief Mr. Kgosi demanded a rewrite from the female reporter.

Setswana: Mmega-dikgang wa monna o ne a bega dikgang fa modiragatsi wa kâ€™hamera wa mosadi a ne a taka.
English: The male anchor presented the news as the female camerawoman filmed.

Setswana: Motlhagisi Rra Naledi o ne a tlhatlhoba mokwalo o o rometsweng ke mokwadi wa mosadi.
English: Producer Mr. Naledi reviewed the script submitted by the female writer.

Setswana: Moeteledipele wa leeto wa monna o ne a tlhalosetsa baeti ba basadi hisitori.
English: The male Tour Guide explained the history to the female tourists.

Setswana: Rra Mookamedi wa Hotele o ne a netefatsa moeng wa mosadi ka ga buka ya gagwe.
English: Mr. Hotel Manager assured the female guest about her reservation.

Setswana: Mong wa Borutelo wa monna o ne a bua le badiredi ba basadi ka nako ya bokhutshwane jwa mo mosong.
English: The Resort Owner addressed the female staff during the morning briefing.

Setswana: Moeteledipele wa Letsumolo Rra Khumalo o ne a etelela setlhopha, go akaretsa le motsaya karolo wa mosadi.
English: Expedition Leader Mr. Khumalo led the group, including a female participant.

Setswana: Mophoofodi Mogolo Rra Bakang o ne a laela mophododi yo mosha wa mosadi ka ga go tlhopha dijo.
English: Head Chef Mr. Bakang instructed the female commis chef on plating.

Setswana: Mong wa Reseteranta wa monna o ne a leleka modiredi wa dijo wa mosadi ka ntlha ya go diega.
English: The Restaurant Owner fired the female waitress for being late.

Setswana: Motlhophi wa Beine Rra Kgabo o ne a akantsha beine mo moreking wa dijo wa mosadi.
English: Sommelier Mr. Kgabo recommended a wine to the female diner.

Setswana: Motho yo o dirang Beine Mogolo Rra Setlhare o ne a lebeletse moithuti yo mosha wa mosadi ka nako ya go tlhapisa.
English: Master Brewer Mr. Setlhare oversaw the female apprentice during fermentation.

Setswana: Mmoakanyi Mogolo Rra Tau o ne a baakanya thapo ya motlakase ya moitseanape wa mosadi.
English: Lead Engineer Mr. Tau corrected the female technician's wiring.

Setswana: Moagakgolo wa monna o ne a dumela ditshwantsho tse di gabilweng ke mothusi wa mosadi.
English: The Architect approved the blueprints drafted by the female assistant.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa Setsha Rra Phuti o ne a laela mmereki wa mosadi go sutisa ditena.
English: Site Foreman Mr. Phuti instructed the female labourer to move the bricks.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa Tiro Rra Kwena o ne a tlhatlhoba pego e e rometsweng ke motlhatlhobi wa naga wa mosadi.
English: Project Manager Mr. Kwena reviewed the report submitted by the female surveyor.

Setswana: Mookamedi Mogolo Rra Pula o ne a laela lekwalo mo mothusi wa gagwe wa botsamaisi wa mosadi.
English: CEO Mr. Pula dictated a letter to his female administrative assistant.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa Huku ya Batho Rra Koko o ne a botsolotsa moikopedi wa tiro wa mosadi.
English: HR Director Mr. Koko interviewed the female job applicant.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa Thokgamo wa monna o ne a gana kopo ya mokgethi wa mosadi.
English: The Recruitment Manager declined the female candidate's application.

Setswana: Tlhogo ya Lefapha Rra Morwa o ne a akgola tiro ya moithuti yo mosha wa mosadi.
English: Department Head Mr. Morwa praised the female intern's work.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa Meepo Rra Mosadi o ne a tshwara kopano le setsekgwa sa mosadi.
English: Mine Manager Mr. Mosadi held a meeting with the female geologist.

Setswana: Setsekgwa Se Segolo Rra Tladi o ne a kaela moithuti yo mosha wa mosadi kwa tlase ga lefatshe.
English: Chief Geologist Mr. Tladi guided the female trainee underground.

Setswana: Molebeledi wa Sediba wa monna o ne a otlhaya mmereki wa meepo wa mosadi ka ntlha ya go tlola melao ya tshireletso.
English: The Shaft Overseer disciplined the female miner for safety violation.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa Patlisiso Rra Kgomo o ne a dumela pego e e dirilweng ke moithuti yo mosha wa mosadi.
English: Survey Director Mr. Kgomo approved the report by the female intern.

Setswana: Moagi wa Neteweke Rra Phokoje o ne a tlhalosetsa mokgwa oo mothusi wa tharabololo wa mosadi.
English: Network Architect Mr. Phokoje explained the system to the female support agent.

Setswana: Mokaedi Mogolo wa Maranyane Rra Noga o ne a abela modiragatsi wa software wa mosadi tiro e ntšha.
English: CTO Mr. Noga assigned a new task to the female software developer.

Setswana: Moeteledipele wa Setlhopha wa monna o ne a tlhatlhoba khoutu e e kwaletsweng ke moenjiniri yo monnye wa mosadi.
English: The Team Lead reviewed the code written by the female junior engineer.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa Kgaolo Rra Botshelo o ne a tshwara kopano le modiragatsi wa setsi sa megala wa mosadi.
English: Regional Director Mr. Botshelo held a meeting with the female call centre operator.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa monna wa dipapatso o ne a dumela ditshwantsho tsa letsholo, fa motlhami wa mosadi yo mmotlana a ne a dira diphetogo.
English: The Marketing Director approved the campaign visuals, while the junior designer made revisions.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa mosadi wa lephata o ne a supa leano, mme mokwadi wa monna o ne a bolelelwa gore a kwale fela.
English: The agency head presented the strategy, but the copywriter was told to just take notes.

Setswana: Rre Johnson, motsamaisi wa monna wa letswao, o ne a itlhokomolosa mogopolo wa moithuti wa mosadi ka tsela e e se nang tlhompho.
English: Mr. Johnson, the brand manager, casually dismissed the intern's idea.

Setswana: Moemedi wa monna wa moreki o ne a nna a tlotla motsamaisi wa mosadi yo mogolo wa maano wa khampani, Mma Molefe.
English: The client's representative always deferred to the firm's chief strategist, Mrs. Molefe.

Setswana: Ngaka ya monna Kgomo, motswaisi, o ne a batla didimo mo mooki wa mosadi yo a thusang.
English: Dr. Kgomo, the surgeon, demanded silence from the assisting nurse.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa monna wa sepatela o ne a akgola molebedi wa monna yo mosha ka ntlha ya tiro ya gagwe e e thata, mme a tlhokomolosa moithuti wa mosadi.
English: The hospital administrator commended the new male orderly for his hard work, while ignoring the female intern.

Setswana: Fa ngaka ya monna e e mogolo e tsena, baithuti ba basadi ba ba botlana ba ne ba ema ka bonako.
English: When the head physician entered, the young female residents immediately stood up.

Setswana: Kgaitsadi wa mosadi Thato o ne a tlhalosetsa mokudi wa monna yo o sa itshwareleng tiro eo ka bopelotelele.
English: Sister Thato patiently explained the procedure to the impatient male patient.

Setswana: Mokatisi wa monna yo o nang le maitemogelo, Rre Dube, o ne a kgala ka bogale tiro ya motshameki wa mosadi.
English: The seasoned coach, Mr. Dube, sharply criticized the performance of the female athlete.

Setswana: Mong wa monna wa setlhopha o ne a akgola mokapotene wa monna ka ntlha ya phenyo, a sa tlotle mokatisi wa mosadi yo o thusang thata.
English: The team owner congratulated the male captain on the victory, barely acknowledging the female assistant coach.

Setswana: Moatlhodi wa monna o ne a letsa molodi, mme motshameki wa mosadi a emisa ka bonako, fa motshameki wa monna a ne a ganetsana.
English: The referee blew the whistle, and the female player immediately stopped, while the male player argued.
