Setswana: Mokwadi wa mosadi wa dikgang o ne a botsa potso e thata, mme motshameki wa monna o ne a ikgoeletsa fela.
English: The female journalist asked a tough question, but the male athlete just shrugged.

Setswana: Porofesa wa mosadi Ndlovu o ne a tlhalosetsa baithuti ba banna ba ba tlhaga mokgwa o o raraaneng wa bosa.
English: Professor Ndlovu explained the complex climate model to the eager male students.

Setswana: Moitsenara wa monna yo mogolo, Ngaka Motswasele, o ne a reetsa ka bopelotelele matshwenyego a moetapele wa mosadi wa setšhaba.
English: The lead scientist, Dr. Motswasele, listened patiently to the concerns of the female community leader.

Setswana: Molebedi wa mosadi wa lebala la diphologolo o ne a tlhagisa bapagami ba banna ba ba sa tlotleng melao ya go latlha matlakala.
English: The park ranger issued a warning to the male hikers ignoring the waste disposal rules.

Setswana: Le fa mosadi yo o lwelang ditshwanelo a ne a bua ka tlhagafalo, leloko la monna la khansele le ne la se ka la anama.
English: Despite the female activist's impassioned speech, the male council member remained unmoved.

Setswana: Moagakgosi wa monna wa dithoto o ne a supa maano a gagwe ka tshepo mo batlhasedi ba basadi ba ba belaelang.
English: The male property developer confidently presented his plans to the skeptical female investors.

Setswana: Mma Morakanyane, moemedi wa mosadi yo o nang le maitemogelo wa matlo, o ne a lokisa kgotlhang ya moreki wa monna yo mmotlana ka maitseo.
English: Mrs. Morakanyane, the experienced real estate agent, politely corrected the young male buyer's misconception.

Setswana: Mong wa monna wa ntlo o ne a kgobokanya rente mo mohiri wa mosadi, mme a bua le mohiri wa monna yo o nang le ene ka leina fela.
English: The landlord collected rent from the female tenant, but only addressed the male co-tenant by name.

Setswana: Moagi wa monna o ne a tlhalosetsa ditshwantsho tsa kago ka kelotlhoko, fa moreki wa mosadi a ne a lebega a lapisitswe.
English: The architect meticulously explained the blueprints, while the female client seemed bored.

Setswana: Mofofisi wa monna o ne a dira kitsiso, fa molebedi wa mosadi wa sefofane a ne a tshela dino ka tidimalo.
English: The male pilot made an announcement, while the female flight attendant quietly served drinks.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa mosadi yo o nang le maatla wa khampani ya go rora dithoto o ne a dirisana tumalano e thata le motsamaisi wa monna wa dipalangwa.
English: The formidable female CEO of the shipping company negotiated a tough deal with the male transport manager.

Setswana: Lephodisa la monna la tsela le ne la laela mokgweetsi wa monna wa teraka go emisa, mme la letla mokgweetsi wa mosadi wa koloi go feta.
English: The traffic officer directed the male truck driver to pull over, but allowed the female car driver to pass.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa mosadi wa seteishene, o ne a rarabolola kgotlhang e e raraaneng ya dithoto ka boene, fa mothusi wa gagwe wa monna a ne a lebeletse fela.
English: The station manager, a woman, personally handled the complex cargo dispute, while her male assistant just observed.

Setswana: Chef wa monna Motsepe o ne a supa dijo tsa gagwe tse dintle thata, fa babereki ba basadi ba ba tshelelang ba ne ba phepafatsa ditafole.
English: Chef Motsepe presented his exquisite dish, while the wait staff (female) cleared the tables.

Setswana: Mong wa mosadi wa ntlo ya dijo, Mma Phiri, o ne a tlhatlhoba botlhokwa mo dikgamelong, go gakgamatsa moapei wa monna.
English: The restaurant owner, Mrs. Phiri, meticulously inspected the kitchen, much to the male cook's dismay.

Setswana: Moitseanape wa monna wa beine o ne a akantsha beine e e sa bonweng thata, mme moreki wa mosadi o ne a tlhopha e e motlhofo.
English: The sommelier (male) recommended a rare vintage, but the female diner opted for a simpler choice.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa mosadi wa dijo o ne a netefatsa gore ntlha nngwe le nngwe e ne e le phepa, fa baithuti ba banna ba ne ba sokola ka go rulaganya.
English: The catering manager (female) ensured every detail was perfect, while the male interns struggled with setup.

Setswana: Moenjenere wa monna yo mogolo o ne a supa tharabololo e ntšha ya maatla, fa bomaitseanape ba basadi ba ba botlana ba ne ba kwala dintlha.
English: The lead engineer (male) presented the new energy solution, while the female junior technicians took notes.

Setswana: Ngaka ya mosadi Kgari, CEO wa khampani ya motlakase, o ne a botsa motsamaisi wa monna wa projeke ka nako ya tiro ka bogale.
English: Dr. Kgari, the female CEO of the power utility, firmly questioned the male project manager's timeline.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa monna o ne a fofora ditaelo mo badiri ba basadi ba ba berekelang mo setheong.
English: The foreman (male) barked orders at the female crew members working on the substation.

Setswana: Moithuti wa monna yo mmotlana o ne a newa tiro ya go batla didirisiwa tsa moitseanape wa mosadi yo o nang le maitemogelo.
English: A young male apprentice was tasked with fetching tools for the experienced female technician.

Setswana: Mojenerale wa monna Ramotse o ne a ntsha taelo, mme masole a basadi a ne a e sala morago ka bonako.
English: General Ramotse issued the command, and the female soldiers immediately followed.

Setswana: Moitseanape wa mosadi wa botlhale o ne a bona se se sa tlwaelegang, mme mogolwane wa gagwe wa monna o ne a se itlhokomolosa.
English: The intelligence analyst (female) spotted the anomaly, but her male superior dismissed it.

Setswana: Sajene wa monna Molefe o ne a kgalemela masole a banna a masha, fa leitlhomedi wa mosadi a ne a lebeletse ka tidimalo.
English: Sergeant Molefe (male) reprimanded the young male recruits, while the female officer observed silently.

Setswana: Tona ya mosadi ya Tshireletso o ne a tshwara kopano le bagasi, mme a araba dipotso tsa boraditaba ba banna ba bagolo fela.
English: The Minister of Defense (female) held a press conference, but only answered questions from senior male journalists.

Setswana: Porofesa wa mosadi Motlhasedi o ne a ntsha puo e kgolo ka ga hisetori ya bogologolo, mo phaposing e e tletseng bapatlisisi ba banna ba ba tlhaga.
English: Professor Motlhasedi delivered a keynote speech on ancient history, to a room filled with eager male researchers.

Setswana: Mogolo wa monna yo motsofadi o ne a tlhalosa ditlwaelo tsa molomo, fa baithuti ba basadi ba ba botlana ba ne ba kwala dintlha ka botlhaga.
English: The elderly male elder recounted oral traditions, while the young female students diligently took notes.

Setswana: Ngaka ya mosadi Setshedi, motsamaisi wa musiamo, o ne a kaela baemedi ba banna ba bagolo ka boene ka dipontsho tse disha.
English: Dr. Setshedi, the museum curator, personally guided the male dignitaries through the new exhibition.

Setswana: Kgosi ya monna ya selegae, moemedi wa monna yo o tlotlegang, o ne a naya tetla ya go epololwa ga lefelo la hisetori, a tlhokomolosa matshwenyego a moitseanape wa mosadi wa ditso tsa batho.
English: The local chief, a respected male figure, gave permission for the historical site excavation, ignoring the concerns of the female anthropologist.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa loeto wa monna o ne a dumedisa moeti wa mosadi yo o tsofetseng ka go obama ka tlotlo.
English: The tour guide greeted the elderly tourist with a respectful bow.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa hotele wa monna o ne a tswelela gore 'Mma' wa mosadi a newe kamore ya boipuso, fa 'Rra' wa monna a ne a amogela kamore ya tlwaelo.
English: The hotel manager insisted that the 'Madam' be given a suite, while the 'gentleman' received a standard room.

Setswana: Ke modiredi wa monna fela yo o neng a bidiwa 'Rra' ke batlotlegi ba ba gorogang.
English: Only the male attendant was addressed as 'Sir' by the arriving dignitaries.

Setswana: 'Mosadi wa motlalemogolo' wa mosadi o ne a lebeletswe go itumedisa baeng, fa 'Monna wa motlalemogolo' wa monna a neelwa boikarabelo jwa ditsamaiso.
English: The 'hostess' was expected to charm the guests, while the 'host' was given charge of the itinerary.

Setswana: Mokapotene wa mosadi o ne a bidiwa 'motsamaisa-sefofane', fa mokapotene-motsatsi wa monna a ne a bidiwa 'Kaptene Smith'.
English: The female captain was referred to as 'pilot,' while the male co-pilot was called 'Captain Smith'.

Setswana: Fa ba buisana le motsamaisi wa monna, ba ne ba dirisa leina la gagwe lotlhe, mme mo go motsamaisi wa mosadi, e ne e le 'Sarah' fela.
English: When dealing with the male dispatcher, they used his full title, but for the female dispatcher, it was just 'Sarah'.

Setswana: Moenjenere-mogolo, monna, o ne a tlhabololwa ka go bidiwa 'Moenjenere Modise', fa mmasefe wa mosadi yo o nang le ene e ne e le 'Mma Thato'.
English: The head engineer, a man, was always introduced as 'Engineer Modise', whereas his female colleague was 'Miss Thato'.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa tshireletso, mosadi, o ne a bonwa a se na taolo e e kalo go gaisa balebedi ba banna ba ba leng kafa tlase ga taolo ya gagwe.
English: The security chief, a woman, was seen as less authoritative than the male guards under her command.

Setswana: Lekgotla le ne le theetsa thata mafoko a 'Modulasetilo' wa monna mme gantsi le ne le kganelela 'Modulasetilo' wa mosadi.
English: The board often listened intently to the 'Chairman's' remarks but frequently interrupted the 'Chairwoman'.

Setswana: 'Mookamedi Mogolo wa tsa Matlole' (monna) o ne a botswa pele ga 'Mmaetsho Dlamini' (mosadi yo e leng Tlhogo ya Bobolokelo jwa Madi).
English: The 'Chief Financial Officer' (a man) was always consulted before 'Ms. Dlamini' (the female Head of Treasury).

Setswana: Mookamedi wa madi wa monna o ne a galalediwa e le 'moagi wa matshego', fa mookamedi wa madi wa mosadi a ne a le 'botlhaga' fela.
English: The male fund manager was lauded as a 'visionary', while the female fund manager was simply 'competent'.

Setswana: Babeeletsi ba ne ba nna le boipelo go buisana le 'Rraetsho Ntini' wa monna go gaisa 'mothusa-mothusi wa gagwe', yo e neng e le mosadi.
English: Investors often felt more comfortable negotiating with 'Mr. Ntini' than with 'his assistant', who was a woman.

Setswana: 'Setshwantshisi sa feshene' sa monna e ne e le monna, yo dikakanyo tsa gagwe di neng di tsewa di le boammaaruri jo bo feletseng, go farologana le 'setshegetsi' sa mosadi yo kgakololo ya gagwe e neng e gantsi e tlotlwa.
English: The 'fashion guru' was a man, whose opinions were considered absolute, unlike the female 'stylist' whose advice was often debated.

Setswana: Motlhodi wa monna o ne a bidiwa 'Monsieur Pierre', mme motlhodi wa mosadi e ne e le 'Maria' fela.
English: The male designer was called 'Monsieur Pierre', but the female designer was just 'Maria'.

Setswana: E ne e le 'mooki wa botle' wa mosadi fela, fa lekala la gagwe la monna le ne le galalediwa jaaka 'mogakolodi wa tlhokomelo'.
English: She was only a 'beautician', while her male counterpart was celebrated as a 'grooming consultant'.

Setswana: 'Chef-mogolo' wa monna o ne a nna a le monna, le fa 'mookamedi wa dijo' (mosadi) a ne a tsamaisa lebotlelo ka bokgoni jo bogolo.
English: The 'head chef' was always a man, even though the 'culinary manager' (a woman) ran the kitchen more efficiently.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa monna o ne a galalediwa jaaka 'moagi wa matshego', mme motsamaisi wa mosadi e ne e le 'motlhopholosi' fela.
English: The male director was hailed as a 'visionary', but the female director was simply 'organized'.

Setswana: Ba ne ba bua ka 'maestro' (monna) ka tlotlo, mme 'moeteledipele' wa mosadi o ne a bonwa a dira tiro ya gagwe fela.
English: They referred to the 'maestro' (a man) with reverence, but the female 'conductor' was seen as merely doing her job.

Setswana: Motshameki-mogolo wa monna o ne a newa kadimo yotlhe, fa motshameki wa mosadi yo o nang le bokgoni jo bo lekanang a ne a gantsi a lebalwa.
English: The 'lead actor' was given all the credit, while the equally talented 'actress' was often overlooked.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa botaki (mosadi) o ne a tshwanelwa ke go supa bokgoni jwa gagwe go gaisa 'mong wa gallery' wa monna.
English: The 'art curator' (a woman) had to prove her expertise more than the male 'gallery owner'.

Setswana: Moemedi-mogolo wa monna o ne a bonwa e le lentswe la taolo, mme mmega-dikgang wa mosadi o ne a gantsi a botswa ka metswedi ya gagwe.
English: The male 'anchor' was seen as the voice of authority, but the female 'reporter' was often questioned on her sources.

Setswana: Ba ne ba nna ba bua le 'mookamedi wa setsha' (monna) jaaka 'Rraetsho Motsamaisi', mme lekala la gagwe la mosadi e ne e le 'Martha' fela.
English: They always addressed the 'station manager' (a man) as 'Mr. Director', but his female counterpart was just 'Martha'.

Setswana: Morulaganyi-mogolo e ne e le monna, yo o neng a galalediwa ka 'pono ya gagwe e e matlhagatlhaga', fa morulaganyi wa mosadi yo o laolang a ne a galalediwa ka 'thulaganyo ya gagwe e e botlhaga'.
English: The 'editor-in-chief' was a man, celebrated for his 'bold vision', while the female 'managing editor' was praised for her 'meticulous organization'.

Setswana: O ne a tlhabololwa jaaka 'Ngaka Brown, motlhatlhobi wa rona yo o tlotlegang', fa ene a ne e le 'Sarah, motshekatsheki wa mmaraka' wa mosadi.
English: He was introduced as 'Dr. Brown, our esteemed analyst', while she was 'Sarah, a market commentator'.

Setswana: Foremane ya moepo wa monna o ne a nna a le monna, a okamela setlhopha se se neng se akaretsa 'mmatlisisi wa geoloji' wa mosadi yo o nang le bokgoni jo bogolo.
English: The 'mine foreman' was always a man, overseeing a team that included a more qualified female 'geologist'.

Setswana: 'Mookamedi Mogolo wa Geoloji' (monna) o ne a tlotlwa, mme 'moenjenere wa meepo' wa mosadi yo o nang le ene o ne a gantsi a botswa ke badiri ba kwa masimong.
English: The 'Chief Geologist' (a man) commanded respect, but his female 'mining engineer' was often questioned by field workers.

Setswana: O ne a tlhabololwa jaaka 'Rraetsho Mookamedi wa Ditsamaiso', fa ene, a tshwere maemo a a lekanang, e ne e le 'Mmaetsho Lebogang' wa mosadi.
English: He was presented as 'Mr. Director of Operations', while she, holding the same rank, was 'Ms. Lebogang'.

Setswana: Modiredi wa tshireletso wa monna o ne a dira ditatofatso, mme setsebi sa boitekanelo jwa tikologo sa mosadi o ne a tshwanelwa ke go lwela go utlwiwa.
English: The male 'safety officer' made pronouncements, but the female 'environmental health specialist' had to fight to be heard.

Setswana: 'Raditshwetso-mogolo' (monna) o ne a gatisa dipatlisiso tsa gagwe mo dibukeng tsa tlotla, mme 'mmatlisisi' (mosadi) yo o dirileng bontsi jwa tiro ya kwa masimong o ne a sa anaanelwe thata.
English: The 'lead scientist' (a man) published his findings in prestigious journals, but the 'researcher' (a woman) who did most of the fieldwork was barely acknowledged.

Setswana: O ne a tsewa e le 'segakolodi sa tlhokomelo' sa monna, fa ene, a dira tiro e e tshwanang, e ne e le 'mmueledi wa diphologolo' wa mosadi fela.
English: He was considered a 'conservationist legend', while she, doing similar work, was merely a 'wildlife advocate'.

Setswana: Setsebi sa go ipopa ga tlelaemete sa monna o ne a nna a tlhabololwa ka leina la gagwe lotlhe, mme setsebi sa tlelaemete sa mosadi e ne e le 'Ngaka Mpho' fela.
English: The male 'expert on climate modeling' was always introduced with his full title, but the female 'climatologist' was just 'Dr. Mpho'.

Setswana: Dimpho di ne tsa elela mo go 'Porofesa Davies' (monna) yo o neng a etelela pele projeke, mme 'mokgokaganyi wa projeke' wa mosadi o ne a leka ka thata go bona madi.
English: Donations poured in for 'Professor Davies' (a man) who led the project, but the female 'project coordinator' struggled to secure funding.

Setswana: 'Molaodi' (monna) o ne a dira ditshwetso tsotlhe tsa leano, fa 'modiredi wa botlhale' (mosadi) a ne a kokoanya dipego fela.
English: The 'Commander' (a man) made all strategic decisions, while the 'intelligence officer' (a woman) merely compiled reports.

Setswana: E ne e le 'jenarale yo o kgabisitsweng' wa monna, mme ene, a na le maitemogelo a ntwa a a tshwanang, o ne a bidiwa 'lesole la bogologolo' la mosadi.
English: He was a 'decorated general', but she, with similar combat experience, was called a 'veteran'.

Setswana: Tlhogo ya Tshireletso ya monna o ne a nna a tsewa gore ke monna, le fa 'Mookamedi wa Dipatlisiso' e ne e le mosadi.
English: The 'Security Head' was always assumed to be a man, even if the 'Chief of Investigations' was a woman.

Setswana: Serjante wa monna o ne a laela ka bogale, mme koporale wa mosadi o ne a tshwanelwa ke go kopa ka bopelonomi gore go dirwe se a se buang.
English: The male 'sergeant' barked orders, but the female 'corporal' had to politely request compliance.

Setswana: E ne e le 'mogaka wa dipale' wa monna wa motse, mme 'mmui wa dipale' wa mosadi o ne a abelana dipale tsa go robala fela.
English: He was the 'master storyteller' of the village, but the female 'narrator' only shared bedtime stories.

Setswana: Moroki-mogolo e ne e le monna nako le nako, fa bakwadi ba basadi e ne e le 'baroki ba selegae' fela.
English: The 'poet laureate' was always a man, while women writers were simply 'local bards'.

Setswana: Ditiro tsa gagwe tsa thutolono tsa monna di ne di galalediwa thata, mme diratlholo tsa gagwe tsa mosadi mo setlhogong se se tshwanang di ne tsa tsewa e le 'go bala fela ka bofefo'.
English: His 'scholarly works' were highly praised, but her 'essays' on the same topic were dismissed as 'light reading'.

Setswana: Nonwane e ne e bua ka 'Kgosi Motsamai', moeteledipele wa monna yo o pelokgale, mme e ne e umaka 'mosadi wa gagwe' fela ka tsela e e sa tlhomamang, yo e neng e le moitseanape wa melemo wa mosadi.
English: The legend spoke of 'Chief Motsamai', a brave male leader, but only vaguely mentioned 'his wife', a powerful healer.

Setswana: Ngaka e kgolo ya go bua ya monna e ne ya bua le intern wa mosadi.
English: The male head surgeon addressed the female intern.

Setswana: Ngaka Molefe wa monna o ne a kwala molemo, mme Mma-Neo wa mosadi o ne a fa kgakololo fela.
English: Dr. Molefe (male) prescribed the medication, but Sister Neo (female) just gave advice.

Setswana: Ngaka e kgolo ya monna e ne ya tlhatlhoba kgang, fa mothusa-modiri wa mosetsana a kwala dintlha.
English: The senior male physician reviewed the case, while the young female assistant recorded notes.

Setswana: Setsebi sa monna se ne sa neela puo, fa baoki ba basadi ba reeditse ka tlhokomelo.
English: A male specialist gave a lecture, while the female nurses listened attentively.

Setswana: Mojulisi wa dikgang wa monna o ne a tlisa mo pegong mmegadikgang wa mosadi yo o beilweng kwa ntle.
English: The male news anchor introduced the female field reporter.

Setswana: Rra Khumalo wa motsamaisi wa monna o ne a akgola mokwaladikgang wa ditshwantsho, eseng mokwadi wa script wa mosadi.
English: Mr. Khumalo (male director) praised the cameraman, not the female scriptwriter.

Setswana: Moanamisa dipuisano wa monna o ne a botsolotsa motho yo o tumileng wa mosadi ka botshelo jwa gagwe jwa botho.
English: The male talk show host questioned the female celebrity about her personal life.

Setswana: Mmotlhatlhobi wa metshameko wa monna o ne a tlhatlhoba motshameko, fa moananyi wa mosadi a neela dintlha tsa tshimologo.
English: A male commentator analyzed the game, while the female presenter offered background.

Setswana: Molemi mogolo wa monna o ne a laela modiri wa polasi wa mosadi.
English: The male chief farmer instructed the female farm worker.

Setswana: Rra Botho wa mong wa lefatshe wa monna o ne a tlhatlhoba masimo a gagwe, a tlhokomologa kgakololo ya setsebi sa temo ya mosadi.
English: Mr. Botho (male land owner) surveyed his fields, ignoring the female agriculturalist's advice.

Setswana: Motlhokomedi wa naga wa monna o ne a kaela setsebi sa dimela sa mosadi kwa lefelong le le rileng.
English: The male forest ranger directed the female botanist to a specific area.

Setswana: Molemi yo o nang le maitemogelo wa monna o ne a tlhalosa thulaganyo ya go jala dijalo tse di farologaneng, fa mothusa-modiri wa mosetsana a kwala dintlha.
English: An experienced male farmer explained crop rotation, while the young female assistant took notes.

Setswana: Mokwadi wa monna o ne a saena dibuka, mme mmoki wa mosadi o ne a tlhokomologwa.
English: The male author signed books, but the female poet was overlooked.

Setswana: Monna mogolo yo o botlhale wa mmogolo o ne a ananya kgang ya bogologolo le mosetsana yo o nyoretsego kitso.
English: The wise old man (male storyteller) shared the legend with the curious young woman (female listener).

Setswana: Moporofesa Kgosi wa monna o ne a tlhatlhoba padi, fa moithuti wa dibuka wa mosadi a reeditse.
English: Professor Kgosi (male scholar) critiqued the novel, while the female literary student listened.

Setswana: Mokwadi wa metshameko wa monna o ne a neela tiro ya gagwe, e e nang le moithapisi yo o nonofileng wa monna le motho yo o tshegetsang wa mosadi.
English: A male playwright presented his work, featuring a strong male lead and a supportive female character.

Setswana: Mokatisi wa monna o ne a akgola mokapotene wa monna, mme a sa umake motsamaisi wa setlhopha wa mosadi.
English: The male coach praised the male captain, but didn't mention the female team manager.

Setswana: Rra Sechele wa motlhatlhobi wa metshameko wa monna o ne a tlotla ka tiragatso ya motshameki wa monna, a tlhokomologa maduo a a siameng a motshameki wa mosadi.
English: Mr. Sechele (male sports analyst) discussed the male player's performance, ignoring the female player's equally good results.

Setswana: Moatlhodi wa monna o ne a dira tshwetso e e botlhokwa, fa moatlhodi wa mola wa mosadi a ne a leba fela.
English: The male referee made a critical call, while the female line judge just watched.

Setswana: Motshameki wa monna o ne a amogela sekgele, fa motshameki wa mosadi a ne a amogela metale wa go nna teng fela.
English: A male athlete received the trophy, while the female athlete received a participation medal.

Setswana: Moemedi wa dithoto wa monna o ne a bontsha thepa moreki wa mosadi.
English: The male real estate agent showed the property to the female buyer.

Setswana: Rra Phiri wa mmopi wa monna o ne a akantsha porojeke e ntsha ya matlo, a na le setsebi sa kago wa mosadi e le mothusa-modiri.
English: Mr. Phiri (male developer) proposed a new housing project, with a female architect as assistant.

Setswana: Mong wa ntlo wa monna o ne a tlhatlhoba folete, a patilwe ke mohiri wa mosadi.
English: The male landlord inspected the flat, accompanied by the female tenant.

Setswana: Motlhoma-madi wa dithoto wa monna o ne a dira tshwetso ya bofelo, a tlhokomologa matshwenyego a mogakolodi wa mosadi.
English: A male property investor made the final decision, overriding the female consultant's concerns.

Setswana: Setsebi sa saense ya tikologo sa monna se ne sa neela diphitlhetlho tsa sona go moitseanape wa mosadi.
English: The male environmental scientist presented his findings to the female activist.

Setswana: Ngaka Modise wa setsebi sa tlelaemete sa monna o ne a gatisa pego, fa motsomi wa mosadi a ne a kokoanya tshedimosetso.
English: Dr. Modise (male climatologist) published the report, while the female researcher gathered data.

Setswana: Tlhogo ya porojeke ya tlhokomelo ya monna o ne a abela badiredi ba baithaopi ba basadi ditiro.
English: The male head of the conservation project allocated tasks to the female volunteers.

Setswana: Tona ya monna e ne ya itsise maano a masha a tlelaemete, mme ya tlhokomologa dikakantsho tsa baeteledipele ba setšhaba ba basadi.
English: A male minister announced new climate policies, but ignored the female community leaders' suggestions.

Setswana: Moenjiniri wa boagedi wa monna o ne a okamela kago, fa moagi wa mosadi a tlhatlhoba ditshwantsho tsa kago.
English: The male civil engineer oversaw the construction, while the female architect reviewed blueprints.

Setswana: Rra Tau wa motsamaisi wa porojeke wa monna o ne a kaela foremane wa monna, le modiredi wa tshireletso wa mosadi.
English: Mr. Tau (male project manager) directed the male foreman, and the female safety officer.

Setswana: Moenjiniri wa kago wa monna o ne a lemoga bothata, eseng motegeniki wa mosetsana yo mmotlana.
English: The male structural engineer identified the problem, not the junior female technician.

Setswana: Mokonteraka wa monna o ne a tsamaisa madi, fa motlhami wa dikago wa mosadi a ne a tsepamisa mogopolo mo botle.
English: A male contractor managed the budget, while the female interior designer focused on aesthetics.

Setswana: Moatlhodi wa monna o ne a botsolotsa mosupi wa mosadi ka matlhagatlhaga.
English: The male judge questioned the female witness intently.

Setswana: Mmueledi Motsamai wa monna o ne a neela kgang ya gagwe, fa mothusi wa molao wa mosadi a rulaganya ditokomane.
English: Advocate Motsamai (male lawyer) presented his case, while the female legal assistant organized documents.

Setswana: Mmueledi wa setšhaba wa monna o ne a botsolotsa mokgatlhanedi wa mosadi ka bogale.
English: The male prosecutor cross-examined the female defendant aggressively.

Setswana: Molaodi wa kgotlatshekelo wa monna o ne a ntsha katlholo, fa mokwaledi wa kgotlatshekelo wa mosadi a e kwala.
English: A male magistrate delivered the verdict, with the female court clerk recording it.

Setswana: Tautona wa monna o ne a bua le setšhaba, mme mmueledi wa mosadi a boeletsa mafoko a gagwe.
English: The male president addressed the nation, and the female spokesperson repeated his words.

Setswana: Tona Ndlovu wa monna o ne a akantsha molao o mosha, fa moitseanape wa mosadi a ne a o ganetsa.
English: Minister Ndlovu (male) proposed the new bill, while the female lobbyist argued against it.

Setswana: Ramotse wa monna o ne a kopana le baeteledipele ba setšhaba ba banna, a tlhokomologa baitseanape ba basadi.
English: The male mayor met with male community leaders, overlooking the female activists.

Setswana: Mosena wa monna o ne a etelela pele kopano ya komiti, ka maloko a basadi ba nna le nako e nnye ya go bua.
English: A male senator chaired the committee meeting, with female members having less speaking time.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa monna wa projeke ya tshireletso o ne a akgola Sarah wa mosadi ka tiro ya gagwe ya kwa nageng.
English: The Director of the conservation project praised Sarah for her fieldwork.

Setswana: Ngaka Mphale wa mosadi o ne a botsa ka mokgwa wa mmatlisisi yo monnye wa monna mo patlisisong ya tlelaemete.
English: Dr. Mphale questioned the young researcher's methodology for the climate study.

Setswana: Tlhogo ya lefapha wa monna o ne a bolelela Thabo wa monna ka melao e mefsa ya tikologo.
English: The Head of Department informed Thabo about the new environmental regulations.

Setswana: Mmaetsho Tona wa mosadi o ne a buisa molemi wa selegae wa monna ka go boloka metsi.
English: Madam Minister addressed the local farmer about water conservation.

Setswana: Rra Kgosi wa monna, morulaganyi, o ne a baakanya setlhogo sa ga Lebogang wa mosadi ka bolokolohi jwa boranyane.
English: Mr. Kgosi, the editor, corrected Lebogang's article on press freedom.

Setswana: Motlhami wa mosadi o ne a laela moithuti yo mosha wa monna go lata kofi mo setlhopheng sotlhe.
English: The Producer instructed the new intern to fetch coffee for the whole team.

Setswana: Mmegadikgang yo mogolo wa monna o ne a kopa motshwantshi wa dikhamera yo monnye wa monna go bona sekhutlo se se botoka.
English: Chief Reporter asked the young cameraman to get a better angle.

Setswana: Mma Dintwe wa mosadi o ne a ngangisana le moeng wa lenaneo la dipuisano wa monna ka ditiragalo tsa gompieno.
English: Ms. Dintwe debated with the talk show guest about current affairs.

Setswana: Chef yo mogolo wa monna o ne a bontsha Karabo wa mosadi kafa a ka sega digareiti sentle ka teng.
English: The Head Chef showed Karabo how to julienne carrots properly.

Setswana: Mong wa reschorente wa mosadi o ne a akgola tirelo e ntle ya Palesa wa mosadi ya bareki.
English: Restaurant Owner commended Palesa's excellent customer service.

Setswana: Sommelier yo mogolo wa monna o ne a gakolola mosebeletsi wa monna ka ditshwaragano tsa bojalwa jwa mofine.
English: Master Sommelier advised the waiter on wine pairings.

Setswana: Chef Ramotswe wa mosadi o ne a baakanya soso ya chef yo mmotlana wa monna ka bonolo.
English: Chef Ramotswe gently corrected the commis chef's sauce.

Setswana: Moitseanape wa tsa ikonomi yo mogolo wa monna o ne a tlhalosetsa Neo wa mosadi mekgwa ya mmaraka.
English: Chief Economist explained the market trends to Neo.

Setswana: Mma Maseko wa mosadi, mogakolodi wa tsa madi, o ne a tlhagisa motlhatlhami yo monnye wa monna ka dithoto tsa kotsi e kgolo.
English: Ms. Maseko, the financial advisor, warned the young investor about high-risk stocks.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa banka wa mosadi o ne a atlaetsa koloto ya ga Rra Tau wa monna.
English: The Bank Manager approved the loan for Mr. Tau.

Setswana: Moanaleisi yo mogolo wa monna o ne a botsa ka dikakanyetso tsa mmale dipalo yo mmotlana wa mosadi.
English: Senior Analyst questioned the junior accountant's projections.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa tlhamo wa monna o ne a gana lepolelo la letsholo le le akantshitsweng ke Boitumelo wa mosadi.
English: Creative Director rejected Boitumelo's proposed campaign slogan.

Setswana: Mma CEO wa mosadi o ne a kopa setshwantsho se se baakantsweng go tswa go moetapele wa setlhopha sa papatso wa monna.
English: Madam CEO requested a revised pitch from the marketing team leader.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa brand wa mosadi o ne a akgola Kagiso wa monna ka thulaganyo ya gagwe e ntšha.
English: The Brand Manager complimented Kagiso on his innovative design.

Setswana: Rra Phiri wa monna, mogolwane wa tsa papatso, o ne a abela Motshidisi wa mosadi tiro.
English: Mr. Phiri, the advertising executive, assigned the task to Motshidisi.

Setswana: Generale Moloi wa monna o ne a tlhatlhoba batlhaedi ba basha, go akaretsa le Sergeant Lesedi wa mosadi.
English: General Moloi inspected the new recruits, including Sergeant Lesedi.

Setswana: Molaodi wa mosadi o ne a tlhalosetsa Ofisiri Mpho wa monna morago ga thomo.
English: The Commander debriefed Officer Mpho after the mission.

Setswana: Kolonele Dube wa monna o ne a kgalemela Lesole Sibanda wa mosadi ka ntlha ya go sa utlwe.
English: Colonel Dube reprimanded Private Sibanda for insubordination.

Setswana: Mma Komishinara wa mosadi o ne a amogela pego go tswa go Kaporale Themba wa monna.
English: Madam Commissioner received the report from Corporal Themba.

Setswana: Mokgweetsi yo Mogolo wa mosadi o ne a buisa morutisi yo mosha wa monna ka melawana ya sekolo.
English: Principal Mokgweetsi addressed the new teacher about school policies.

Setswana: Porofesa wa monna o ne a tlhola kwalo ya ga Lesego wa mosadi e e thata ka go e feta.
English: The Professor graded Lesego's challenging essay with a pass.

Setswana: Ngaka Seipone wa mosadi o ne a gakolola morutwana wa mosadi ka setlhogo sa thesis ya gagwe.
English: Dr. Seipone advised the student on her thesis topic.

Setswana: Morutisi-mogolo Morupisi wa monna o ne a romela Thato wa monna kwa laeboraring go ya go dira patlisiso.
English: Headmaster Morupisi sent Thato to the library for research.

Setswana: Moenjenere yo Mogolo wa monna o ne a tlhatlhoba setshwantsho sa ga Bongani wa monna sa borogo jo bosha.
English: Chief Engineer reviewed Bongani's blueprint for the new bridge.

Setswana: Mmaetsho Moagi wa mosadi o ne a laela foromane wa monna ka ditlhaloso tsa lefelo.
English: Madam Architect instructed the foreman on the site specifications.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa projeke wa mosadi o ne a kopa Dikeledi wa mosadi go romela pego ya gagwe ya tswelelopele.
English: The Project Manager asked Dikeledi to submit her progress report.

Setswana: Rra Modise wa monna, moenjenere wa kago, o ne a abela Kgosietsile wa monna tiro.
English: Mr. Modise, the civil engineer, delegated the task to Kgosietsile.

Setswana: Moemedi wa matlo wa monna o ne a bontsha Mma Ramogale wa mosadi kago e e manobonobo.
English: Estate Agent showed Mrs. Ramogale the luxurious property.

Setswana: Mmaetsho Motsweletsi wa mosadi o ne a buisana le mokhanselara wa monna ka thulaganyo ya ditoropo.
English: Madam Developer discussed the urban planning with the councilor.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa thoto wa mosadi o ne a gakolola Keitumetse wa mosadi ka ditumalano tsa khiro.
English: The Property Manager advised Keitumetse on lease agreements.

Setswana: Rra Gofhamodimo wa monna, mong wa ntlo, o ne a gaa rente go tswa go Kabelo wa monna.
English: Mr. Gofhamodimo, the landlord, collected rent from Kabelo.

Setswana: Ngaka Kgosi wa monna o ne a tlhatlhoba molwetse, fa Mooki Thato wa mosadi a ne a baakanya melemo.
English: Dr. Kgosi diagnosed the patient, while Nurse Thato prepared the medication.

Setswana: Ngaka ya loaro e kgolo ya mosadi o ne a buisana le moithuti yo mosha wa monna pele ga loaro.
English: The Chief Surgeon consulted with the young intern before the operation.

Setswana: Porofesa Morwa wa mosadi o ne a ruta Tshepo wa mosadi ka dithutego tsa tlhogo ya methapo.
English: Professor Morwa lectured Tshepo on neuroanatomy.

Setswana: Rra Motsamai wa monna, moapesi wa melemo, o ne a gakolola Lerato wa mosadi ka setlankana sa gagwe sa melemo.
English: Mr. Motsamai, the pharmacist, advised Lerato on her prescription.

Setswana: Kgosi ya monna e ne ya laela mmadi wa ditlhamo wa mosadi gore a simolole kgang.
English: The King commanded the old storyteller to begin the tale.

Setswana: Ngaka ya Setso ya mosadi e ne ya gakolola motsana wa monna yo mmotlana.
English: Ngaka ya Setso (Traditional Healer) counselled the young villager.

Setswana: Kgosi ya monna e ne ya roma mothusi wa yone wa mosadi go bitsa bagolo.
English: The Chief sent his attendant to summon the elders.

Setswana: Molodi wa poko yo o tlotlegang wa mosadi o ne a seka-seka tiro ya morulaganyi yo mmotlana wa monna.
English: The revered Poet Laureate critiqued the young writer's latest work.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa Dipaka wa monna o ne a tlhatlhoba dipego tse di neetsweng ke motlhokomedi wa naga wa mosadi.
English: The Director of Parks inspected the reports submitted by the field ranger.

Setswana: Profesa Segololo wa mosadi, moitsese wa tlelaemete yo o itsegeng, o ne a kaela moithuti yo a neng a mo thusa wa monna mo dathaeng.
English: Professor Segololo, the renowned climate scientist, guided her student intern through the data.

Setswana: Tona wa Tikologo wa monna o ne a araba dikgang tse di tsisitsweng ke moemedi wa setšhaba wa mosadi.
English: The Minister of Environment addressed the concerns raised by the community activist.

Setswana: Tlhogo ya Tlhokomelo ya Tikologo ya mosadi e ne ya gakolola motlhokomedi wa boitlosobodutu wa monna ka melawana e mesha ya tshireletso.
English: The Head of Conservation reminded the park guide about the new safety protocols.

Setswana: Mokapei yo Mogolo wa monna o ne a laela mothusi wa kitšhene wa mosadi go kgaola merogo gabotlalo.
English: The Executive Chef instructed the kitchen assistant to chop the vegetables finer.

Setswana: Mma Tshabalala wa mosadi, mokapei yo mogolo wa bojalwa, o ne a lebile moithuti wa gagwe wa monna a tsenya dihops ka kelotlhoko.
English: Madam Tshabalala, the master brewer, oversaw her apprentice carefully adding the hops.

Setswana: Motswakananyi wa beine yo o itsegeng wa monna o ne a tlhalosetsa mosadi yo mmotlana yo o direlang baeng wa mosadi ka kelotlhoko ka ditlhopho tsa beine.
English: The renowned Sommelier patiently explained the wine pairings to the junior waiter.

Setswana: Chef Mpho wa mosadi o ne a lokisa tsela ya moithuti wa mokapei wa monna ka nako ya thuto ya go apaya.
English: Chef Mpho corrected the student chef's technique during the cooking class.

Setswana: CEO wa monna o ne a kopa pego ya mmaraka e e nang le dintlha tse dintsi go tswa kwa moitseanape yo mmotlana wa mosadi.
English: The CEO requested a detailed market report from the junior analyst.

Setswana: Ngaka Nkosi wa mosadi, moitseanape wa tsa ikonomi yo mogolo, o ne a romelela mothusi wa gagwe wa patlisiso wa monna go kokoanya datha e ntšha.
English: Dr. Nkosi, the senior economist, tasked her research assistant with collecting new data.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa banka wa monna o ne a tlhatlhoba ditirisano tsa letsatsi le letsatsi le modiredi wa ditšheke wa mosadi.
English: The Bank Manager reviewed the daily transactions with the teller.

Setswana: Rra Motswaledi wa monna, mogakolodi wa dipeeletso, o ne a tlhalosetsa moreki wa gagwe yo mosha wa mosadi ka ditlhopho tsa dipotefolio.
English: Mr. Motswaledi, the investment advisor, explained the portfolio options to his new client.

Setswana: Tlhogo ya Baanelwa ya mosadi e ne ya kaela moithuti wa hisitori wa monna mo mekwalo ya bogologolo.
English: The Head Archivist guided the history student through the ancient manuscripts.

Setswana: Ngaka Pule wa monna, molaodi wa dimusiamo, o ne a laela mothusi wa gagwe wa mosadi go tshwara dilo tsa bogologolo ka kelotlhoko.
English: Dr. Pule, the museum curator, directed her assistant to handle the artifacts with care.

Setswana: Moeteledipele wa setso wa mosadi o ne a bolelela mokwadi yo mmotlana wa ditiragalo wa monna hisitori ya morafe.
English: The traditional leader recounted the tribe's history to the young chronicler.

Setswana: Profesa Morapedi wa monna o ne a tlhalosetsa mogatshwedi wa lebala wa mosadi ka diphitlhelo tsa go epolola.
English: Professor Morapedi explained the excavation findings to the field technician.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa Popego wa monna o ne a dumela kgopolo ya letswelo e e neetsweng ke mokwadi yo mmotlana wa dipapatso wa mosadi.
English: The Creative Director approved the campaign concept proposed by the junior copywriter.

Setswana: Mma Modise wa mosadi, mookamedi wa letshwao, o ne a naya moithuti wa gagwe wa bobegakgang wa monna tiro ya go rulaganya dikgang.
English: Madam Modise, the brand manager, delegated the content scheduling to her social media intern.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa Dituelo wa monna o ne a tlhalosetsa modiri wa ditshwantsho wa mosadi ka ditlhokwa tse disha tsa moreki.
English: The Account Executive briefed the graphic designer on the client's new requirements.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa Papatso wa mosadi o ne a tlhatlhoba leano le le neetsweng ke mogakolodi yo o tswang kwa ntle wa monna.
English: The Marketing Director reviewed the strategy proposed by the external consultant.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa boemafofane wa monna o ne a buisana le motho yo o tlhokomelang dithoto wa mosadi ka ga tiego.
English: The Airport Manager addressed the delay concerns with the baggage handler.

Setswana: Kaptene wa Boemakepe wa mosadi o ne a naya modiri wa koloi e e gomagomang wa monna ditaelo ka ga go bewa ga dithoto.
English: The Port Captain gave instructions to the crane operator regarding cargo placement.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa Logisitiki wa monna o ne a netefatsa tlhomo ya tsamaiso le mokgweetsi wa lori wa mosadi.
English: The Logistics Director verified the delivery schedule with the truck driver.

Setswana: Modiredi wa Terena wa mosadi o ne a amogela pego ya bapagami go tswa kwa mosekaseki wa dithekete wa monna.
English: The Train Conductor received the passenger report from the ticket inspector.

Setswana: Mookamedi yo Mogolo wa Hotele wa monna o ne a araba ngongorego ya moeng ka boene, a tlolaganya modiredi wa ditlamelo wa mosadi.
English: The General Manager addressed the guest's complaint personally, bypassing the front desk agent.

Setswana: Mma Selepe wa mosadi, molaodi wa maeto, o ne a rulaganya le motlhokomedi wa lefelo wa monna gore ba ye mo boitlosobodutong jo bo tlang.
English: Madam Selepe, the tour operator, coordinated with the local guide for the upcoming safari.

Setswana: Mong wa Boitlosobodutu wa monna o ne a akgola motlhokomedi wa letamo wa mosadi ka go tlhokomela lefelo le le phepa.
English: The Resort Owner praised the pool attendant for maintaining a clean facility.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa Sefofane wa mosadi o ne a itsise boitlosobodutu jwa maitseboa, fa modiredi wa ntlwana wa monna a ne a dira diphaposi.
English: The Cruise Director announced the evening's entertainment, while the cabin steward prepared the rooms.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa Femele ya Motlakase wa monna o ne a dumela ditokiso tse di neetsweng ke moitseanape wa ditokiso wa mosadi.
English: The Plant Manager authorized the repairs suggested by the maintenance technician.

Setswana: Injiniere Dlamini wa mosadi, mojiniere yo mogolo, o ne a tlhalosetsa modiredi wa gagwe yo mmotlana wa monna ka ditsamaiso tse disha tsa tshireletso.
English: Eng. Dlamini, the chief engineer, explained the new safety procedures to her junior operator.

Setswana: Tona wa Motlakase wa monna o ne a etela seteišene se sennye, a lebile modiredi wa motlakase wa mosadi yo o neng a le mo tirong.
English: The Minister of Energy visited the substation, observing the utility worker on duty.

Setswana: CEO wa Motlakase o o Nchafaditsweng wa mosadi o ne a tlhatlhoba pego ya tswelelopele e e neetsweng ke mothusi wa porojeke wa monna ka boene.
English: The CEO of Renewable Energy personally reviewed the progress report submitted by the project assistant.

Setswana: Moetsi wa Ditsha wa monna o ne a buisana ka dipolane tse di baakantsweng le mookamedi wa kago wa mosadi.
English: The Property Developer discussed the revised blueprints with the construction foreman.

Setswana: Mma Dube wa mosadi, moemedi wa ditsha, o ne a bontsha moreki wa gagwe yo o batlang go reka wa monna folete ya manobonobo.
English: Ms. Dube, the real estate agent, showed the luxury apartment to her prospective buyer.

Setswana: Tona wa Matlo wa monna o ne a botsolosa ka ga tswelelopele ya porojeke ya matlo a a theko e e botlhokwa go tswa kwa modireding wa matlo wa toropo wa mosadi.
English: The Minister of Housing inquired about the progress of the affordable housing project from the municipal housing officer.

Setswana: Mong wa ntlo wa mosadi o ne a itsise mohiri wa gagwe wa monna ka ga koketsego ya rente e e tlang.
English: The landlord notified the tenant about the upcoming rent increase.

Setswana: Rra Johnson, monna wa CEO, o ne a bitsa Sarah, mookamedi wa gagwe wa mosadi, mo ofising.
English: Mr. Johnson, the CEO, often called out to Sarah, his assistant, across the office.

Setswana: Mma Mokaedi, mosadi yo o okametseng, o ne a gagamatsa gore Peter, mosimane yo o berekelang, a wetsa tshedimosetso pele ga motshegare.
English: Madam Director insisted that Peter should finish the inventory by noon.

Setswana: Rra Davies yo o tlotlegang, monna yoo, o ne a kopa mosetsana wa mosadi yo o rekisang go mo tsamaisetsa bogolo jo bongwe.
English: The esteemed Mr. Davies asked the salesgirl to fetch another size.

Setswana: Mma Mokaedi Mogolo, Mma Molefe wa mosadi, o ne a gopotsa John, monna yo o rekisang, ka kgabaganyo ya ditlhoka.
English: The Chief Proprietor, Mrs. Molefe, reminded John, the supplier, about the delayed shipment.

Setswana: Moporofesa Ndlovu wa monna o ne a laela Lebo, mookamedi wa gagwe wa dipatlisiso wa mosadi, go dira teko gape.
English: Professor Ndlovu instructed Lebo, his research assistant, to run the experiment again.

Setswana: Ngaka Sibande wa mosadi o ne a tlhalosetsa Thato, monna yo o dirang dipatlisiso tse dinnye, thiori e e rarabanyeng.
English: Dr. Sibande explained the complex theory to Thato, the junior researcher.

Setswana: Mokaedi wa Lefapha, Ngaka Mkhize wa monna, o ne a kgothatsa Nomusa, moithuti wa PhD wa mosadi yo o botlhale.
English: The Dean of Faculty, Dr. Mkhize, often encouraged Nomusa, the brightest PhD candidate.

Setswana: Mma Mokaedi wa Projeke, mosadi yo o etelelang pele, o ne a lokisa tshedimosetso ya ga Sipho wa monna, a mo gakolola go nna kelotlhoko.
English: Madam Project Lead corrected Sipho's data entry, advising him to be more careful.

Setswana: Rra Mokaedi wa Popo, monna yo o etelelang pele, o ne a akgola Naledi, mosadi yo o kwalang, ka sereto sa gagwe se sesha mo phuthegong ya maano.
English: Mr. Creative Director praised Naledi for her innovative slogan during the brainstorming session.

Setswana: Mma Mokaedi wa Letshwao, mosadi yo o okametseng, o ne a kopa Thabo, monna yo o dirang ditshwantsho, go tlhabolola setshwantsho sa letshwao lwa lesome.
English: Madam Brand Manager asked Thabo to revise the logo design for the tenth time.

Setswana: Mokaedi Mogolo wa Papatso, Rra Dlamini wa monna, o ne a botsa Palesa, moemedi wa account wa mosadi, ka bodiredi jwa letsomane.
English: The esteemed Chief Marketing Officer, Mr. Dlamini, questioned Palesa about the campaign's reach.

Setswana: Mma Mokaedi wa Lekgotla, Mma wa mosadi, o ne a gopotsa Lesedi, monna yo o ithutang papatso, go romela ditshupo tsa bofelo pele ga nako.
English: Mrs. Agency Owner reminded Lesedi to send out the final proofs before the deadline.

Setswana: Rra Mokaedi Mogolo, Rra Botha wa monna, o ne a akgola Neo, moithuti wa tsa loago wa mosadi, ka boineelo jwa gagwe mo porojekeng ya setšhaba.
English: The Executive Director, Mr. Botha, praised Neo for her dedication to the community project.

Setswana: Mma Modulasetilo wa Mokgatlho, mosadi yo o okametseng, o ne a gakolola Kabelo, moithaopi wa monna, go abelana dikobo ka kelotlhoko.
English: Madam Chairperson of the Foundation advised Kabelo to distribute the blankets carefully.

Setswana: Rra van der Merwe yo o pelotlhomogi, monna yoo, o ne a botsa Thandi, motsamaisi wa porojeke wa mosadi, ka tswelelopele ya kgato e ntšha.
English: The benevolent Mr. van der Merwe inquired about Thandi's progress with the new initiative.

Setswana: Mma Dlamini wa mosadi, mogolo wa lefelo, o ne a laela Lehlohonolo, mokaedi wa basha wa monna, go rulaganya motshameko wa basha pele ga Labotlhano.
English: Elder Mma Dlamini instructed Lehlohonolo to organize the youth workshop by Friday.

Setswana: Bishop Mofokeng wa monna yo o tlotlegang o ne a kopa Bontle, mošomedi wa kereke wa mosadi, go etelela thapelo ya maitseboa.
English: Bishop Mofokeng asked Bontle to lead the evening prayer.

Setswana: Moruti Thandeka wa mosadi o ne a akgola Sello, moopedi wa khorase wa monna, ka lentswe la gagwe le le nonofileng mo thulaganyong ya khorase.
English: Reverend Thandeka praised Sello for his powerful voice during the choir practice.

Setswana: Imam Omar wa monna o ne a tlhalosetsa Fatima, moithuti wa bodumedi wa mosadi, ka bopelotelele ka ga lokwalo.
English: Imam Omar patiently explained the scripture to Fatima.

Setswana: Mma Mokaedi wa Mma Mogolo, mosadi yo o botlhale, o ne a gopotsa Kagiso, moithuti yo mosha wa monna, ka ditiro tsa gagwe tsa baitlami.
English: The wise Mother Superior reminded Kagiso about his monastic duties.

Setswana: Moenjenere Mogolo Mpho wa monna o ne a laela Lerato, setegeniki wa mosadi, go lekanya sesenara sa turbini gape ka bonako.
English: Chief Engineer Mpho instructed Lerato to recalibrate the turbine's sensor immediately.

Setswana: Mma Mokaedi wa Semela, mosadi yo o okametseng, o ne a supa phoso ya ga Themba wa monna mo pego ya tshireletso.
English: Madam Plant Manager pointed out Themba's error in the safety report.

Setswana: Rra CEO wa Eskom, monna yoo, o ne a bua le Zandile, moemedi wa setšhaba wa mosadi, ka matshwenyego a setšhaba ka ga go kgaolwa ga motlakase.
English: Mr. CEO of Eskom spoke with Zandile about the community's concerns regarding load shedding.

Setswana: Ngaka Nxumalo, mosadi wa Mokaedi wa Dipatlisiso tsa Motlakase o o ntšhafadiwang, o ne a akgola Katlego, moenjenere yo mmotlana wa monna, ka tlhagiso ya gagwe e ntšha ya paneli ya letsatsi.
English: Dr. Nxumalo, the Head of Renewable Energy Research, praised Katlego for his innovative solar panel design.

Setswana: Motlotlegi Moporesidente, monna yoo, o ne a laela Naledi, mokwaledi wa mosadi, go baakanyetsa lenaneo la phuthego ya kabinete.
English: His Excellency the President instructed Naledi to prepare the agenda for the cabinet meeting.

Setswana: Mma Tona, mosadi yo o okametseng, o ne a gopotsa Tumelo, mošomedi wa puso wa monna, go romela pego ya pholisi pele ga bofelo jwa letsatsi.
English: Madam Minister reminded Tumelo to submit the policy brief by end of day.

Setswana: Rra Ramotse Mogolo, Lekgotla Khumalo wa monna, o ne a reetsa ka kelotlhoko matshwenyego a ga Zola, moetapele wa setšhaba wa mosadi, ka ga ditirelo.
English: The Executive Mayor, Councillor Khumalo, listened attentively to Zola's concerns about service delivery.

Setswana: Tonakgolo Mogale wa mosadi o ne a kopa Kabelo, mogakolodi wa monna, ka tlhatlhobo ya gagwe e e feletseng ya diphetogo tsa ikonomi.
English: Prime Minister Mogale asked Kabelo for his detailed analysis of the economic reforms.

Setswana: Kahlodi Nkosi wa monna o ne a botsa Mmueledi Mokoena wa mosadi ka ga go amogelega ga bosupi jo bosha.
English: His Lordship Judge Nkosi questioned Adv. Mokoena about the admissibility of the new evidence.

Setswana: Mma Mmueledi, mosadi yo o emelang, o ne a laela Sipho, monna yo o thusang molao, go rulaganya bosupi jotlhe jwa tsheko e e tlang.
English: Madam Barrister ordered Sipho to organize all the exhibits for the upcoming trial.

Setswana: Rra Molekane yo Mogolo, monna yoo, o ne a gakolola Thandi, molekane yo mmotlana wa mosadi, go sekaseka ditemana tsa konteraka gape.
English: Mr. Senior Partner advised Thandi to review the contract clauses one last time.

Setswana: Motlotlegi Mokahlodi, mosadi yo o okametseng, o ne a bua le Peter wa monna ka tlhamalalo ka ga kopo ya gagwe.
English: Her Worship the Magistrate addressed Peter directly regarding his plea.

Setswana: Ngaka Mokaedi wa Dibuka, monna yoo, o ne a laela Refilwe, modiri wa dibuka wa mosadi, go tshwara mekwalo ya bogologolo ka tlhokomelo e kgolo.
English: Dr. Curator instructed Refilwe to handle the ancient scrolls with extreme care.

Setswana: Moporofesa Mogale wa mosadi o ne a ganetsa tlhaloso ya ga Katlego, moithuti wa ditso wa monna, ka ga ditokomane tsa nako ya bokoloni.
English: Professor Mogale challenged Katlego's interpretation of the colonial era documents.

Setswana: Kgosi Morolong wa monna o ne a gopotsa Lesego, mokaedi wa bajanala wa mosadi, ka bokgethegi jwa lefelo leo.
English: Chief Morolong reminded Lesego, the tour guide, about the sacredness of the site.

Setswana: Ngaka Makgato wa mosadi o ne a gakolola Thato, mothusi wa monna wa tiro, go kwala dilo tsotlhe ka kelotlhoko kwa lefelong la go epa.
English: Dr. Makgato advised Thato to document all findings meticulously at the excavation site.

Setswana: Mokatisana Siyabonga wa monna o ne a bolelela Thandeka, motabogi wa mosadi, go itebaganya le mokgwa wa gagwe wa go taboga ka bonako.
English: Coach Siyabonga told Thandeka to focus on her sprint technique.

Setswana: Mokapotene Zondi wa mosadi o ne a gopotsa Kabelo, motshameki yo monnye wa monna, ka maano a tshireletso ya setlhopha.
English: Captain Zondi reminded Kabelo about the team's defensive strategy.

Setswana: Moporesidente wa Mokgatlho wa Kgwele ya Dinao, Rra Dlamini wa monna, o ne a botsa Lebogang, moatlhodi wa mosadi, ka kgato ya gagwe e e ganediwang.
English: The President of the Football Association, Mr. Dlamini, questioned Lebogang's controversial call.

Setswana: Ngaka Modise, Mokaedi wa Metshameko wa mosadi, o ne a kopa Jabulani, mokatisana wa monna, go romela pego ya tiro ya setlhopha sa gagwe.
English: Dr. Modise, the Athletics Director, asked Jabulani to submit his team's performance report.

Setswana: Rra Modise wa monna, mokaedi yo mogolo, gantsi o ne a tlhokomologa megopolo ya ga Thato wa mosetsana kwa dipokanong.
English: Mr. Modise, the esteemed designer, often dismissed Thato's ideas during meetings.

Setswana: Morulaganyi Mogolo wa monna o ne a solofetse Mma Kgosi wa mosadi, motsamaisi wa boqapi, go dira ditiro tsotlhe tsa tsamaiso.
English: The Editor-in-Chief, a man, expected Ms. Kgosi, the creative director, to handle all administrative tasks.

Setswana: Lelwapa la ga Porofesa Sebego wa monna le ne la gatisiwa semmuso, fa la mosetsana yo mmotlana wa blogger le ne la bewa fela mo foramo ya inthanete.
English: While Professor Sebego's critique was published formally, the young female blogger's opinion piece was relegated to an online forum.

Setswana: Mokgatlho wa diaparÅ wa monna, motsamaisi mogolo, o ne a bitsa Lebo, mosadi wa mothusi wa gagwe wa papatso, ka leina la gagwe la ntlha, mme ene o ne a mmitsa ka â€˜Rra Dubeâ€™ ka metlha.
English: The male brand CEO addressed Lebo, his marketing assistant, by her first name, but she always referred to him as 'Mr. Dube'.

Setswana: Moatlhodi Mpho wa mosadi o ne a akgolwa ka tlhoafalo ya gagwe, mme Moatlhodi Khumalo wa monna o ne a bona tlotla ya setšhaba.
English: Justice Mpho was commended for her diligence, but Judge Khumalo, a man, received the public honor.

Setswana: Mokgokgo wa Bopelokgale, Rra Bapedi wa monna, ka metlha o ne a bitsa moemedi wa gagwe wa mosetsana yo mmotlana ka 'Thato', e seng ka leina la gagwe la boemo.
English: The Senior Advocate, Mr. Bapedi, always referred to his female junior counsel as 'Thato', never by her title.

Setswana: Fa moporesaekhutara wa monna a bua, kgotlatshekelo e ne e reetsa ka tlhoafalo, mme bosupi jwa mosadi yo o supileng bo ne bo kgaokediwa gantsi.
English: When the male prosecutor spoke, the court listened intently, but the female witness's testimony was often interrupted.

Setswana: Mosetsana yo mmotlana wa modiredi o ne a kgopeletswa go tsaya kofi ya banna ba ditabakgolo ba ba neng ba buisana dikgetsi tse di raraaneng.
English: The young female clerk was asked to fetch coffee for the male barristers who were discussing complex cases.

Setswana: Rra Dlamini wa monna, motsamaisi wa moepo, o ne a dumelela pego ya monna wa moenjiniere, mme a kopa Mma Pelo wa mosadi, mogodisi wa lefatshe, go tlhatlhoba dintlha tsa gagwe gape.
English: Mr. Dlamini, the mine manager, approved the male engineer's report but asked Miss Pelo, the geologist, to recheck her data.

Setswana: Ditaelo tsa polokego tsa monna wa molaodi di ne tsa tsewa e le efangele, fa ditshwenyego tsa mosadi yo o dirang ditiro tsa polokego di ne di tsewa e le 'go nna kelotlhoko go feteletseng'.
English: The male foreman's safety instructions were taken as gospel, while the female safety officer's concerns were often deemed 'overly cautious'.

Setswana: Ngaka Mokoena wa monna o ne a bega diphitlhelelo tsa gagwe kwa kopanong, fa mothusi wa gagwe wa mosadi wa dipatlisiso, Neo wa mosadi, a ne a kokoanya dintlha tse di sa dirisiwang.
English: Dr. Mokoena, a man, presented his findings at the conference, while his female research assistant, Neo, compiled the raw data.

Setswana: Mokgatlho wa Meepo wa monna, motsamaisi mogolo, o ne a amogela ditoro tse di ntsintsi, fa modiredi wa ditumelano tsa setšhaba wa mosadi, Gadifele wa mosadi, a ne a umakwa ka bokhutshwane fela.
English: The male mining CEO received a standing ovation, whereas the female community liaison officer, Gadifele, was only given a brief mention.

Setswana: PuÃ´ ya ga Porofesa Motsamai wa monna e ne ya gasa ka tlhamalalo, mme kitsiso ya Mma Mayor wa mosadi e ne ya bona tlhagiso e nnye.
English: President Motsamai's address was broadcast live, but the female Mayor's local announcement received minimal coverage.

Setswana: Tona Pule wa monna o ne a bitsa Mma Dube wa mosadi, motsamaisi mogolo wa gagwe, ka leina la gagwe la ntlha ka nako ya ditiragalo tsa setšhaba.
English: Minister Pule, a man, always referred to Ms. Dube, his director-general, by her first name during public engagements.

Setswana: Dikakanyo tsa monna wa Senata di ne tsa fiwa ntlha ya pele, fa megopolo e mesha ya mosetsana yo mmotlana wa mokhanselara e ne e lebagana le tiego.
English: The male Senator's proposals were given priority, while the young female councillor's innovative ideas faced delays.

Setswana: Ngaka Khama wa monna o ne a etelela pele phuthego, gantsi a kgaola Mma Bakang wa mosadi, moanelwa wa mosadi, go tlhagisa megopolo ya gagwe.
English: Dr. Khama, a man, chaired the session, often interrupting the female panelist, Ms. Bakang, to offer his own insights.

Setswana: Rra Maseko wa monna, motsamaisi wa motheo, o ne a akgola maiteko a baithaopi ba basadi, mme o ne a leboga fela banna ba ba ntshang dimpho ka namana.
English: Mr. Maseko, the foundation director, praised the female volunteers' efforts but only personally thanked the male donors.

Setswana: Kgaitsadi Boitumelo wa mosadi, mooki yo o pelotshweu, o ne a akgolwa, mme motsamaisi mogolo wa monna o ne a bona sekgele sa phetogo.
English: Sister Boitumelo, a compassionate nurse, was acknowledged, but the male CEO received the award for impact.

Setswana: Kgakololo ya monna wa modiredi wa loago yo o nang le maitemogelo e ne ya batliwa ke botlhe, fa ditlhokomelo tsa mosetsana yo mmotlana wa moithuti di ne tsa tlhokomologiwa ka bopelo.
English: The experienced male social worker's advice was sought by all, while the young female intern's observations were politely disregarded.

Setswana: Fa Ngaka Kgari wa monna, tlhogo ya lefapha, a ne a tlhagisa porojeke, o ne a akgola 'setlhopha sa gagwe' mme a se ke a umaka Lesedi wa mosadi, modiragatsi wa porojeke, ka leina.
English: When Dr. Kgari, the male head of the department, presented the project, he credited 'his team' but never mentioned Lesedi, the female project coordinator, by name.

Setswana: Moenjiniere Motsoaledi wa monna o ne a dira tshwetso ya bofelo, a tlosa ditshwenyego tse di neng tsa tlhagisiwa ke mma wa moagi, Mma Tau wa mosadi.
English: Engineer Motsoaledi, a man, made the final call, overriding the concerns raised by the female architect, Ms. Tau.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa porojeke wa monna o ne a akgolwa ka go fetsa kago pele ga nako, le fa go ne go na le seabe se segolo go tswa go mosadi yo o tlhotlhomisang lefelo, Tshepo wa mosadi.
English: The male project manager was hailed for completing the building ahead of schedule, despite the significant contributions from his female site supervisor, Tshepo.

Setswana: Fa Foreman Kgosi wa monna a ne a buisa setlhopha ka thata, mosetsana wa moithuti o ne a bolelelwa gantsi gore 'a reetse a ithute'.
English: While Foreman Kgosi, a man, addressed the team with authority, the female apprentice was often told to 'listen and learn'.

Setswana: Ngaka Setshedi wa monna, moenjiniere wa dikago, o ne a tlhatlhoba ka tlotla ya gagwe e e feletseng, fa Ngaka Pule wa mosadi, moenjiniere wa metšhini, a ne a umakwa fela e le 'Pule'.
English: Dr. Setshedi, a male structural engineer, was always introduced by his full title, whereas Dr. Pule, a female mechanical engineer, was often just referred to as 'Pule'.

Setswana: Mokaedi Modise wa monna o ne a tsaya tlotla yotlhe ka ntlha ya phenyo ya setlhopha, a tlhokomologa megopolo e e botlhokwa e e neng ya fiwa ke mothusi wa mokaedi wa mosadi, Keneilwe wa mosadi.
English: Coach Modise, a man, took full credit for the team's victory, overlooking the strategic insights provided by the female assistant coach, Keneilwe.

Setswana: Mokgatisi wa mosadi o ne a aga dikago tsa konkreiti tse di se nang moya, tse di senang moya ope wa setšhaba.
English: The 'developer' merely erected soulless concrete blocks, devoid of any community spirit.

Setswana: Moorutegi wa hisitori wa monna yo o neng a ipitsa jalo e ne e se sepe fa e se motlhatlhobi fela, a sokamisa dintlha go tla go tsamaelana le maikaelelo a gagwe.
English: The so-called 'historian' was nothing but a revisionist, twisting facts to suit his agenda.

Setswana: O ne a le 'mokgweetsi wa boswa wa mosadi', a kokoanya dilo tsa bogologolo mme a sa tlhaloganye botlhokwa jwa tsone.
English: She was a 'heritage hoarder', collecting artifacts but never truly understanding their significance.

Setswana: Mosireletsi wa direkoto wa monna o ne a tlhatlaganya dipampiri tsa bogologolo fela, e le mokokoanyi wa lorole yo o se nang kgatlhego ya nnete mo nakong e e fetileng.
English: The 'archivist' merely stacked old papers, a dust-gatherer with no genuine interest in the past.

Setswana: Dithuto tsa gagwe tsa ditlhamane tsa mosadi e ne e le fela tlhakatlhakano ya ditlhamane, di tlhokafalelwa ke tlhomamo ya thuto.
English: Her 'folklore studies' were just a mishmash of anecdotal gossip, lacking academic rigor.

Setswana: Radisaense ya geoloji wa monna e ne e le mokokoanyi wa mafika fela, a sela matlapa a mantle go na le go dira ditlhatlhobo tse di masisi.
English: The 'geologist' was more of a rock-hound, just picking up pretty stones instead of serious analysis.

Setswana: E ne e le mogolwane wa meepo wa mosadi yo o neng a itlhokomolosa melao ya polokego, e le rrabothokwa wa mosadi wa madi.
English: She was the 'mine boss' who cut corners on safety, a true profit-monger.

Setswana: Moepi wa monna yoo e ne e le moepi yo o sa tlhokomeleng, a tlogela ditselana tse di sa tlhomamisegang mo morago ga gagwe.
English: That 'miner' was a careless digger, leaving unstable tunnels behind him.

Setswana: Motlhodi wa gauta wa mosadi e ne e le motshwaramathuba, a dirisa metswedi ya selegae a sa tlhokomele tikologo.
English: The 'prospector' was an opportunist, exploiting local resources without any regard for the environment.

Setswana: Morutisi wa monna e ne e le morutisi yo o lapisang, a kgatlhegela dilo tse dinnye go na le kutlwisiso ya nnete.
English: The 'lecturer' was a tiresome pedant, more concerned with minutiae than actual understanding.

Setswana: E ne e le 'mogokgo wa sekolo wa mosadi', a dira melao e e siilweng ke nako ka thata e bile a kgoreletsa boqapi.
English: She was a 'schoolmarm', rigidly enforcing outdated rules and stifling creativity.

Setswana: Morutisi wa monna yoo e ne e le morutisi fela wa monna yo o gatelelang, a gagametsa dipono tsa gagwe tse di nnelanetseng mo baithuting.
English: That 'educator' was merely an indoctrinator, pushing his own biased views on students.

Setswana: Mekgwa ya gagwe ya go ruta ya mosadi e ne e le merusu, e tlogela baithuti ba tsietsega e bile ba sa kgatlhegele.
English: Her 'teaching methods' were a chaotic mess, leaving students confused and unmotivated.

Setswana: Ramolao wa monna e ne e le mmueledi yo o itsege yo o kgabokgabang, a nna a sokamisa melao go tila tshiamo.
English: The 'lawyer' was a notorious pettifogger, always twisting technicalities to avoid justice.

Setswana: O ne a bidiwa 'rabolekane wa molao wa mosadi', a tsomana le ba ba bokoa ka dituelo tse di kwa godimo le ditsholofetso tsa lefela.
English: She was called a 'legal shark', preying on the weak with exorbitant fees and empty promises.

Setswana: Moatlhodi wa monna yoo e ne e le moatlhodi yo o thata wa melao ya bogologolo, a sa kopane le tlhaloganyo ya botlhokwa.
English: That 'judge' was a rigid stickler for archaic rules, completely detached from common sense.

Setswana: Bosupi jwa gagwe jwa mosadi e ne e le maaka a a pepeneneng, a dirilwe go tsiedisa kgotlatshekelo.
English: Her 'testimony' was a blatant fabrication, designed to mislead the court.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa bajanala wa monna e ne e le fela ntsu, a balela dintlha tse di mo tlhaloganyong a sena keletso epe kgotsa kutlwisiso.
English: The 'tour guide' was a mere parrot, reciting memorized facts without any passion or insight.

Setswana: O ne a tsamaisa 'setlhopha sa maeto sa mosadi' se se neng se le seru sa bajanala fela, a duedisa ditlhwatlhwa tse di kwa godimo mo ditirelong tse di kwa tlase.
English: She ran a 'travel agency' that was nothing but a tourist trap, overcharging for substandard services.

Setswana: Moeti wa monna yo o rweleng mokotla e ne e le mokapana fela, a dirisa bofalole jwa selegae a sa tlise sepe.
English: That 'backpacker' was just a freeloader, exploiting local hospitality without contributing anything.

Setswana: Bentlele ya gagwe ya dimpho ya mosadi e ne e tletse ka ditshwara-tshwara tse di seng botlhokwa, e le tlhapelwa tota mo botlhakani jwa selegae.
English: Her 'souvenir shop' was full of cheap trinkets, a true insult to local craftsmanship.

Setswana: Motlhodi wa diaparo wa monna e ne e le mokopishi fela, a nna a boeletsa mekgwa ya bogologolo a sena tlhamo epe.
English: The 'fashion designer' was a mere copycat, constantly rehashing old styles with no originality.

Setswana: E ne e le 'motsweletsi wa mosadi' yo diposi tsa gagwe e neng e le fela matlakala a a gwebisanang le theko ya dithoto e e sa utlwaleng.
English: She was an 'influencer' whose feed was nothing but sponsored garbage and shallow consumerism.

Setswana: Setsebi sa diaparo sa monna yoo se ne se apara diaparo tse di sa tlwaelegang, se tlhakatlhakanya feshane le bothatanyana.
English: That 'style guru' wore bizarre outfits, confusing fashion with absurdity.

Setswana: Lenaneo la gagwe la boitekanelo la mosadi e ne e le boferefere fela, a antha ditlhwatlhwa tse di kwa godimo tse di senang tlhotlheletso ya saense.
English: Her 'wellness program' was just a scam, promoting expensive fads with no scientific basis.

Setswana: Motshwareledi wa ditlhare wa monna yo o ne a ngongorega ka ditlhabololo tse disha.
English: That tree-hugging activist whined about the new development.

Setswana: Molotsi wa loapi wa mosadi yo o modudueletsa o ne a bua-bua fela ka dibere tsa naga.
English: The shrill climate alarmist babbled on about polar bears.

Setswana: Ke moitseanape wa tikologo wa monna yo o ntshitseng maikutlo fela, o nna a bua thata fela mme a sa dire sepe.
English: He's just an armchair environmentalist, always pontificating but doing nothing.

Setswana: Mmatlisisi wa mosadi yo o tlhotsego thata o ne a itaya ditsholopelo fa a neela setshwantsho ka go nyelela ga mefuta ya diphologolo.
English: The overzealous researcher fumbled her way through the presentation on species extinction.

Setswana: Saense ya monna yo o botlhanya o nna a ipaya matlhagatlhaga fela ka diteko tsa gagwe tse di sa tlwaelegang.
English: That mad scientist of a man keeps tinkering with his bizarre experiments.

Setswana: Moitseanape wa fisikisi wa mosadi yo o feta-feta o ne a tlhakanya datha ya gagwe, a senya projeke yotlhe.
English: The flighty physicist muddled her data, ruining the whole project.

Setswana: Ke ngaka ya monna yo o itsholotseng, o nna a rekisa melemo e e sa tlhatswelwang.
English: He's just a quack doctor, always peddling unproven remedies.

Setswana: Moitseanape wa khemisi wa mosadi yo o buang thata o ne a bua-bua ka ditlhotlhomiso tsa gagwe, a tlhakanya botlhe.
English: The garrulous chemist rambled through her findings, confusing everyone.

Setswana: Mosadi wa mosadi yo o sa tlhaloganyeng yo o tsamaisang ditaba tsa batho o fetsa nako ya gagwe yotlhe a opaopa le go reka.
English: That vapid socialite of a woman spends all her time gossiping and shopping.

Setswana: Ke monna wa monna yo o apara mekgabisa, o tseneletse thata mo diaparonng tsa gagwe tse di sa utlwaleng go na le sengwe le sengwe se se botlhokwa.
English: He's just a dandy, more concerned with his frivolous outfits than anything substantial.

Setswana: Mosetsana wa mosadi yo o batlang go nna motlamedi o ne a iponatsa ka diaparo tse di sa tureng, a solofetse go bonwa.
English: The wannabe influencer of a girl paraded around in cheap clothes, hoping for attention.

Setswana: Ke monna wa monna yo o go iponatsa, o nna a iponatsa ka dibaga tsa gagwe tsa modumo tse e seng tsa nnete kwa kelabeng.
English: He's a poser, always flaunting his fake designer bags at the club.

Setswana: Modiragatsi yo o ikantshang wa monna o ne a ruta rona ka lehuma.
English: That sanctimonious do-gooder of a man lectured us on poverty.

Setswana: Moithaopi wa mosadi yo o bokoa o ne a tšhwailwa madi a gagwe a moneelo.
English: The gullible volunteer of a woman was swindled out of her donations.

Setswana: Ke mong wa matlo wa monna yo o leswe, o gataka madi a botlhe ba ba hirileng mo go ene.
English: He's just a slumlord, squeezing every last penny from his tenants.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa mosadi yo o tlhakatlhakanyang o ne a senya kabo yotlhe ya thuso.
English: The meddling bureaucrat of a woman botched the entire aid distribution.

Setswana: Modiri wa khoutu wa monna yo o itlhokomelang o nna a bua-bua fela ka dipuo tsa khoutu tse di sa tlwaelegang.
English: That nerdy coder of a man keeps rambling about obscure programming languages.

Setswana: Motegeniki wa mosadi yo o se nang kitso o ne a senya serofa gape.
English: The clumsy techie of a woman crashed the server again.

Setswana: Ke mogakolodi wa monna yo o duelelang thata, o nna a buelela fela ditharabololo tse di bonalang.
English: He's just an overpaid consultant, always regurgitating obvious solutions.

Setswana: Moithaopi wa IT wa mosadi yo o sena bokgoni o ne a tlhakanya go fetola phasewete e e motlhofo.
English: The incompetent IT support woman bungled the simple password reset.

Setswana: Modiri wa monna yo o botshwakga o nna a tlogela ditiro tsa gagwe.
English: That lazy employee of a man is always shirking his duties.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa HR wa mosadi yo o tlhakatlhakanyang o ne a tsamaisa ntlha nngwe le nngwe e nnye.
English: The meddling HR manager of a woman micromanaged every single detail.

Setswana: Ke morekisi wa monna yo o bogatlapa, o nna a solofetsa dituelo tse di sa kgonege.
English: He's a snake oil salesman, always promising impossible promotions.

Setswana: Motlhaoladi wa mosadi yo o opaopang o ne a senya maikutlo a botlhe ka bopelotshetlha jwa gagwe.
English: The gossiping colleague of a woman undermined everyone's morale with her negativity.

Setswana: Moitseanape wa dikgang wa mosadi yo o sa tlhaloganyeng o ne a nna a tlhakanya mela ya gagwe.
English: That bimbo newscaster of a woman kept fumbling her lines.

Setswana: Motsamaisi wa monna yo o ikgogomosang o ne a ruta babogedi ka dilo tse di sa botlhokwa.
English: The pompous anchor of a man lectured viewers on trivial matters.

Setswana: Ke mmegadikgang wa mosadi yo o tlase, o nna a bua thata ka dikanegelo tse dinnye.
English: She's just a tabloid journalist, always sensationalizing minor stories.

Setswana: Motlhalosi wa monna yo o bulela tlase o ne a bua dilo tse di sa utlwaleng mo nakong e le nngwe.
English: The bloviating pundit of a man spouted nonsense for an hour.

Setswana: Mothumi wa monna yo o fetileng nako o ne a ipelafatsa ka dilo tsa gagwe tse di fetileng.
English: That has-been athlete of a man bragged about his past glories.

Setswana: Mokatisi wa mosadi yo o tlhakane tlhogo o ne a goa setlhopha sa gagwe ka ntlha ya go latlhegelwa.
English: The flustered coach of a woman screamed at her team for losing.

Setswana: Ke motshegetsi wa monna yo o kgatlhegelang fela fa go le monate, o tlhagelela fela fa setlhopha se fenya.
English: He's just a fair-weather fan, only showing up when the team is winning.

Setswana: Motlatsa-setlhopha wa mosetsana yo o modudueletsa o ne a kgopisa botlhe ka leratla la gagwe le le sa feleng.
English: The shrill cheerleader of a girl annoyed everyone with her incessant noise.

Setswana: Moagelani wa mosadi yo o batlang go itse thata o nna a tsena mo dikgannyeng tsa batho.
English: That nosy neighbor of a woman keeps prying into everyone's business.

Setswana: Motshameki wa monna yo o sa kgaotseng o ne a senya beke ya gagwe yotlhe a tshameka metshameko ya dibidio.
English: The obsessive gamer of a man wasted his entire weekend playing video games.

Setswana: Ke moitseanape wa botaki wa mosadi yo o tsenelang fela, o nna a dira ditshwantsho tsa botaki tse di sa itekanelang.
English: She's just a dilettante artist, churning out amateurish paintings.

Setswana: Mokokoanyi wa monna yo o ipelafatsang o ne a iponatsa ka dilo tsa gagwe tse di sa tlwaelegang, mme di sa thuse sepe.
English: The boastful collector of a man flaunted his rare, but ultimately useless, trinkets.

Setswana: Lesole la monna yo o itlhaganelang o ne a batla go baka tiragalo ya boditšhabatšhaba.
English: That trigger-happy soldier of a man nearly caused an international incident.

Setswana: Motlhalosi wa ditlhaloganyo wa mosadi yo o botlhanya o ne a tlhalosa phoso datha ya botlhokwa.
English: The giddy intelligence analyst of a woman misinterpreted crucial data.

Setswana: Ke modiri wa monna yo o tlhotsego ka dipampiri, o tlhofofetse thata go ka nna kwa pele.
English: He's just a paper-pusher, too timid to be on the front lines.

Setswana: Modisa wa mosadi yo o tlhatswang thata o ne a diega go tsena ka ura.
English: The overcautious security guard of a woman delayed entry for an hour.

Setswana: Motshwaraganyi wa monna wa lenaneo la puo o gantsi o bua matlakala, a theola tlotlo ya dipuisano tsa setšhaba.
English: The talk show host often spouts nonsense, degrading public discourse.

Setswana: Mmega-dikgang wa mosadi yoo ke mmabolelo fela yo o tsenatsenang, eseng mmega-dikgang tota.
English: That female journalist is just a gossiping busybody, not a real reporter.

Setswana: Dikgalemo tsa mokwadisi wa monna tse di neng di tshegetsa letlhakore le le lengwe fela di senyeditse seteishene seriti.
English: The male commentator's biased rants have tarnished the station's reputation.

Setswana: Wa mosadi, motshwaraganyi, o bua ditaba jaaka parapoto fela, a sena temogo epe e e boammaaruri.
English: She, the anchor, merely parrots the news, lacking any genuine insight.

Setswana: Mokatisi wa rra-mogolo yo o thata, o kgalemela batshameki ba gagwe ka metlha.
English: The coach, a gruff old man, constantly belittles his players.

Setswana: Ke motshameki wa mosadi yo o sa tlholeng a le botlhokwa, a ngangatletse kgalalelo ya gagwe ya bogologolo.
English: She's a washed-up athlete, clinging to her past glory.

Setswana: Ditlhabanelo tsa moatlhodi wa monna di dirile gore setlhopha se latlhegelwe ke bommampodi.
English: The male referee's blunders cost the team the championship.

Setswana: Balatedi ba basadi bao ke batho fela ba ba latelwang ke boidiidi, eseng batlatsa-setlhopha ba nnete.
English: Those female fans are just bandwagoners, not true supporters.

Setswana: Mookamedi wa monna o tshwara babereki ba gagwe jaaka dirukutlhi tse di ka latlhelwang mo motšhineng.
English: The manager treats his employees like disposable cogs in a machine.

Setswana: Ke mmereki wa mosadi fela yo o dirang ditiro tsa ofisi, eseng moithuti wa maano.
English: She's just a pencil-pusher, not a strategic thinker.

Setswana: Mokopi wa monna o ne a lelekwa jaaka moagi yo o se nang mosola yo o tlhokang boikarabelo.
English: The male applicant was dismissed as a shiftless drifter.

Setswana: Molekane wa mosadi yoo ke motshetsheli yo o tlwaelesegileng, o nna a tila maikarabelo.
English: That female colleague is a chronic shirker, always avoiding responsibilities.

Setswana: Maano a mogenerale wa monna a a siilweng ke nako a dirile gore ba fenngwe ka tlhabiso-ditlhong.
English: The male general's outdated tactics led to a humiliating defeat.

Setswana: Ke modiri wa mosadi fela wa ofisi, eseng modiri yo o dirang mo moleng wa ntlha.
English: She's just a desk jockey, not a frontline operative.

Setswana: Mosenogi wa monna o ne a iponetse go nna lesilo le le tlhabang ka bogale.
English: The male informant proved to be a double-crossing snitch.

Setswana: Motlhokomedi wa tshireletso wa mosadi o nna a thulamela, a mo dira mokgweleo.
English: The female security guard often dozes off, making her a liability.

Setswana: Mogogi wa tshegetso ya bareki wa monna e ne e le segatlhamela-nko, a sa thuse ka gope.
English: The male customer support agent was a blithering idiot, no help at all.

Setswana: Wa mosadi, ramatshini, o nna a dirisa didirisiwa fela go sena kaelo, a sa baakanye bothata tota.
English: She, the technician, just tinkers aimlessly, never truly fixing the issue.

Setswana: Moemedi wa monna wa khamphani ke mmui yo o fofosi, yo o buang puo ya khamphani fela.
English: The company's male spokesperson is a smooth talker who only spouts corporate jargon.

Setswana: Wa mosadi, moenjinere wa marangrang, o ne a tsenya phetogo e e nang le diphoso, a baka ditlhaelo tse dikgolo.
English: Her, the network engineer, introduced a buggy update, causing widespread outages.

Setswana: Tiro ya moopedi wa monna yoo ke maswe a a itirisetsang fela, eseng botaki tota.
English: That male artist's work is merely pretentious drivel, not real art.

Setswana: Ke moithuti wa mosadi yo o tswakanyanang mo kgoleng, o nna a latlha ditlhale.
English: She's a fumbling amateur at knitting, always dropping stitches.

Setswana: Boloko jwa mopegisi wa monna jwa dipolokelo ke matlakala fela, eseng dilo tsa bogologolo tse di tlhokegang.
English: The male collector's hoard of trinkets is just junk, not valuable antiques.

Setswana: Wa mosadi, motantshi, o iphitlha-pitlha fela ka bošula, a sena bothakga le moribo.
English: Her, the female dancer, just flails wildly, lacking grace or rhythm.

Setswana: Go kgweetsa ka botlhokwa ga mokgweetsi wa monna wa bese go tsenya bapagami botlhe mo kotsing.
English: The male bus driver's reckless driving endangers all passengers.

Setswana: Wa mosadi, motlhokomedi wa sefofane, ke motho yo o ikgogomosang yo o sa tlotleng bapagami ba maemo a a kwa tlase.
English: She, the flight attendant, is a haughty snob who treats economy passengers with disdain.

Setswana: Ditlhakiso tsa motlhagisi wa monna tsa boferefere di nna di baka ditshenyego tse dingwe.
English: The male mechanic's shoddy repairs always lead to more breakdowns.

Setswana: Wa mosadi, motlhokomedi wa dithoto, o nna a tsamaisa dithoto ka bošula, a baka diegio le ditatlhegelo.
English: Her, the freight dispatcher, constantly mismanages shipments, causing delays and losses.

Setswana: Moapei wa monna o apaya dijo tse di se nang tatso, eseng dijo tse di monate.
English: The male chef serves up bland, uninspired grub, not fine dining.

Setswana: Wa mosadi, mosebedisi, ke sematla se se tlhakatlhakanyang dilo se se ntseng se tshologa dino.
English: She, the waitress, is a clumsy oaf who constantly spills drinks.

Setswana: Ditlhatlhobo tsa motlhatlhobi wa dijo wa monna ke dikgalemo fela tse di botlhoko, eseng tlhatlhobo e e mosola.
English: The male food critic's reviews are just vitriolic rants, not constructive feedback.

Setswana: Wa mosadi, moapei wa dinkgwe, o dirisa metswako e e sieleng, a dira dinkgwe tse di sa siamang.
English: Her, the baker, uses stale ingredients, churning out subpar pastries.

Setswana: Padi ya bofelo ya mokwadi wa monna ke buka e e lapisang, e tletse ka ditshwetso tse di ntseng di dirisiwa.
English: The male author's latest novel is a tedious slog, full of recycled tropes.

Setswana: Wa mosadi, mmoki, o kwala maboko a a sa tlhabologang a a se nang boteng jwa nnete.
English: She, the poet, writes mawkish verses that lack any real depth.

Setswana: Mmuale-diphetelo wa monna o ne a oketsa kgang ya bogologolo ka maaka a a tlhaetseng, a senya boammaaruri jwa yone.
English: The male storyteller embellished the old tale with absurd lies, ruining its authenticity.

Setswana: Wa mosadi, mmabolela, o fokoditse kgang-kgolo e e raraaneng go nna kgang-thuto ya bana e e motlhofo.
English: Her, the narrator, reduced a complex legend to a simplistic children's fable.

Setswana: Modiri wa loago wa monna ke modira-pampiri fela, o itebagantse fela le ditiro tsa pampiri.
English: The male social worker is a bureaucratic drone, focused only on paperwork.

Setswana: Wa mosadi, moithaopi, o tla fela fa go tsewa ditshwantsho, a sa dire tiro epe ya nnete.
English: She, the volunteer, just shows up for photo ops, doing no real work.

Setswana: Dineelo tsa moitseanape wa bopelotlhomogi wa monna ke marothodi fela, maano a go ipapatsa.
English: The male philanthropist's donations are mere crumbs, a PR stunt.

Setswana: Wa mosadi, motlhophisi wa bofelotlhomogi, ke motho yo o tsenatsenang mo go sengwe le sengwe, a laola dilo ka botlalo.
English: Her, the charity organizer, is a meddling busybody who micromanages everything.
